40001001	This is a record of the family line of Jesus Christ . He is the son of David . He is also the son of Abraham .
40001002	Abraham was the father of Isaac . Isaac was the father of Jacob . Jacob was the father of Judah and his brothers .
40001003	Judah was the father of Perez and Zerah . Tamar was their mother . Perez was the father of Hezron . Hezron was the father of Ram .
40001004	Ram was the father of Amminadab . Amminadab was the father of Nahshon . Nahshon was the father of Salmon .
40001005	Salmon was the father of Boaz . Rahab was Boaz's mother . Boaz was the father of Obed . Ruth was Obed's mother . Obed was the father of Jesse .
40001006	And Jesse was the father of King David . David was the father of Solomon . Solomon's mother had been Uriah's wife .
40001007	Solomon was the father of Rehoboam . Rehoboam was the father of Abijah . Abijah was the father of Asa .
40001008	Asa was the father of Jehoshaphat . Jehoshaphat was the father of Jehoram . Jehoram was the father of Uzziah .
40001009	Uzziah was the father of Jotham . Jotham was the father of Ahaz . Ahaz was the father of Hezekiah .
40001010	Hezekiah was the father of Manasseh . Manasseh was the father of Amon . Amon was the father of Josiah .
40001011	And Josiah was the father of Jeconiah and his brothers . At that time , the Jewish people were forced to go away to Babylon .
40001012	After this , the family line continued . Jeconiah was the father of Shealtiel . Shealtiel was the father of Zerubbabel .
40001013	Zerubbabel was the father of Abiud . Abiud was the father of Eliakim . Eliakim was the father of Azor .
40001014	Azor was the father of Zadok . Zadok was the father of Akim . Akim was the father of Eliud .
40001015	Eliud was the father of Eleazar . Eleazar was the father of Matthan . Matthan was the father of Jacob .
40001016	Jacob was the father of Joseph . Joseph was the husband of Mary . And Mary gave birth to Jesus , who is called Christ .
40001017	So there were 14 generations from Abraham to David . There were 14 from David until the Jewish people were forced to go away to Babylon . And there were 14 from that time to the Christ .
40001018	This is how the birth of Jesus Christ came about . His mother Mary and Joseph had promised to get married . But before they started to live together , it became clear that she was going to have a baby . She became pregnant by the power of the Holy Spirit .
40001019	Her husband Joseph was a godly man . He did not want to put her to shame in public . So he planned to divorce her quietly .
40001020	But as Joseph was thinking about this , an angel of the Lord appeared to him in a dream . The angel said , " Joseph , son of David , don't be afraid to take Mary home as your wife . The baby inside her is from the Holy Spirit .
40001021	She is going to have a son . You must give him the name Jesus . That is because he will save his people from their sins . "
40001022	All of this took place to bring about what the Lord had said would happen . He had said through the prophet ,
40001023	" The virgin is going to have a baby . She will give birth to a son . And he will be called Immanuel . " The name Immanuel means " God with us . "
40001024	Joseph woke up . He did what the angel of the Lord commanded him to do . He took Mary home as his wife .
40001025	But he did not make love to her until after she gave birth to a son . And Joseph gave him the name Jesus .
40002001	Jesus was born in Bethlehem in Judea . This happened while Herod was king of Judea . After Jesus' birth , Wise Men from the east came to Jerusalem .
40002002	They asked , " Where is the child who has been born to be king of the Jews ? When we were in the east , we saw his star . Now we have come to worship him . "
40002003	When King Herod heard about it , he was very upset . Everyone in Jerusalem was troubled too .
40002004	So Herod called together all the chief priests of the people . He also called the teachers of the law . He asked them where the Christ was going to be born .
40002005	" In Bethlehem in Judea , " they replied . " This is what the prophet has written . He said ,
40002006	" ' But you , Bethlehem , in the land of Judah , are certainly not the least important among the towns of Judah . A ruler will come out of you . He will be the shepherd of my people Israel . ' "
40002007	Then Herod called for the Wise Men secretly . He found out from them exactly when the star had appeared .
40002008	He sent them to Bethlehem . He said , " Go ! Make a careful search for the child . As soon as you find him , bring me a report . Then I can go and worship him too . "
40002009	After the Wise Men had listened to the king , they went on their way . The star they had seen when they were in the east went ahead of them . It finally stopped over the place where the child was .
40002010	When they saw the star , they were filled with joy .
40002011	The Wise Men went to the house . There they saw the child with his mother Mary . They bowed down and worshiped him . Then they opened their treasures . They gave him gold , incense and myrrh .
40002012	But God warned them in a dream not to go back to Herod . So they returned to their country on a different road .
40002013	When the Wise Men had left , Joseph had a dream . In the dream an angel of the Lord appeared to him . " Get up ! " the angel said . " Take the child and his mother and escape to Egypt . Stay there until I tell you to come back . Herod is going to search for the child . He wants to kill him . "
40002014	Joseph got up . During the night , he left for Egypt with the child and his mother Mary .
40002015	They stayed there until King Herod died . So the words the Lord had spoken through the prophet came true . He had said , " I chose to bring my son out of Egypt . "
40002016	Herod realized that the Wise Men had tricked him . So he became very angry . He gave orders concerning Bethlehem and the area around it . All the boys two years old and under were to be killed . This agreed with the time when the Wise Men had seen the star .
40002017	In this way , the words the prophet Jeremiah spoke came true . He had said ,
40002018	" A voice is heard in Ramah . It's the sound of crying and deep sadness . Rachel is crying over her children . She refuses to be comforted , because they are gone . "
40002019	After Herod died , Joseph had a dream while he was still in Egypt . In the dream an angel of the Lord appeared to him .
40002020	The angel said , " Get up ! Take the child and his mother . Go to the land of Israel . Those who were trying to kill the child are dead . "
40002021	So Joseph got up . He took the child and his mother Mary back to the land of Israel .
40002022	But then he heard that Archelaus was king of Judea . Archelaus was ruling in place of his father Herod . This made Joseph afraid to go there . Warned in a dream , Joseph went back to the land of Galilee instead .
40002023	There he lived in a town called Nazareth . So what the prophets had said about Jesus came true . They had said , " He will be called a Nazarene . "
40003001	In those days John the Baptist came and preached in the Desert of Judea .
40003002	He said , " Turn away from your sins ! The kingdom of heaven is near . "
40003003	John is the one the prophet Isaiah had spoken about . He had said , " A messenger is calling out in the desert , ' Prepare the way for the Lord . Make straight paths for him . ' "
40003004	John's clothes were made out of camel's hair . He had a leather belt around his waist . His food was locusts and wild honey .
40003005	People went out to him from Jerusalem and all of Judea . They also came from the whole area around the Jordan River .
40003006	When they admitted they had sinned , John baptized them in the Jordan .
40003007	John saw many Pharisees and Sadducees coming to where he was baptizing . He said to them , " You are like a nest of poisonous snakes ! Who warned you to escape the coming of God's anger ?
40003008	Produce fruit that shows you have turned away from your sins .
40003009	Don't think you can say to yourselves , ' Abraham is our father . ' I tell you , God can raise up children for Abraham even from these stones .
40003010	The ax is already lying at the roots of the trees . All the trees that don't produce good fruit will be cut down . They will be thrown into the fire .
40003011	" I baptize you with water , calling you to turn away from your sins . But after me , one will come who is more powerful than I am . And I'm not fit to carry his sandals . He will baptize you with the Holy Spirit and with fire .
40003012	His pitchfork is in his hand to clear the straw from his threshing floor . He will gather his wheat into the storeroom . But he will burn up the husks with fire that can't be put out . "
40003013	Jesus came from Galilee to the Jordan River . He wanted to be baptized by John .
40003014	But John tried to stop him . He told Jesus , " I need to be baptized by you . So why do you come to me ? "
40003015	Jesus replied , " Let it be this way for now . It is right for us to do this . It carries out God's holy plan . " Then John agreed .
40003016	As soon as Jesus was baptized , he came up out of the water . At that moment heaven was opened . Jesus saw the Spirit of God coming down on him like a dove .
40003017	A voice from heaven said , " This is my Son , and I love him . I am very pleased with him . "
40004001	The Holy Spirit led Jesus into the desert . There the devil tempted him .
40004002	After 40 days and 40 nights of going without eating , Jesus was hungry .
40004003	The tempter came to him . He said , " If you are the Son of God , tell these stones to become bread . "
40004004	Jesus answered , " It is written , ' Man doesn't live only on bread . He also lives on every word that comes from the mouth of God . ' "
40004005	Then the devil took Jesus to the holy city . He had him stand on the highest point of the temple .
40004006	" If you are the Son of God , " he said , " throw yourself down . It is written , " ' The Lord will command his angels to take good care of you . They will lift you up in their hands . Then you won't trip over a stone . ' "
40004007	Jesus answered him , " It is also written , ' Do not put the Lord your God to the test . ' "
40004008	Finally , the devil took Jesus to a very high mountain . He showed him all the kingdoms of the world and their glory .
40004009	" If you bow down and worship me , " he said , " I will give you all of this . "
40004010	Jesus said to him , " Get away from me , Satan ! It is written , ' Worship the Lord your God . He is the only one you should serve . ' "
40004011	Then the devil left Jesus . Angels came and took care of him .
40004012	John had been put in prison . When Jesus heard about this , he returned to Galilee .
40004013	Jesus left Nazareth . He went to live in the city of Capernaum . It was by the lake in the area of Zebulun and Naphtali .
40004014	In that way , what the prophet Isaiah had said came true . He had said ,
40004015	" Land of Zebulun ! Land of Naphtali ! Galilee , where non-Jewish people live ! Land along the Mediterranean Sea ! Territory east of the Jordan River !
40004016	The people who are now living in darkness will see a great light . They are now living in a very dark land . But a light will shine on them . "
40004017	From that time on Jesus began to preach . " Turn away from your sins ! " he said . " The kingdom of heaven is near . "
40004018	One day Jesus was walking beside the Sea of Galilee . There he saw two brothers . They were Simon Peter and his brother Andrew . They were throwing a net into the lake . They were fishermen .
40004019	" Come . Follow me , " Jesus said . " I will make you fishers of people . "
40004020	At once they left their nets and followed him .
40004021	Going on from there , he saw two other brothers . They were James , son of Zebedee , and his brother John . They were in a boat with their father Zebedee . As they were preparing their nets , Jesus called out to them .
40004022	Right away they left the boat and their father and followed Jesus .
40004023	Jesus went all over Galilee . There he taught in the synagogues . He preached the good news of God's kingdom . He healed every illness and sickness the people had .
40004024	News about him spread all over Syria . People brought to him all who were ill with different kinds of sicknesses . Some were suffering great pain . Others were controlled by demons . Some were shaking wildly . Others couldn't move at all . And Jesus healed all of them .
40004025	Large crowds followed him . Some people came from Galilee , from the area known as the Ten Cities , and from Jerusalem and Judea . Others came from the area across the Jordan River .
40005001	Jesus saw the crowds . So he went up on a mountainside and sat down . His disciples came to him .
40005002	Then he began to teach them . He said ,
40005003	" Blessed are those who are spiritually needy . The kingdom of heaven belongs to them .
40005004	Blessed are those who are sad . They will be comforted .
40005005	Blessed are those who are free of pride . They will be given the earth .
40005006	Blessed are those who are hungry and thirsty for what is right . They will be filled .
40005007	Blessed are those who show mercy . They will be shown mercy .
40005008	Blessed are those whose hearts are pure . They will see God .
40005009	Blessed are those who make peace . They will be called sons of God .
40005010	Blessed are those who suffer for doing what is right . The kingdom of heaven belongs to them .
40005011	" Blessed are you when people make fun of you and hurt you because of me . You are also blessed when they tell all kinds of evil lies about you because of me .
40005012	Be joyful and glad . Your reward in heaven is great . In the same way , people hurt the prophets who lived long ago .
40005013	" You are the salt of the earth . But suppose the salt loses its saltiness . How can it be made salty again ? It is no longer good for anything . It will be thrown out . People will walk all over it .
40005014	" You are the light of the world . A city on a hill can't be hidden .
40005015	Also , people do not light a lamp and put it under a bowl . Instead , they put it on its stand . Then it gives light to everyone in the house .
40005016	" In the same way , let your light shine in front of others . Then they will see the good things you do . And they will praise your Father who is in heaven .
40005017	" Do not think I have come to get rid of what is written in the Law or in the Prophets . I have not come to do that . Instead , I have come to give full meaning to what is written .
40005018	What I'm about to tell you is true . Heaven and earth will disappear before the smallest letter disappears from the Law . Not even the smallest stroke of a pen will disappear from the Law until everything is completed .
40005019	" Do not break even one of the least important commandments . And do not teach others to break them . If you do , you will be called the least important person in the kingdom of heaven . Instead , practice and teach these commands . Then you will be called important in the kingdom of heaven .
40005020	" Here is what I tell you . You must be more godly than the Pharisees and the teachers of the law . If you are not , you will certainly not enter the kingdom of heaven .
40005021	" You have heard what was said to people who lived long ago . They were told , ' Do not commit murder . Anyone who murders will be judged for it . '
40005022	But here is what I tell you . Do not be angry with your brother . Anyone who is angry with his brother will be judged . Again , anyone who says to his brother , ' Raca , ' must stand trial in the Sanhedrin . But anyone who says , ' You fool ! ' will be in danger of the fire in hell .
40005023	" Suppose you are offering your gift at the altar . And you remember that your brother has something against you .
40005024	Leave your gift in front of the altar . First go and make peace with your brother . Then come back and offer your gift .
40005025	" Suppose someone has a claim against you and is taking you to court . Settle the matter quickly . Do it while you are still with him on your way . If you don't , he may hand you over to the judge . The judge may hand you over to the officer . And you may be thrown into prison .
40005026	What I'm about to tell you is true . You will not get out until you have paid the very last penny !
40005027	" You have heard that it was said , ' Do not commit adultery . '
40005028	But here is what I tell you . Do not even look at a woman in the wrong way . Anyone who does has already committed adultery with her in his heart .
40005029	" If your right eye causes you to sin , poke it out and throw it away . Your eye is only one part of your body . It is better to lose it than for your whole body to be thrown into hell .
40005030	" If your right hand causes you to sin , cut it off and throw it away . Your hand is only one part of your body . It is better to lose it than for your whole body to go into hell .
40005031	" It has been said , ' Suppose a man divorces his wife . If he does , he must give her a letter of divorce . '
40005032	But here is what I tell you . Anyone who divorces his wife causes her to commit adultery . And anyone who gets married to the divorced woman commits adultery . A man may divorce his wife only if she has not been faithful to him .
40005033	" Again , you have heard what was said to your people long ago . They were told , ' Do not break the promises you make to the Lord . Keep the oaths you have made to him . '
40005034	But here is what I tell you . Do not make any promises like that at all . Do not make them in the name of heaven . That is God's throne .
40005035	Do not make them in the name of the earth . That is the stool for God's feet . Do not make them in the name of Jerusalem . That is the city of the Great King .
40005036	And do not take an oath in the name of your head . You can't make even one hair white or black .
40005037	" Just let your ' Yes' mean ' Yes . ' Let your ' No' mean ' No . ' Anything more than this comes from the evil one .
40005038	" You have heard that it was said , ' An eye must be put out for an eye . A tooth must be knocked out for a tooth . '
40005039	But here is what I tell you . Do not fight against an evil person . " Suppose someone hits you on your right cheek . Turn your other cheek to him also .
40005040	Suppose someone takes you to court to get your shirt . Let him have your coat also .
40005041	Suppose someone forces you to go one mile . Go two miles with him .
40005042	" Give to the one who asks you for something . Don't turn away from the one who wants to borrow something from you .
40005043	" You have heard that it was said , ' Love your neighbor . Hate your enemy . '
40005044	But here is what I tell you . Love your enemies . Pray for those who hurt you .
40005045	Then you will be sons of your Father who is in heaven . " He causes his sun to shine on evil people and good people . He sends rain on those who do right and those who don't .
40005046	" If you love those who love you , what reward will you get ? Even the tax collectors do that .
40005047	If you greet only your own people , what more are you doing than others ? Even people who are ungodly do that .
40005048	So be perfect , just as your Father in heaven is perfect .
40006001	" Be careful not to do ' good works' in front of others . Don't do them to be seen by others . If you do , your Father in heaven will not reward you .
40006002	" When you give to needy people , do not announce it by having trumpets blown . Do not be like those who only pretend to be holy . They announce what they do in the synagogues and on the streets . They want to be honored by others . What I'm about to tell you is true . They have received their complete reward .
40006003	" When you give to the needy , don't let your left hand know what your right hand is doing .
40006004	Then your giving will be done secretly . Your Father will reward you . He sees what you do secretly .
40006005	" When you pray , do not be like those who only pretend to be holy . They love to stand and pray in the synagogues and on the street corners . They want to be seen by others . What I'm about to tell you is true . They have received their complete reward .
40006006	" When you pray , go into your room . Close the door and pray to your Father , who can't be seen . He will reward you . Your Father sees what is done secretly .
40006007	" When you pray , do not keep talking on and on the way ungodly people do . They think they will be heard because they talk a lot .
40006008	Do not be like them . Your Father knows what you need even before you ask him .
40006009	" This is how you should pray . " ' Our Father in heaven , may your name be honored .
40006010	May your kingdom come . May what you want to happen be done on earth as it is done in heaven .
40006011	Give us today our daily bread .
40006012	Forgive us our sins , just as we also have forgiven those who sin against us .
40006013	Keep us from falling into sin when we are tempted . Save us from the evil one . '
40006014	" Forgive people when they sin against you . If you do , your Father who is in heaven will also forgive you .
40006015	But if you do not forgive people their sins , your Father will not forgive your sins .
40006016	" When you go without eating , do not look gloomy like those who only pretend to be holy . They make their faces very sad . They want to show people they are fasting . What I'm about to tell you is true . They have received their complete reward .
40006017	" But when you go without eating , put olive oil on your head . Wash your face .
40006018	Then others will not know that you are fasting . Only your Father , who can't be seen , will know it . He will reward you . Your Father sees what is done secretly .
40006019	" Do not put away riches for yourselves on earth . Moths and rust can destroy them . Thieves can break in and steal them .
40006020	Instead , put away riches for yourselves in heaven . There , moths and rust do not destroy them . There , thieves do not break in and steal them .
40006021	Your heart will be where your riches are .
40006022	" The eye is like a lamp for the body . Suppose your eyes are good . Then your whole body will be full of light .
40006023	But suppose your eyes are bad . Then your whole body will be full of darkness . If the light inside you is darkness , then it is very dark !
40006024	" No one can serve two masters at the same time . He will hate one of them and love the other . Or he will be faithful to one and dislike the other . You can't serve God and Money at the same time .
40006025	" I tell you , do not worry . Don't worry about your life and what you will eat or drink . And don't worry about your body and what you will wear . Isn't there more to life than eating ? Aren't there more important things for the body than clothes ?
40006026	" Look at the birds of the air . They don't plant or gather crops . They don't put away crops in storerooms . But your Father who is in heaven feeds them . Aren't you worth much more than they are ?
40006027	" Can you add even one hour to your life by worrying ?
40006028	" And why do you worry about clothes ? See how the wild flowers grow . They don't work or make clothing .
40006029	But here is what I tell you . Not even Solomon in all of his glory was dressed like one of those flowers .
40006030	" If that is how God dresses the wild grass , won't he dress you even better ? After all , the grass is here only today . Tomorrow it is thrown into the fire . Your faith is so small !
40006031	" So don't worry . Don't say , ' What will we eat ? ' Or , ' What will we drink ? ' Or , ' What will we wear ? '
40006032	People who are ungodly run after all of those things . Your Father who is in heaven knows that you need them .
40006033	" But put God's kingdom first . Do what he wants you to do . Then all of those things will also be given to you .
40006034	" So don't worry about tomorrow . Tomorrow will worry about itself . Each day has enough trouble of its own .
40007001	" Do not judge others . Then you will not be judged .
40007002	You will be judged in the same way you judge others . You will be measured in the same way you measure others .
40007003	" You look at the bit of sawdust in your friend's eye . But you pay no attention to the piece of wood in your own eye .
40007004	How can you say to your friend , ' Let me take the bit of sawdust out of your eye ' ? How can you say this while there is a piece of wood in your own eye ?
40007005	" You pretender ! First take the piece of wood out of your own eye . Then you will be able to see clearly to take the bit of sawdust out of your friend's eye .
40007006	" Do not give holy things to dogs . Do not throw your pearls to pigs . If you do , they might walk all over them . Then they might turn around and tear you to pieces .
40007007	" Ask , and it will be given to you . Search , and you will find . Knock , and the door will be opened to you .
40007008	Everyone who asks will receive . He who searches will find . The door will be opened to the one who knocks .
40007009	" Suppose your son asks for bread . Which of you will give him a stone ?
40007010	Or suppose he asks for a fish . Which of you will give him a snake ?
40007011	Even though you are evil , you know how to give good gifts to your children . How much more will your Father who is in heaven give good gifts to those who ask him !
40007012	" In everything , do to others what you would want them to do to you . This is what is written in the Law and in the Prophets .
40007013	" Enter God's kingdom through the narrow gate . The gate is large and the road is wide that lead to death and hell . Many people go that way .
40007014	But the gate is small and the road is narrow that lead to life . Only a few people find it .
40007015	" Watch out for false prophets . They come to you pretending to be sheep . But on the inside they are hungry wolves .
40007016	You can tell what they really are by what they do . " Do people pick grapes from bushes ? Do they pick figs from thorns ?
40007017	In the same way , every good tree bears good fruit . But a bad tree bears bad fruit .
40007018	A good tree can't bear bad fruit . And a bad tree can't bear good fruit .
40007019	Every tree that does not bear good fruit is cut down . It is thrown into the fire .
40007020	You can tell each tree by its fruit .
40007021	" Not everyone who says to me , ' Lord , Lord , ' will enter the kingdom of heaven . Only those who do what my Father in heaven wants will enter .
40007022	" Many will say to me on that day , ' Lord ! Lord ! Didn't we prophesy in your name ? Didn't we drive out demons in your name ? Didn't we do many miracles in your name ? '
40007023	Then I will tell them clearly , ' I never knew you . Get away from me , you who do evil ! '
40007024	" So then , everyone who hears my words and puts them into practice is like a wise man . He builds his house on the rock .
40007025	The rain comes down . The water rises . The winds blow and beat against that house . But it does not fall . It is built on the rock .
40007026	" But everyone who hears my words and does not put them into practice is like a foolish man . He builds his house on sand .
40007027	The rain comes down . The water rises . The winds blow and beat against that house . And it falls with a loud crash . "
40007028	Jesus finished saying all these things . The crowds were amazed at his teaching .
40007029	He taught like one who had authority . He did not speak like their teachers of the law .
40008001	Jesus came down from the mountainside . Large crowds followed him .
40008002	A man who had a skin disease came and got down on his knees in front of Jesus . He said , " Lord , if you are willing to make me ' clean , ' you can do it . "
40008003	Jesus reached out his hand and touched the man . " I am willing to do it , " he said . " Be ' clean ' ! " Right away the man was healed of his skin disease .
40008004	Then Jesus said to him , " Don't tell anyone . Go and show yourself to the priest . Offer the gift Moses commanded . It will be a witness to them . "
40008005	When Jesus entered Capernaum , a Roman commander came to him . He asked Jesus for help .
40008006	" Lord , " he said , " my servant lies at home and can't move . He is suffering terribly . "
40008007	Jesus said , " I will go and heal him . "
40008008	The commander replied , " Lord , I am not good enough to have you come into my house . But just say the word , and my servant will be healed .
40008009	I myself am a man under authority . And I have soldiers who obey my orders . I tell this one , ' Go , ' and he goes . I tell that one , ' Come , ' and he comes . I say to my servant , ' Do this , ' and he does it . "
40008010	When Jesus heard this , he was amazed . He said to those following him , " What I'm about to tell you is true . In Israel I have not found anyone whose faith is so strong .
40008011	" I say to you that many will come from the east and the west . They will take their places at the feast in the kingdom of heaven . They will sit with Abraham , Isaac and Jacob .
40008012	But those who think they belong to the kingdom will be thrown outside , into the darkness . There they will sob and grind their teeth . "
40008013	Then Jesus said to the Roman commander , " Go ! It will be done just as you believed it would . " And his servant was healed at that very hour .
40008014	When Jesus came into Peter's house , he saw Peter's mother-in-law . She was lying in bed . She had a fever .
40008015	Jesus touched her hand , and the fever left her . She got up and began to wait on him .

40013001	That same day Jesus left the house and sat by the Sea of Galilee .
40013002	Large crowds gathered around him . So he got into a boat . He sat down in it . All the people stood on the shore .
40013003	Then he told them many things by using stories . He said , " A farmer went out to plant his seed .
40013004	He scattered the seed on the ground . Some fell on a path . Birds came and ate it up .
40013005	Some seed fell on rocky places , where there wasn't much soil . The plants came up quickly , because the soil wasn't deep .
40013006	When the sun came up , it burned the plants . They dried up because they had no roots .
40013007	Other seed fell among thorns . The thorns grew up and crowded out the plants .
40013008	Still other seed fell on good soil . It produced a crop 100 , 60 or 30 times more than what was planted .
40013009	Those who have ears should listen . "
40013010	The disciples came to him . They asked , " Why do you use stories when you speak to the people ? "
40013011	He replied , " You have been given the chance to understand the secrets of the kingdom of heaven . It has not been given to outsiders .
40013012	Everyone who has that kind of knowledge will be given more . In fact , they will have very much . If anyone doesn't have that kind of knowledge , even what little he has will be taken away from him .
40013013	Here is why I use stories when I speak to the people . I say , " They look , but they don't really see . They listen , but they don't really hear or understand .
40013014	" In them the words of the prophet Isaiah come true . He said , " ' You will hear but never understand . You will see but never know what you are seeing .
40013015	The hearts of these people have become stubborn . They can barely hear with their ears . They have closed their eyes . Otherwise they might see with their eyes . They might hear with their ears . They might understand with their hearts . They might turn to the Lord , and then he would heal them . '
40013016	" But blessed are your eyes because they see . And blessed are your ears because they hear .
40013017	What I'm about to tell you is true . Many prophets and godly people wanted to see what you see . But they didn't see it . They wanted to hear what you hear . But they didn't hear it .
40013018	" Listen ! Here is the meaning of the story of the farmer .
40013019	People hear the message about the kingdom but do not understand it . Then the evil one comes . He steals what was planted in their hearts . Those people are like the seed planted on a path .
40013020	Others received the seed that fell on rocky places . They are those who hear the message and at once receive it with joy .
40013021	But they have no roots . So they last only a short time . They quickly fall away from the faith when trouble or suffering comes because of the message .
40013022	Others received the seed that fell among the thorns . They are those who hear the message . But then the worries of this life and the false promises of wealth crowd it out . They keep it from producing fruit .
40013023	But still others received the seed that fell on good soil . They are those who hear the message and understand it . They produce a crop 100 , 60 or 30 times more than the farmer planted . "
40013024	Jesus told the crowd another story . " Here is what the kingdom of heaven is like , " he said . " A man planted good seed in his field .
40013025	But while everyone was sleeping , his enemy came . The enemy planted weeds among the wheat and then went away .
40013026	The wheat began to grow and form grain . At the same time , weeds appeared .
40013027	" The owner's servants came to him . They said , ' Sir , didn't you plant good seed in your field ? Then where did the weeds come from ? '
40013028	" ' An enemy did this , ' he replied . " The servants asked him , ' Do you want us to go and pull the weeds up ? '
40013029	" ' No , ' the owner answered . ' While you are pulling up the weeds , you might pull up the wheat with them .
40013030	Let both grow together until the harvest . At that time I will tell the workers what to do . Here is what I will say to them . First collect the weeds . Tie them in bundles to be burned . Then gather the wheat . Bring it into my storeroom . ' "
40013031	Jesus told the crowd another story . He said , " The kingdom of heaven is like a mustard seed . Someone took the seed and planted it in a field .
40013032	It is the smallest of all your seeds . But when it grows , it is the largest of all garden plants . It becomes a tree . Birds come and rest in its branches . "
40013033	Jesus told them still another story . " The kingdom of heaven is like yeast , " he said . " A woman mixed it into a large amount of flour . The yeast worked its way all through the dough . "
40013034	Jesus spoke all these things to the crowd by using stories . He did not say anything to them without telling a story .
40013035	So the words spoken by the prophet came true . He had said , " I will open my mouth and tell stories . I will speak about things that were hidden since the world was made . "
40013036	Then Jesus left the crowd and went into the house . His disciples came to him . They said , " Explain to us the story of the weeds in the field . "
40013037	He answered , " The one who planted the good seed is the Son of Man .
40013038	The field is the world . The good seed stands for the people who belong to the kingdom . The weeds are the people who belong to the evil one .
40013039	The enemy who plants them is the devil . The harvest is judgment day . And the workers are angels .
40013040	" The weeds are pulled up and burned in the fire . That is how it will be on judgment day .
40013041	The Son of Man will send out his angels . They will weed out of his kingdom everything that causes sin . They will also get rid of all who do evil .
40013042	They will throw them into the blazing furnace . There people will sob and grind their teeth .
40013043	Then God's people will shine like the sun in their Father's kingdom . Those who have ears should listen .
40013044	" The kingdom of heaven is like treasure that was hidden in a field . When a man found it , he hid it again . He was very happy . So he went and sold everything he had . And he bought that field .
40013045	" Again , the kingdom of heaven is like a trader who was looking for fine pearls .
40013046	He found one that was very valuable . So he went away and sold everything he had . And he bought that pearl .
40013047	" Again , the kingdom of heaven is like a net . It was let down into the lake . It caught all kinds of fish .
40013048	When it was full , the fishermen pulled it up on the shore . Then they sat down and gathered the good fish into baskets . But they threw the bad fish away .
40013049	This is how it will be on judgment day . The angels will come . They will separate the people who did what is wrong from those who did what is right .
40013050	They will throw the evil people into the blazing furnace . There the evil ones will sob and grind their teeth .
40013051	" Do you understand all these things ? " Jesus asked . " Yes , " they replied .
40013052	He said to them , " Every teacher of the law who has been taught about the kingdom of heaven is like the owner of a house . He brings new treasures out of his storeroom as well as old ones . "

41003008	People heard about all that Jesus was doing . And many came to him . They came from Judea , Jerusalem , and Idumea . They came from the lands east of the Jordan River . And they came from the area around Tyre and Sidon .
41003009	Because of the crowd , Jesus told his disciples to get a small boat ready for him . This would keep the people from crowding him .
41003010	Jesus had healed many people . So those who were sick were pushing forward to touch him .
41003011	When people with evil spirits saw him , they fell down in front of him . The spirits shouted , " You are the Son of God ! "
41003012	But Jesus ordered them not to tell who he was .
41003013	Jesus went up on a mountainside . He called for certain people to come to him , and they came .
41003014	He appointed 12 of them and called them apostles . From that time on they would be with him . He would also send them out to preach .
41003015	They would have authority to drive out demons .
41003016	So Jesus appointed the Twelve . Simon was one of them . Jesus gave him the name Peter .
41003017	There were James , son of Zebedee , and his brother John . Jesus gave them the name Boanerges . Boanerges means Sons of Thunder .
41003018	There were also Andrew , Philip , Bartholomew , Matthew , Thomas , and James , son of Alphaeus . And there were Thaddaeus and Simon the Zealot .
41003019	Judas Iscariot was one of them too . He was the one who was later going to hand Jesus over to his enemies .
41003020	Jesus entered a house . Again a crowd gathered . It was so large that Jesus and his disciples were not even able to eat .
41003021	His family heard about this . So they went to take charge of him . They said , " He is out of his mind . "
41003022	Some teachers of the law were there . They had come down from Jerusalem . They said , " He is controlled by Beelzebub ! He is driving out demons by the power of the prince of demons . "
41003023	So Jesus called them over and spoke to them by using stories . He said , " How can Satan drive out Satan ?
41003024	If a kingdom fights against itself , it can't stand .
41003025	If a family is divided , it can't stand .
41003026	And if Satan fights against himself , and his helpers are divided , he can't stand . That is the end of him .
41003027	In fact , none of you can enter a strong man's house and just take what the man owns . You must first tie him up . Then you can rob his house .
41003028	" What I'm about to tell you is true . Everyone's sins and evil words against God will be forgiven .
41003029	But anyone who speaks evil things against the Holy Spirit will never be forgiven . His guilt will last forever . "
41003030	Jesus said this because the teachers of the law were saying , " He has an evil spirit . "
41003031	Jesus' mother and brothers came and stood outside . They sent someone in to get him .
41003032	A crowd was sitting around Jesus . They told him , " Your mother and your brothers are outside . They are looking for you . "
41003033	" Who is my mother ? Who are my brothers ? " he asked .
41003034	Then Jesus looked at the people sitting in a circle around him . He said , " Here is my mother ! Here are my brothers !
41003035	Anyone who does what God wants is my brother or sister or mother . "
41004001	Again Jesus began to teach by the Sea of Galilee . The crowd that gathered around him was very large . So he got into a boat . He sat down in it out on the lake . All the people were along the shore at the water's edge .
41004002	He taught them many things by using stories . In his teaching he said ,
41004003	" Listen ! A farmer went out to plant his seed .
41004004	He scattered the seed on the ground . Some fell on a path . Birds came and ate it up .
41004005	Some seed fell on rocky places , where there wasn't much soil . The plants came up quickly , because the soil wasn't deep .
41004006	When the sun came up , it burned the plants . They dried up because they had no roots .
41004007	Other seed fell among thorns . The thorns grew up and crowded out the plants . So the plants did not bear grain .
41004008	Still other seed fell on good soil . It grew up and produced a crop 30 , 60 , or even 100 times more than the farmer planted . "
41004009	Then Jesus said , " Those who have ears should listen . "
41004010	Later Jesus was alone . The Twelve asked him about the stories . So did the others around him .
41004011	He told them , " The secret of God's kingdom has been given to you . But to outsiders everything is told by using stories .
41004012	In that way , " ' They will see but never know what they are seeing . They will hear but never understand . Otherwise they might turn and be forgiven ! ' "
41004013	Then Jesus said to them , " Don't you understand this story ? Then how will you understand any stories of this kind ?
41004014	The seed the farmer plants is God's message .
41004015	What is seed scattered on a path like ? The message is planted . The people hear the message . Then Satan comes . He takes away the message that was planted in them .
41004016	And what is seed scattered on rocky places like ? The people hear the message . At once they receive it with joy .
41004017	But they have no roots . So they last only a short time . They quickly fall away from the faith when trouble or suffering comes because of the message .
41004018	And what is seed scattered among thorns like ? The people hear the message .
41004019	But then the worries of this life come to them . Wealth comes with its false promises . The people also long for other things . All of those are the kinds of things that crowd out the message . They keep it from producing fruit .
41004020	And what is seed scattered on good soil like ? The people hear the message . They accept it . They produce a good crop 30 , 60 , or even 100 times more than the farmer planted . "
41004021	Jesus said to them , " Do you bring in a lamp to put it under a large bowl or a bed ? Don't you put it on its stand ?
41004022	What is hidden is meant to be seen . And what is put out of sight is meant to be brought out into the open .
41004023	Everyone who has ears should listen . "
41004024	" Think carefully about what you hear , " he said . " As you give , so you will receive . In fact , you will receive even more .
41004025	If you have something , you will be given more . If you have nothing , even what you have will be taken away from you . "
41004026	Jesus also said , " Here is what God's kingdom is like . A farmer scatters seed on the ground .
41004027	Night and day the seed comes up and grows . It happens whether the farmer sleeps or gets up . He doesn't know how it happens .
41004028	All by itself the soil produces grain . First the stalk comes up . Then the head appears . Finally , the full grain appears in the head .
41004029	Before long the grain ripens . So the farmer cuts it down , because the harvest is ready . "
41004030	Again Jesus said , " What can we say God's kingdom is like ? What story can we use to explain it ?
41004031	It is like a mustard seed , which is the smallest seed planted in the ground .
41004032	But when you plant the seed , it grows . It becomes the largest of all garden plants . Its branches are so big that birds can rest in its shade . "
41004033	Using many stories like those , Jesus spoke the word to them . He told them as much as they could understand .
41004034	He did not say anything to them without using a story . But when he was alone with his disciples , he explained everything .
41004035	When evening came , Jesus said to his disciples , " Let's go over to the other side of the lake . "
41004036	They left the crowd behind . And they took him along in a boat , just as he was . There were also other boats with him .
41004037	A wild storm came up . Waves crashed over the boat . It was about to sink .
41004038	Jesus was in the back , sleeping on a cushion . The disciples woke him up . They said , " Teacher ! Don't you care if we drown ? "
41004039	He got up and ordered the wind to stop . He said to the waves , " Quiet ! Be still ! " Then the wind died down . And it was completely calm .
41004040	He said to his disciples , " Why are you so afraid ? Don't you have any faith at all yet ? "
41004041	They were terrified . They asked each other , " Who is this ? Even the wind and the waves obey him ! "
41005001	They went across the Sea of Galilee to the area of the Gerasenes .
41005002	Jesus got out of the boat . A man with an evil spirit came from the tombs to meet him .
41005003	The man lived in the tombs . No one could keep him tied up anymore . Not even a chain could hold him .
41005004	His hands and feet had often been chained . But he tore the chains apart . And he broke the iron cuffs on his ankles . No one was strong enough to control him .
41005005	Night and day he screamed among the tombs and in the hills . He cut himself with stones .
41005006	When he saw Jesus a long way off , he ran to him . He fell on his knees in front of him .
41005007	He shouted at the top of his voice , " Jesus , Son of the Most High God , what do you want with me ? Promise before God that you won't hurt me ! "
41005008	This was because Jesus had said to him , " Come out of this man , you evil spirit ! "
41005009	Then Jesus asked the demon , " What is your name ? " " My name is Legion , " he replied . " There are many of us . "
41005010	And he begged Jesus again and again not to send them out of the area .
41005011	A large herd of pigs was feeding on the nearby hillside .
41005012	The demons begged Jesus , " Send us among the pigs . Let us go into them . "
41005013	Jesus allowed it . The evil spirits came out of the man and went into the pigs . There were about 2,000 pigs in the herd . The whole herd rushed down the steep bank . They ran into the lake and drowned .
41005014	Those who were tending the pigs ran off . They told the people in the town and countryside what had happened . The people went out to see for themselves .
41005015	Then they came to Jesus . They saw the man who had been controlled by many demons . He was sitting there . He was now dressed and thinking clearly . All this made the people afraid .
41005016	Those who had seen it told them what had happened to the man . They told about the pigs as well .
41005017	Then the people began to beg Jesus to leave their area .
41005018	Jesus was getting into the boat . The man who had been controlled by demons begged to go with him .
41005019	Jesus did not let him . He said , " Go home to your family . Tell them how much the Lord has done for you . Tell them how kind he has been to you . "
41005020	So the man went away . In the area known as the Ten Cities , he began to tell how much Jesus had done for him . And all the people were amazed .
41005021	Jesus went across the Sea of Galilee in a boat . It landed at the other side . There a large crowd gathered around him .
41005022	Then a man named Jairus came . He was a synagogue ruler . Seeing Jesus , he fell at his feet .
41005023	He begged Jesus , " Please come . My little daughter is dying . Place your hands on her to heal her . Then she will live . "
41005024	So Jesus went with him . A large group of people followed . They crowded around him .
41005025	A woman was there who had a sickness that made her bleed . It had lasted for 12 years .
41005026	She had suffered a great deal , even though she had gone to many doctors . She had spent all the money she had . But she was getting worse , not better .
41005027	Then she heard about Jesus . She came up behind him in the crowd and touched his clothes .
41005028	She thought , " I just need to touch his clothes . Then I will be healed . "
41005029	Right away her bleeding stopped . She felt in her body that her suffering was over .
41005030	At once Jesus knew that power had gone out from him . He turned around in the crowd . He asked , " Who touched my clothes ? "
41005031	" You see the people , " his disciples answered . " They are crowding against you . And you still ask , ' Who touched me ? ' "
41005032	But Jesus kept looking around . He wanted to see who had touched him .
41005033	Then the woman came and fell at his feet . She knew what had happened to her . She was shaking with fear . But she told him the whole truth .
41005034	He said to her , " Dear woman , your faith has healed you . Go in peace . You are free from your suffering . "
41005035	While Jesus was still speaking , some people came from the house of Jairus . He was the synagogue ruler . " Your daughter is dead , " they said . " Why bother the teacher anymore ? "
41005036	But Jesus didn't listen to them . He told the synagogue ruler , " Don't be afraid . Just believe . "
41005037	He let only Peter , James , and John , the brother of James , follow him .
41005038	They came to the home of the synagogue ruler . There Jesus saw a lot of confusion . People were crying and sobbing loudly .
41005039	He went inside . Then he said to them , " Why all this confusion and sobbing ? The child is not dead . She is only sleeping . "
41005040	But they laughed at him . He made them all go outside . He took only the child's father and mother and the disciples who were with him . And he went in where the child was .
41005041	He took her by the hand . Then he said to her , " Talitha koum ! " This means , " Little girl , I say to you , get up ! "
41005042	The girl was 12 years old . Right away she stood up and walked around . They were totally amazed at this .
41005043	Jesus gave strict orders not to let anyone know what had happened . And he told them to give her something to eat .
41006001	Jesus left there and went to his hometown of Nazareth . His disciples went with him .
41006002	When the Sabbath day came , he began to teach in the synagogue . Many who heard him were amazed . " Where did this man get these things ? " they asked . " What's this wisdom that has been given to him ? He even does miracles !
41006003	Isn't this the carpenter ? Isn't this Mary's son ? Isn't this the brother of James , Joseph , Judas and Simon ? Aren't his sisters here with us ? " They were not pleased with him at all .
41006004	Jesus said to them , " A prophet is not honored in his hometown . He doesn't receive any honor among his relatives . And he doesn't receive any in his own home . "
41006005	Jesus laid his hands on a few sick people and healed them . But he could not do any other miracles there .
41006006	He was amazed because they had no faith . Jesus went around teaching from village to village .
41006007	He called the Twelve to him . Then he sent them out two by two . He gave them authority to drive out evil spirits .
41006008	Here were his orders . " Take only a walking stick for your trip . Do not take bread or a bag . Take no money in your belts .
41006009	Wear sandals . But do not take extra clothes .
41006010	When you are invited into a house , stay there until you leave town .
41006011	Some places may not welcome you or listen to you . If they don't , shake the dust off your feet when you leave . That will be a witness against the people living there . "

41006015	Others said , " He is Elijah . " Still others claimed , " He is a prophet . He is like one of the prophets of long ago . "

41006017	In fact , it was Herod himself who had given orders to arrest John . He had him tied up and put in prison . He did this because of Herodias . She was the wife of Herod's brother Philip . But now Herod was married to her .
41006018	John had been saying to Herod , " It is against the Law for you to have your brother's wife . "
41006019	Herodias held that against John . She wanted to kill him . But she could not ,
41006020	because Herod was afraid of John . So he kept John safe . Herod knew John was a holy man who did what was right . When Herod heard him , he was very puzzled . But he liked to listen to him .
41006021	Finally the right time came . Herod gave a big dinner on his birthday . He invited his high officials and military leaders . He also invited the most important men in Galilee .
41006022	Then the daughter of Herodias came in and danced . She pleased Herod and his dinner guests . The king said to the girl , " Ask me for anything you want . I'll give it to you . "
41006023	And he promised her with an oath , " Anything you ask for I will give you . I'll give you up to half of my kingdom . "
41006024	She went out and said to her mother , " What should I ask for ? " " The head of John the Baptist , " she answered .
41006025	At once the girl hurried to ask the king . She said , " I want you to give me the head of John the Baptist on a big plate right now . "
41006026	The king was very upset . But he thought of his promise and his dinner guests . So he did not want to say no to the girl .
41006027	He sent a man right away to bring John's head . The man went to the prison and cut off John's head .
41006028	He brought it back on a big plate . He gave it to the girl , and she gave it to her mother .
41006029	John's disciples heard about this . So they came and took his body . Then they placed it in a tomb .
41006030	The apostles gathered around Jesus . They told him all they had done and taught .
41006031	But many people were coming and going . So they did not even have a chance to eat . Then Jesus said to his apostles , " Come with me by yourselves to a quiet place . You need to get some rest . "
41006032	So they went away by themselves in a boat to a quiet place .
41006033	But many people who saw them leaving recognized them . They ran from all the towns and got there ahead of them .
41006034	When Jesus came ashore , he saw a large crowd . He felt deep concern for them . They were like sheep without a shepherd . So he began teaching them many things .
41006035	By that time it was late in the day . His disciples came to him . " There is nothing here , " they said . " It's already very late .
41006036	Send the people away . They can go and buy something to eat in the nearby countryside and villages . "
41006037	But Jesus answered , " You give them something to eat . " They said to him , " That would take eight months of a person's pay ! Should we go and spend that much on bread ? Are we supposed to feed them ? "
41006038	" How many loaves do you have ? " Jesus asked . " Go and see . " When they found out , they said , " Five loaves and two fish . "
41006039	Then Jesus directed them to have all the people sit down in groups on the green grass .
41006040	So they sat down in groups of 100s and 50s .
41006041	Jesus took the five loaves and the two fish . He looked up to heaven and gave thanks . He broke the loaves into pieces . Then he gave them to his disciples to set in front of the people . He also divided the two fish among them all .
41006042	All of them ate and were satisfied .
41006043	The disciples picked up 12 baskets of broken pieces of bread and fish .
41006044	The number of men who had eaten was 5,000 .
41006045	Right away Jesus made his disciples get into the boat . He had them go on ahead of him to Bethsaida . Then he sent the crowd away .
41006046	After leaving them , he went up on a mountainside to pray .
41006047	When evening came , the boat was in the middle of the Sea of Galilee . Jesus was alone on land .
41006048	He saw the disciples pulling hard on the oars . The wind was blowing against them . Early in the morning , he went out to them . He walked on the lake . When he was about to pass by them ,
41006049	they saw him walking on the lake . They thought he was a ghost . They cried out .
41006050	They all saw him and were terrified . Right away he said to them , " Be brave ! It is I . Don't be afraid . "
41006051	Then he climbed into the boat with them . The wind died down . And they were completely amazed .
41006052	They had not understood about the loaves . They were stubborn .
41006053	They crossed over the lake and landed at Gennesaret . There they tied up the boat .
41006054	As soon as Jesus and his disciples got out , people recognized him .
41006055	They ran through that whole area to bring to him those who were sick . They carried them on mats to where they heard he was .
41006056	He went into the villages , the towns and the countryside . Everywhere he went , the people brought the sick to the market places . Those who were sick begged him to let them touch just the edge of his clothes . And all who touched him were healed .
41007001	The Pharisees gathered around Jesus . So did some of the teachers of the law . All of them had come from Jerusalem .
41007002	They saw some of his disciples eating food with " unclean " hands . That means they were not washed .
41007003	The Pharisees and all the Jews do not eat unless they wash their hands to make them pure . That's what the elders teach .
41007004	When they come from the market place , they do not eat unless they wash . And they follow many other teachings . For example , they wash cups , pitchers , and kettles in a special way .
41007005	So the Pharisees and the teachers of the law questioned Jesus . " Why don't your disciples live by what the elders teach ? " they asked . " Why do they eat their food with ' unclean ' hands ? "
41007006	He replied , " Isaiah was right . He prophesied about you people who pretend to be good . He said , " ' These people honor me by what they say . But their hearts are far away from me .
41007007	Their worship doesn't mean anything to me . They teach nothing but human rules . '
41007008	You have let go of God's commands . And you are holding on to the teachings that men have made up . "

41007011	But you allow people to say to their parents , ' Any help you might have received from us is Corban . '
41007012	So you no longer let them do anything for their parents .

41007021	Evil thoughts come from the inside , from people's hearts . So do sexual sins , stealing and murder . Adultery ,
41007022	greed , hate and cheating come from people's hearts too . So do desires that are not pure , and wanting what belongs to others . And so do telling lies about others and being proud and being foolish .
41007023	All those evil things come from inside a person . They make him ' unclean . ' "
41007024	Jesus went from there to a place near Tyre . He entered a house . He did not want anyone to know where he was . But he could not keep it a secret .

41008001	During those days another large crowd gathered . They had nothing to eat . So Jesus called for his disciples to come to him . He said ,

41008022	Jesus and his disciples came to Bethsaida . Some people brought a blind man . They begged Jesus to touch him .

41008034	Jesus called the crowd to him along with his disciples . He said , " If anyone wants to come after me , he must say no to himself . He must pick up his cross and follow me .

41014016	The disciples left and went into the city . They found things just as Jesus had told them . So they prepared the Passover meal .
41014017	When evening came , Jesus arrived with the Twelve .
41014018	While they were at the table eating , Jesus said , " What I'm about to tell you is true . One of you who is eating with me will hand me over to my enemies . "

41014022	While they were eating , Jesus took bread . He gave thanks and broke it . He handed it to his disciples and said , " Take it . This is my body . "

41014024	" This is my blood of the new covenant , " he said to them . " It is poured out for many .
41014025	What I'm about to tell you is true . I won't drink wine with you again until the day I drink it in God's kingdom . "

41014028	But after I rise from the dead , I will go ahead of you into Galilee . "
41014029	Peter said , " All the others may turn away . But I will not . "
41014030	" What I'm about to tell you is true , " Jesus answered . " It will happen today , this very night . Before the rooster crows twice , you yourself will say three times that you don't know me . "
41014031	But Peter would not give in . He said , " I may have to die with you . But I will never say I don't know you . " And all the others said the same thing .
41014032	Jesus and his disciples went to a place called Gethsemane . Jesus said to them , " Sit here while I pray . "
41014033	He took Peter , James and John along with him . He began to be very upset and troubled .
41014034	" My soul is very sad . I feel close to death , " he said to them . " Stay here . Keep watch . "
41014035	He went a little farther . Then he fell to the ground . He prayed that , if possible , the hour might pass by him .
41014036	[ " Abba ] , " he said , " everything is possible for you . Take this cup of suffering away from me . But let what you want be done , not what I want . " Abba means Father .
41014037	Then he returned to his disciples and found them sleeping . " Simon , " he said to Peter , " are you asleep ? Couldn't you keep watch for one hour ?
41014038	Watch and pray . Then you won't fall into sin when you are tempted . The spirit is willing . But the body is weak . "
41014039	Once more Jesus went away and prayed the same thing .
41014040	Then he came back . Again he found them sleeping . They couldn't keep their eyes open . They did not know what to say to him .
41014041	Jesus returned the third time . He said to them , " Are you still sleeping and resting ? Enough ! The hour has come . Look ! The Son of Man is about to be handed over to sinners .
41014042	Get up ! Let us go ! Here comes the one who is handing me over to them ! "
41014043	Just as Jesus was speaking , Judas appeared . He was one of the Twelve . A crowd was with him . They were carrying swords and clubs . The chief priests , the teachers of the law , and the elders had sent them .
41014044	Judas , who was going to hand Jesus over , had arranged a signal with them . " The one I kiss is the man , " he said . " Arrest him and have the guards lead him away . "
41014045	So Judas went to Jesus at once . He said , " Rabbi ! " And he kissed him .
41014046	The men grabbed Jesus and arrested him .
41014047	Then one of those standing nearby pulled his sword out . He struck the servant of the high priest and cut off his ear .
41014048	" Am I leading a band of armed men against you ? " asked Jesus . " Do you have to come out with swords and clubs to capture me ?
41014049	Every day I was with you . I taught in the temple courtyard , and you didn't arrest me . But the Scriptures must come true . "
41014050	Then everyone left him and ran away .
41014051	A young man was following Jesus . The man was wearing nothing but a piece of linen cloth . When the crowd grabbed him ,
41014052	he ran away naked . He left his clothing behind .
41014053	The crowd took Jesus to the high priest . All of the chief priests , the elders , and the teachers of the law came together .
41014054	Not too far away , Peter followed Jesus . He went right into the courtyard of the high priest . There he sat with the guards . He warmed himself at the fire .
41014055	The chief priests and the whole Sanhedrin were looking for something to use against Jesus . They wanted to put him to death . But they did not find any proof .
41014056	Many witnesses lied about him . But their stories did not agree .
41014057	Then some stood up . They gave false witness about him .
41014058	" We heard him say , ' I will destroy this temple made by human hands . In three days I will build another temple , not made by human hands . ' "
41014059	But what they said did not agree .
41014060	Then the high priest stood up in front of them . He asked Jesus , " Aren't you going to answer ? What are these charges these men are bringing against you ? "
41014061	But Jesus remained silent . He gave no answer . Again the high priest asked him , " Are you the Christ ? Are you the Son of the Blessed One ? "
41014062	" I am , " said Jesus . " And you will see the Son of Man sitting at the right hand of the Mighty One . You will see the Son of Man coming on the clouds of heaven . "
41014063	The high priest tore his clothes . " Why do we need any more witnesses ? " he asked .
41014064	" You have heard him say a very evil thing against God . What do you think ? " They all found him guilty and said he must die .
41014065	Then some began to spit at him . They blindfolded him . They hit him with their fists . They said , " Prophesy ! " And the guards took him and beat him .
41014066	Peter was below in the courtyard . One of the high priest's female servants came by .
41014067	When she saw Peter warming himself , she looked closely at him . " You also were with Jesus , that Nazarene , " she said .
41014068	But Peter said he had not been with him . " I don't know or understand what you're talking about , " he said . He went out to the entrance to the courtyard .
41014069	The servant saw him there . She said again to those standing around , " This fellow is one of them . "
41014070	Again he said he was not . After a little while , those standing nearby said to Peter , " You must be one of them . You are from Galilee . "
41014071	He began to call down curses on himself . He took an oath and said to them , " I don't know this man you're talking about ! "

41015001	It was very early in the morning . The chief priests , with the elders , the teachers of the law , and the whole Sanhedrin , made a decision . They tied Jesus up and led him away . Then they handed him over to Pilate .
41015002	" Are you the king of the Jews ? " asked Pilate . " Yes . It is just as you say , " Jesus replied .
41015003	The chief priests brought many charges against him .
41015004	So Pilate asked him again , " Aren't you going to answer ? See how many things they charge you with . "
41015005	But Jesus still did not reply . Pilate was amazed .
41015006	It was the usual practice at the Passover Feast to let one prisoner go free . The people could choose the one they wanted .
41015007	A man named Barabbas was in prison . He was there with some other people who had fought against the country's rulers . They had committed murder while they were fighting against the rulers .
41015008	The crowd came up and asked Pilate to do for them what he usually did .
41015009	" Do you want me to let the king of the Jews go free ? " asked Pilate .
41015010	He knew that the chief priests had handed Jesus over to him because they were jealous .
41015011	But the chief priests stirred up the crowd . So the crowd asked Pilate to let Barabbas go free instead .
41015012	" Then what should I do with the one you call the king of the Jews ? " Pilate asked them .
41015013	" Crucify him ! " the crowd shouted .
41015014	" Why ? What wrong has he done ? " asked Pilate . But they shouted even louder , " Crucify him ! "
41015015	Pilate wanted to satisfy the crowd . So he let Barabbas go free . He ordered that Jesus be whipped . Then he handed him over to be nailed to a cross .
41015016	The soldiers led Jesus away into the palace . It was called the Praetorium . They called together the whole company of soldiers .
41015017	The soldiers put a purple robe on Jesus . Then they twisted thorns together to make a crown . They placed it on his head .
41015018	They began to call out to him , " We honor you , king of the Jews ! "
41015019	Again and again they hit him on the head with a stick . They spit on him . They fell on their knees and pretended to honor him .
41015020	After they had made fun of him , they took off the purple robe . They put his own clothes back on him . Then they led him out to nail him to a cross .
41015021	A man named Simon from Cyrene was passing by . He was the father of Alexander and Rufus . Simon was on his way in from the country . The soldiers forced him to carry the cross .
41015022	They brought Jesus to the place called Golgotha . The word Golgotha means The Place of the Skull .
41015023	Then they gave him wine mixed with spices . But he did not take it .
41015024	They nailed him to the cross . Then they divided up his clothes . They cast lots to see what each of them would get .
41015025	It was nine o'clock in the morning when they crucified him .
41015026	They wrote out the charge against him . It read , the king of the jews .
41015029	Those who passed by shouted at Jesus and made fun of him . They shook their heads and said , " So you are going to destroy the temple and build it again in three days ?
41015030	Then come down from the cross ! Save yourself ! "
41015031	In the same way the chief priests and the teachers of the law made fun of him among themselves . " He saved others , " they said . " But he can't save himself !
41015032	Let this Christ , this King of Israel , come down now from the cross ! When we see that , we will believe . " Those who were being crucified with Jesus also made fun of him .
41015033	At noon , darkness covered the whole land . It lasted three hours .
41015034	At three o'clock Jesus cried out in a loud voice , " Eloi , Eloi , lama sabachthani ? " This means " My God , my God , why have you deserted me ? "
41015035	Some of those standing nearby heard Jesus cry out . They said , " Listen ! He's calling for Elijah . "

41015041	In Galilee those women had followed Jesus . They had taken care of his needs . Many other women were also there . They had come up with him to Jerusalem .
41015042	It was the day before the Sabbath . That day was called Preparation Day . As evening approached ,
41015043	Joseph went boldly to Pilate and asked for Jesus' body . Joseph was from the town of Arimathea . He was a leading member of the Jewish Council . He was waiting for God's kingdom .
41015044	Pilate was surprised to hear that Jesus was already dead . So he called for the Roman commander . He asked him if Jesus had already died .
41015045	The commander said it was true . So Pilate gave the body to Joseph .

41015047	Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joses saw where Jesus' body had been placed .
41016001	The Sabbath day ended . Mary Magdalene , Mary the mother of James , and Salome bought spices . They were going to apply them to Jesus' body .
41016002	Very early on the first day of the week , they were on their way to the tomb . It was just after sunrise .

41016004	Then they looked up and saw that the stone had been rolled away . The stone was very large .

41016006	" Don't be alarmed , " he said . " You are looking for Jesus the Nazarene , who was crucified . But he has risen ! He is not here ! See the place where they had put him .

41016008	The women were shaking and confused . They went out and ran away from the tomb . They said nothing to anyone , because they were afraid .

41016018	They will pick up snakes with their hands . And when they drink deadly poison , it will not hurt them at all . They will place their hands on sick people . And the people will get well . "
41016019	When the Lord Jesus finished speaking to them , he was taken up into heaven . He sat down at the right hand of God .
41016020	Then the disciples went out and preached everywhere . The Lord worked with them . And he backed up his word by the signs that went with it .
42001001	Many people have attempted to write about the things that have taken place among us .
42001002	Reports of these things were handed down to us . There were people who saw these things for themselves from the beginning and then passed the word on .
42001003	I myself have carefully looked into everything from the beginning . So it seemed good also to me to write down an orderly report of exactly what happened . I am doing this for you , most excellent Theophilus .
42001004	I want you to know that the things you have been taught are true .
42001005	Herod was king of Judea . During the time he was ruling , there was a priest named Zechariah . He belonged to a group of priests named after Abijah . His wife Elizabeth also came from the family line of Aaron .
42001006	Both of them did what was right in God's eyes . They obeyed all the Lord's commandments and rules faithfully .
42001007	But they had no children , because Elizabeth was not able to have any . And they were both very old .
42001008	One day Zechariah's group was on duty . He was serving as a priest in God's temple .
42001009	He happened to be chosen , in the usual way , to go into the temple of the Lord . There he was supposed to burn incense .
42001010	The time came for this to be done . All who had gathered to worship were praying outside .
42001011	Then an angel of the Lord appeared to Zechariah . The angel was standing at the right side of the incense altar .
42001012	When Zechariah saw him , he was amazed and terrified .
42001013	But the angel said to him , " Do not be afraid , Zechariah . Your prayer has been heard . Your wife Elizabeth will have a child . It will be a boy , and you must name him John .
42001014	He will be a joy and delight to you . His birth will make many people very glad .
42001015	He will be important in the Lord's eyes . " He must never use wine or other such drinks . He will be filled with the Holy Spirit from the time he is born .
42001016	He will bring many of Israel's people back to the Lord their God .
42001017	And he will prepare the way for the Lord . He will have the same spirit and power that Elijah had . He will teach parents how to love their children . He will also teach people who don't obey to be wise and do what is right . In this way , he will prepare a people who are ready for the Lord . "
42001018	Zechariah asked the angel , " How can I be sure of this ? I am an old man , and my wife is old too . "
42001019	The angel answered , " I am Gabriel . I serve God . I have been sent to speak to you and to tell you this good news .
42001020	And now you will have to be silent . You will not be able to speak until after John is born . That's because you did not believe my words . They will come true when the time is right . "
42001021	During that time , the people were waiting for Zechariah to come out . They wondered why he stayed in the temple so long .
42001022	When he came out , he could not speak to them . They realized he had seen a vision in the temple . They knew this because he kept motioning to them . He still could not speak .
42001023	When his time of service was over , he returned home .
42001024	After that , his wife Elizabeth became pregnant . She stayed at home for five months .
42001025	" The Lord has done this for me , " she said . " In these days , he has been kind to me . He has taken away my shame among the people . "
42001026	In the sixth month after Elizabeth had become pregnant , God sent the angel Gabriel to Nazareth , a town in Galilee .
42001027	He was sent to a virgin . The girl was engaged to a man named Joseph . He came from the family line of David . The virgin's name was Mary .
42001028	The angel greeted her and said , " The Lord has given you special favor . He is with you . "
42001029	Mary was very upset because of his words . She wondered what kind of greeting this could be .
42001030	But the angel said to her , " Do not be afraid , Mary . God is very pleased with you .
42001031	You will become pregnant and give birth to a son . You must name him Jesus .
42001032	He will be great and will be called the Son of the Most High God . The Lord God will make him a king like his father David of long ago .
42001033	He will rule forever over his people , who came from Jacob's family . His kingdom will never end . "
42001034	" How can this happen ? " Mary asked the angel . " I am a virgin . "
42001035	The angel answered , " The Holy Spirit will come to you . The power of the Most High God will cover you . So the holy one that is born will be called the Son of God .
42001036	Your relative Elizabeth is old . And even she is going to have a child . People thought she could not have children . But she has been pregnant for six months now .
42001037	Nothing is impossible with God . "
42001038	" I serve the Lord , " Mary answered . " May it happen to me just as you said it would . " Then the angel left her .
42001039	At that time Mary got ready and hurried to a town in Judea's hill country .
42001040	There she entered Zechariah's home and greeted Elizabeth .
42001041	When Elizabeth heard Mary's greeting , the baby inside her jumped . And Elizabeth was filled with the Holy Spirit .
42001042	In a loud voice she called out , " God has blessed you more than other women . And blessed is the child you will have !
42001043	But why is God so kind to me ? Why has the mother of my Lord come to me ?
42001044	As soon as I heard the sound of your voice , the baby inside me jumped for joy .
42001045	You are a woman God has blessed . You have believed that what the Lord has said to you will be done ! "
42001046	Mary said , " My soul gives glory to the Lord .
42001047	My spirit delights in God my Savior .
42001048	He has taken note of me even though I am not important . From now on all people will call me blessed .
42001049	The Mighty One has done great things for me . His name is holy .
42001050	He shows his mercy to those who have respect for him , from parent to child down through the years .
42001051	He has done mighty things with his arm . He has scattered those who are proud in their deepest thoughts .
42001052	He has brought down rulers from their thrones . But he has lifted up people who are not important .
42001053	He has filled those who are hungry with good things . But he has sent those who are rich away empty .
42001054	He has helped the people of Israel , who serve him . He has always remembered to be kind
42001055	to Abraham and his children down through the years . He has done it just as he said to our people of long ago . "

42001057	The time came for Elizabeth to have her baby . She gave birth to a son .
42001058	Her neighbors and relatives heard that the Lord had been very kind to her . They shared her joy .
42001059	On the eighth day , they came to have the child circumcised . They were going to name him Zechariah , like his father .
42001060	But his mother spoke up . " No ! " she said . " He must be called John . "
42001061	They said to her , " No one among your relatives has that name . "

42001067	His father Zechariah was filled with the Holy Spirit . He prophesied ,

42001069	He has acted with great power and has saved us . He did it for those who are from the family line of his servant David .
42001070	Long ago holy prophets said he would do it .
42001071	He has saved us from our enemies . We are rescued from all who hate us .

42001073	He made an oath to our father Abraham .
42001074	He promised to save us from our enemies , so that we could serve him without fear .
42001075	He wants us to be holy and godly as long as we live .
