42001077	You will tell his people how they can be saved . You will tell them that their sins can be forgiven .
42001078	All of that will happen because our God is tender and caring . His kindness will bring the rising sun to us from heaven .
42001079	It will shine on those living in darkness and in the shadow of death . It will guide our feet on the path of peace . "
42001080	The child grew up , and his spirit became strong . He lived in the desert until he appeared openly to Israel .
42002001	In those days , Caesar Augustus made a law . It required that a list be made of everyone in the whole Roman world .
42002002	It was the first time a list was made of the people while Quirinius was governor of Syria .
42002003	All went to their own towns to be listed .

42002005	He went there with Mary to be listed . Mary was engaged to him . She was expecting a baby .
42002006	While Joseph and Mary were there , the time came for the child to be born .
42002007	She gave birth to her first baby . It was a boy . She wrapped him in large strips of cloth . Then she placed him in a manger . There was no room for them in the inn .
42002008	There were shepherds living out in the fields nearby . It was night , and they were looking after their sheep .
42002009	An angel of the Lord appeared to them . And the glory of the Lord shone around them . They were terrified .

42002014	" May glory be given to God in the highest heaven ! And may peace be given to those he is pleased with on earth ! "

42002019	But Mary kept all these things like a secret treasure in her heart . She thought about them over and over .

42002021	When the child was eight days old , he was circumcised . At the same time he was named Jesus . This was the name the angel had given him before his mother became pregnant .
42002022	The time for making them pure came as it is written in the Law of Moses . So Joseph and Mary took Jesus to Jerusalem . There they presented him to the Lord .

42002025	In Jerusalem there was a man named Simeon . He was a good and godly man . He was waiting for God's promise to Israel to happen . The Holy Spirit was with him .
42002026	The Spirit had told Simeon that he would not die before he had seen the Lord's Christ .

42002028	Simeon took Jesus in his arms and praised God . He said ,

42002031	You have prepared it in the sight of all people .
42002032	It is a light to be given to those who aren't Jews . It will bring glory to your people Israel . "

42002035	The thoughts of many hearts will be known . A sword will wound your own soul too . "
42002036	There was also a prophet named Anna . She was the daughter of Penuel from the tribe of Asher . Anna was very old . After getting married , she lived with her husband seven years .

42002039	Joseph and Mary did everything the Law of the Lord required . Then they returned to Galilee . They went to their own town of Nazareth .
42002040	And the child grew and became strong . He was very wise . He was blessed by God's grace .
42002041	Every year Jesus' parents went to Jerusalem for the Passover Feast .
42002042	When he was 12 years old , they went up to the Feast as usual .
42002043	After the Feast was over , his parents left to go back home . The boy Jesus stayed behind in Jerusalem . But they were not aware of it .
42002044	They thought he was somewhere in their group . So they traveled on for a day . Then they began to look for him among their relatives and friends .
42002045	They did not find him . So they went back to Jerusalem to look for him .
42002046	After three days they found him in the temple courtyard . He was sitting with the teachers . He was listening to them and asking them questions .
42002047	Everyone who heard him was amazed at how much he understood . They also were amazed at his answers .
42002048	When his parents saw him , they were amazed . His mother said to him , " Son , why have you treated us like this ? Your father and I have been worried about you . We have been looking for you everywhere . "
42002049	" Why were you looking for me ? " he asked . " Didn't you know I had to be in my Father's house ? "
42002050	But they did not understand what he meant by that .
42002051	Then he went back to Nazareth with them , and he obeyed them . But his mother kept all these things like a secret treasure in her heart .
42002052	Jesus became wiser and stronger . He also became more and more pleasing to God and to people .
42003001	Tiberius Caesar had been ruling for 15 years . Pontius Pilate was governor of Judea . Herod was the ruler of Galilee . His brother Philip was the ruler of Iturea and Traconitis . Lysanias was ruler of Abilene .
42003002	Annas and Caiaphas were high priests . At that time God's word came to John , son of Zechariah , in the desert .
42003003	He went into all the countryside around the Jordan River . There he preached that people should be baptized and turn away from their sins . Then God would forgive them .
42003004	Here is what is written in the scroll of the prophet Isaiah . It says , " A messenger is calling out in the desert , ' Prepare the way for the Lord . Make straight paths for him .
42003005	Every valley will be filled in . Every mountain and hill will be made level . The crooked roads will become straight . The rough ways will become smooth .
42003006	And everyone will see God's salvation . ' "
42003007	John spoke to the crowds coming to be baptized by him . He said , " You are like a nest of poisonous snakes ! Who warned you to escape the coming of God's anger ?
42003008	Produce fruit that shows you have turned away from your sins . And don't start saying to yourselves , ' Abraham is our father . ' I tell you , God can raise up children for Abraham even from these stones .
42003009	The ax is already lying at the roots of the trees . All the trees that don't produce good fruit will be cut down . They will be thrown into the fire . "
42003010	" Then what should we do ? " the crowd asked .
42003011	John answered , " If you have extra clothes , you should share with those who have none . And if you have extra food , you should do the same . "
42003012	Tax collectors also came to be baptized . " Teacher , " they asked , " what should we do ? "
42003013	" Don't collect any more than you are required to , " John told them .
42003014	Then some soldiers asked him , " And what should we do ? " John replied , " Don't force people to give you money . Don't bring false charges against people . Be happy with your pay . "
42003015	The people were waiting . They were expecting something . They were all wondering in their hearts if John might be the Christ .
42003016	John answered them all , " I baptize you with water . But One who is more powerful than I am will come . I'm not good enough to untie the straps of his sandals . He will baptize you with the Holy Spirit and with fire .
42003017	His pitchfork is in his hand to toss the straw away from his threshing floor . He will gather the wheat into his storeroom . But he will burn up the husks with fire that can't be put out . "
42003018	John said many other things to warn the people . He also preached the good news to them .
42003019	But John found fault with Herod , the ruler of Galilee , because of Herodias . She was the wife of Herod's brother . John also spoke strongly to Herod about all the other evil things he had done .
42003020	So Herod locked him up in prison . He added this sin to all his others .
42003021	When all the people were being baptized , Jesus was baptized too . And as he was praying , heaven was opened .
42003022	The Holy Spirit came down on him in the form of a dove . A voice came from heaven . It said , " You are my Son , and I love you . I am very pleased with you . "
42003023	Jesus was about 30 years old when he began his special work for God and others . It was thought that he was the son of Joseph . Joseph was the son of Heli .

42003037	Lamech was the son of Methuselah . Methuselah was the son of Enoch . Enoch was the son of Jared . Jared was the son of Mahalalel . Mahalalel was the son of Kenan .
42003038	Kenan was the son of Enosh . Enosh was the son of Seth . Seth was the son of Adam . Adam was the son of God .
42004001	Jesus , full of the Holy Spirit , returned from the Jordan River . The Spirit led him into the desert .
42004002	There the devil tempted him for 40 days . Jesus ate nothing during that time . At the end of the 40 days , he was hungry .
42004003	The devil said to him , " If you are the Son of God , tell this stone to become bread . "
42004004	Jesus answered , " It is written , ' Man doesn't live only on bread . ' "
42004005	Then the devil led Jesus up to a high place . In an instant , he showed Jesus all the kingdoms of the world .
42004006	He said to him , " I will give you all their authority and glory . It has been given to me , and I can give it to anyone I want to .
42004007	So if you worship me , it will all be yours . "
42004008	Jesus answered , " It is written , ' Worship the Lord your God . He is the only one you should serve . ' "
42004009	Then the devil led Jesus to Jerusalem . He had him stand on the highest point of the temple . " If you are the Son of God , " he said , " throw yourself down from here .
42004010	It is written , " ' The Lord will command his angels to take good care of you .
42004011	They will lift you up in their hands . Then you won't trip over a stone . ' "
42004012	Jesus answered , " Scripture says , ' Do not put the Lord your God to the test . ' "
42004013	When the devil finished all this tempting , he left Jesus until a better time .
42004014	Jesus returned to Galilee in the power of the Holy Spirit . News about him spread through the whole countryside .
42004015	He taught in their synagogues , and everyone praised him .
42004016	Jesus went to Nazareth , where he had been brought up . On the Sabbath day he went into the synagogue as he usually did . And he stood up to read .
42004017	The scroll of the prophet Isaiah was handed to him . He unrolled it and found the right place . There it is written ,
42004018	" The Spirit of the Lord is on me . He has anointed me to tell the good news to poor people . He has sent me to announce freedom for prisoners . He has sent me so that the blind will see again . He wants me to free those who are beaten down .
42004019	And he has sent me to announce the year when he will set his people free . "
42004020	Then Jesus rolled up the scroll . He gave it back to the attendant and sat down . The eyes of everyone in the synagogue were staring at him .
42004021	He began by saying to them , " Today this passage of Scripture is coming true as you listen . "
42004022	Everyone said good things about him . They were amazed at the gracious words they heard from his lips . " Isn't this Joseph's son ? " they asked .
42004023	Jesus said , " Here is a saying you will certainly apply to me . ' Doctor , heal yourself ! Do the things here in your hometown that we heard you did in Capernaum . ' "
42004024	" What I'm about to tell you is true , " he continued . " A prophet is not accepted in his hometown .
42004025	I tell you for sure that there were many widows in Israel in the days of Elijah . And there had been no rain for three and a half years . There wasn't enough food to eat anywhere in the land .
42004026	But Elijah was not sent to any of those widows . Instead , he was sent to a widow in Zarephath near Sidon .
42004027	And there were many in Israel who had skin diseases in the days of Elisha the prophet . But not one of them was healed except Naaman the Syrian . "
42004028	All the people in the synagogue were very angry when they heard that .
42004029	They got up and ran Jesus out of town . They took him to the edge of the hill on which the town was built . They planned to throw him down the cliff .
42004030	But Jesus walked right through the crowd and went on his way .
42004031	Then Jesus went to Capernaum , a town in Galilee . On the Sabbath day he began to teach the people .
42004032	They were amazed at his teaching , because his message had authority .
42004033	In the synagogue there was a man controlled by a demon , an evil spirit . He cried out at the top of his voice .
42004034	" Ha ! " he said . " What do you want with us , Jesus of Nazareth ? Have you come to destroy us ? I know who you are . You are the Holy One of God ! "
42004035	" Be quiet ! " Jesus said firmly . " Come out of him ! " Then the demon threw the man down in front of everybody . And it came out without hurting him .
42004036	All the people were amazed . They said to each other , " What is this teaching ? With authority and power he gives orders to evil spirits . And they come out ! "
42004037	The news about Jesus spread throughout the whole area .
42004038	Jesus left the synagogue and went to the home of Simon . At that time , Simon's mother-in-law was suffering from a high fever . So they asked Jesus to help her .
42004039	He bent over her and commanded the fever to leave , and it left her . She got up at once and began to serve them .
42004040	At sunset , people brought to Jesus all who were sick . He placed his hands on each one and healed them .
42004041	Also , demons came out of many people . The demons shouted , " You are the Son of God ! " But he commanded them to be quiet . He would not allow them to speak , because they knew he was the Christ .
42004042	At dawn , Jesus went out to a place where he could be by himself . The people went to look for him . When they found him , they tried to keep him from leaving them .
42004043	But he said , " I must announce the good news of God's kingdom to the other towns also . That is why I was sent . "
42004044	And he kept on preaching in the synagogues of Judea .
42005001	One day Jesus was standing by the Sea of Galilee . The people crowded around him and listened to the word of God .
42005002	Jesus saw two boats at the edge of the water . They had been left there by the fishermen , who were washing their nets .
42005003	He got into the boat that belonged to Simon . Jesus asked him to go out a little way from shore . Then he sat down in the boat and taught the people .
42005004	When he finished speaking , he turned to Simon . He said , " Go out into deep water . Let the nets down so you can catch some fish . "
42005005	Simon answered , " Master , we've worked hard all night and haven't caught anything . But because you say so , I will let down the nets . "
42005006	When they had done so , they caught a large number of fish . There were so many that their nets began to break .
42005007	So they motioned to their partners in the other boat to come and help them . They came and filled both boats so full that they began to sink .
42005008	When Simon Peter saw this , he fell at Jesus' knees . " Go away from me , Lord ! " he said . " I am a sinful man ! "
42005009	He and everyone with him were amazed at the number of fish they had caught .
42005010	So were James and John , the sons of Zebedee , who worked with Simon . Then Jesus said to Simon , " Don't be afraid . From now on you will catch people . "
42005011	So they pulled their boats up on shore . Then they left everything and followed him .
42005012	While Jesus was in one of the towns , a man came along . He had a skin disease all over his body . When he saw Jesus , he fell with his face to the ground . He begged him , " Lord , if you are willing to make me ' clean , ' you can do it . "
42005013	Jesus reached out his hand and touched the man . " I am willing to do it , " he said . " Be ' clean ' ! " Right away the disease left him .
42005014	Then Jesus ordered him , " Don't tell anyone . Go and show yourself to the priest . Offer the sacrifices that Moses commanded . It will be a witness to the priest and the people that you are ' clean . ' "
42005015	But the news about Jesus spread even more . So crowds of people came to hear him . They also came to be healed of their sicknesses .
42005016	But Jesus often went away to be by himself and pray .
42005017	One day Jesus was teaching . Pharisees and teachers of the law were sitting there . They had come from every village of Galilee and from Judea and Jerusalem . They heard that the Lord had given Jesus the power to heal the sick .
42005018	Some men came carrying a man who could not walk . He was lying on a mat . They tried to take him into the house to place him in front of Jesus .
42005019	They could not find a way to do this because of the crowd . So they went up on the roof . Then they lowered the man on his mat through the opening in the roof tiles . They lowered him into the middle of the crowd , right in front of Jesus .
42005020	When Jesus saw that they had faith , he said , " Friend , your sins are forgiven . "
42005021	The Pharisees and the teachers of the law began to think , " Who is this fellow who says such an evil thing ? Who can forgive sins but God alone ? "
42005022	Jesus knew what they were thinking . So he asked , " Why are you thinking these things in your hearts ?
42005023	Is it easier to say , ' Your sins are forgiven ' ? Or to say , ' Get up and walk ' ?
42005024	I want you to know that the Son of Man has authority on earth to forgive sins . " So he spoke to the man who could not walk . " I tell you , " he said , " get up . Take your mat and go home . "
42005025	Right away , the man stood up in front of them . He took his mat and went home praising God .
42005026	Everyone was amazed and gave praise to God . They were filled with wonder . They said , " We have seen unusual things today . "
42005027	After this , Jesus left the house . He saw a tax collector sitting at the tax booth . The man's name was Levi . " Follow me , " Jesus said to him .
42005028	Levi got up , left everything and followed him .
42005029	Then Levi gave a huge dinner for Jesus at his house . A large crowd of tax collectors and others were eating with them .
42005030	But the Pharisees and their teachers of the law complained to Jesus' disciples . They said , " Why do you eat and drink with tax collectors and ' sinners' ? "
42005031	Jesus answered them , " Those who are healthy don't need a doctor . Sick people do .
42005032	I have not come to get those who think they are right with God to follow me . I have come to get sinners to turn away from their sins . "
42005033	Some of the people who were there said to Jesus , " John's disciples often pray and go without eating . So do the disciples of the Pharisees . But yours go on eating and drinking . "
42005034	Jesus answered , " Can you make the guests of the groom go without eating while he is with them ?
42005035	But the time will come when the groom will be taken away from them . In those days they will fast . "
42005036	Then Jesus gave them an example . He said , " People don't tear a patch from new clothes and sew it on old clothes . If they do , they will tear the new clothes . Also , the patch from the new clothes will not match the old clothes .
42005037	People don't pour new wine into old wineskins . If they do , the new wine will burst the skins . The wine will run out , and the wineskins will be destroyed .
42005038	No , new wine must be poured into new wineskins .
42005039	After people drink old wine , they don't want the new . They say , ' The old wine is better . ' "
42006001	One Sabbath day Jesus was walking through the grainfields . His disciples began to break off some heads of grain . They rubbed them in their hands and ate them .
42006002	Some of the Pharisees said , " It is against the Law to do this on the Sabbath . Why are you doing it ? "
42006003	Jesus answered them , " Haven't you ever read about what David did ? He and his men were hungry .
42006004	He entered the house of God and took the holy bread . He ate the bread that only priests were allowed to eat . David also gave some to his men . "
42006005	Then Jesus said to them , " The Son of Man is Lord of the Sabbath day . "
42006006	On another Sabbath day , Jesus went into the synagogue and was teaching . A man whose right hand was weak and twisted was there .
42006007	The Pharisees and the teachers of the law were trying to find fault with Jesus . So they watched him closely . They wanted to see if he would heal on the Sabbath .
42006008	But Jesus knew what they were thinking . He spoke to the man who had the weak and twisted hand . " Get up and stand in front of everyone , " he said . So the man got up and stood there .
42006009	Then Jesus said to them , " What does the Law say we should do on the Sabbath day ? Should we do good ? Or should we do evil ? Should we save life ? Or should we destroy it ? "
42006010	He looked around at all of them . Then he said to the man , " Stretch out your hand . " He did , and his hand was as good as new .
42006011	But the Pharisees and the teachers of the law were very angry . They began to talk to each other about what they might do to Jesus .

42006018	They had all come to hear Jesus and to be healed of their sicknesses . People who were troubled by evil spirits were made well .
42006019	Everyone tried to touch Jesus . Power was coming from him and healing them all .
42006020	Jesus looked at his disciples . He said to them , " Blessed are you who are needy . God's kingdom belongs to you .
42006021	Blessed are you who are hungry now . You will be satisfied . Blessed are you who are sad now . You will laugh .
42006022	Blessed are you when people hate you , when they have nothing to do with you and say bad things about you , and when they treat your name as something evil . They do all this because you are followers of the Son of Man .
42006023	" Their people treated the prophets the same way long ago . When these things happen to you , be glad and jump for joy . You will receive many blessings in heaven .
42006024	" But how terrible it will be for you who are rich ! You have already had your easy life .
42006025	How terrible for you who are well fed now ! You will go hungry . How terrible for you who laugh now ! You will cry and be sad .
42006026	How terrible for you when everyone says good things about you ! Their people treated the false prophets the same way long ago .
42006027	" But here is what I tell you who hear me . Love your enemies . Do good to those who hate you .
42006028	Bless those who call down curses on you . And pray for those who treat you badly .
42006029	" Suppose someone hits you on one cheek . Turn your other cheek to him also . Suppose someone takes your coat . Don't stop him from taking your shirt .
42006030	" Give to everyone who asks you . And if anyone takes what belongs to you , don't ask to get it back .

42006032	" Suppose you love those who love you . Should anyone praise you for that ? Even ' sinners' love those who love them .
42006033	And suppose you do good to those who are good to you . Should anyone praise you for that ? Even ' sinners' do that .
42006034	And suppose you lend money to those who can pay you back . Should anyone praise you for that ? Even a ' sinner ' lends to ' sinners , ' expecting them to pay everything back .
42006035	" But love your enemies . Do good to them . Lend to them without expecting to get anything back . Then you will receive a lot in return . And you will be sons of the Most High God . He is kind to people who are evil and are not thankful .
42006036	So have mercy , just as your Father has mercy .
42006037	" If you do not judge others , then you will not be judged . If you do not find others guilty , then you will not be found guilty . Forgive , and you will be forgiven .
42006038	Give , and it will be given to you . A good amount will be poured into your lap . It will be pressed down , shaken together , and running over . The same amount you give will be measured out to you . "
42006039	Jesus also gave them another example . He asked , " Can a blind person lead another blind person ? Won't they both fall into a pit ?
42006040	Students are not better than their teachers . But everyone who is completely trained will be like his teacher .
42006041	" You look at the bit of sawdust in your friend's eye . But you pay no attention to the piece of wood in your own eye .
42006042	How can you say to your friend , ' Let me take the bit of sawdust out of your eye ' ? How can you say this while there is a piece of wood in your own eye ? You pretender ! First take the piece of wood out of your own eye . Then you will be able to see clearly to take the bit of sawdust out of your friend's eye .
42006043	" A good tree doesn't bear bad fruit . And a bad tree doesn't bear good fruit .
42006044	You can tell each tree by the kind of fruit it bears . People do not pick figs from thorns . And they don't pick grapes from bushes .
42006045	" A good man says good things . These come from the good that is put away in his heart . An evil man says evil things . These come from the evil that is put away in his heart . Their mouths say everything that is in their hearts .
42006046	" Why do you call me , ' Lord , Lord , ' and still don't do what I say ?
42006047	Some people come to me and listen to me and do what I say . I will show you what they are like .
42006048	They are like someone who builds a house . He digs down deep and sets it on solid rock . When a flood comes , the river rushes against the house . But the water can't shake it . The house is well built .
42006049	" But here is what happens when people listen to my words and do not obey them . They are like someone who builds a house on soft ground instead of solid rock . The moment the river rushes against that house , it falls down . It is completely destroyed . "
42007001	Jesus finished saying all those things to the people . Then he entered Capernaum .

42007013	When the Lord saw her , he felt sorry for her . So he said , " Don't cry . "

42007021	At that very time Jesus healed many people . They had illnesses , sicknesses and evil spirits . He also gave sight to many who were blind .

Deaf people hear . Those who are dead are raised to life . And the good news is preached to those who are poor .
42007023	Blessed are those who do not give up their faith because of me . "

42007025	If not , what did you go out to see ? A man dressed in fine clothes ? No . Those who wear fine clothes and have many expensive things are in palaces .
42007026	Then what did you go out to see ? A prophet ? Yes , I tell you , and more than a prophet .
42007027	" He is the one written about in Scripture . It says , " ' I will send my messenger ahead of you . He will prepare your way for you . '
42007028	I tell you , no one more important than John has ever been born . But the least important person in God's kingdom is more important than he is . "
42007029	All the people who heard Jesus' words agreed that God's way was right . Even the tax collectors agreed . These people had all been baptized by John .
42007030	But the Pharisees and the authorities on the law did not accept God's purpose for themselves . They had not been baptized by John .
42007031	" What can I compare today's people to ? " Jesus asked . " What are they like ?
42007032	They are like children sitting in the market place and calling out to each other . They say , " ' We played a flute for you . But you didn't dance . We sang a funeral song . But you didn't cry . '
42007033	" That is how it has been with John the Baptist . When he came to you , he didn't eat bread or drink wine . And you say , ' He has a demon . '

43004010	Jesus answered her , " You do not know what God's gift is . And you do not know who is asking you for a drink . If you did , you would have asked him . He would have given you living water . "
43004011	" Sir , " the woman said , " you don't have anything to get water with . The well is deep . Where can you get this living water ?
43004012	" Our father Jacob gave us the well . He drank from it himself . So did his sons and his flocks and herds . Are you more important than he is ? "
43004013	Jesus answered , " All who drink this water will be thirsty again .
43004014	But anyone who drinks the water I give him will never be thirsty . In fact , the water I give him will become a spring of water in him . It will flow up into eternal life . "
43004015	The woman said to him , " Sir , give me this water . Then I will never be thirsty . And I won't have to keep coming here to get water . "

43004030	The people came out of the town and made their way toward Jesus .
43004031	His disciples were saying to him , " Rabbi , eat something ! "

43004041	Because of his words , many more people became believers .
43004042	They said to the woman , " We no longer believe just because of what you said . We have now heard for ourselves . We know that this man really is the Savior of the world . "
43004043	After the two days , Jesus left for Galilee .
43004044	He himself had pointed out that a prophet is not respected in his own country .
43004045	When he arrived in Galilee , the people living there welcomed him . They had seen everything he had done in Jerusalem at the Passover Feast . That was because they had also been there .
43004046	Once more , Jesus visited Cana in Galilee . Cana is where he had turned the water into wine . A royal official was there . His son was sick in bed at Capernaum .
43004047	The official heard that Jesus had arrived in Galilee from Judea . So he went to Jesus and begged him to come and heal his son . The boy was close to death .
43004048	Jesus told him , " You people will never believe unless you see miraculous signs and wonders . "
43004049	The royal official said , " Sir , come down before my child dies . "
43004050	Jesus replied , " You may go . Your son will live . " The man believed what Jesus said , and so he left .

43004052	He asked what time his son got better . They said to him , " The fever left him yesterday afternoon at one o'clock . "
43004053	Then the father realized what had happened . That was the exact time Jesus had said to him , " Your son will live . " So he and all his family became believers .
43004054	This was the second miraculous sign that Jesus did after coming from Judea to Galilee .
43005001	Some time later , Jesus went up to Jerusalem for a Jewish feast .
43005002	In Jerusalem near the Sheep Gate is a pool . In the Aramaic language it is called Bethesda . It is surrounded by five rows of columns with a roof over them .
43005005	One person who was there had been disabled for 38 years .
43005006	Jesus saw him lying there . He knew that the man had been in that condition for a long time . So he asked him , " Do you want to get well ? "
43005007	" Sir , " the disabled man replied , " I have no one to help me into the pool when an angel stirs the water up . I try to get in , but someone else always goes down ahead of me . "
43005008	Then Jesus said to him , " Get up ! Pick up your mat and walk . "
43005009	At once the man was healed . He picked up his mat and walked . The day this happened was a Sabbath .
43005010	So the Jews said to the man who had been healed , " It is the Sabbath . The law does not allow you to carry your mat . "

43005022	" Also , the Father does not judge anyone . He has given the Son the task of judging .

43005024	" What I'm about to tell you is true . Anyone who hears my word and believes him who sent me has eternal life . He will not be found guilty . He has crossed over from death to life .
43005025	" What I'm about to tell you is true . A time is coming for me to give life . In fact , it has already begun . The dead will hear the voice of the Son of God . Those who hear it will live .
43005026	" The Father has life in himself . He has also allowed the Son to have life in himself .
43005027	And the Father has given him the authority to judge . This is because he is the Son of Man .
43005028	" Do not be amazed at this . A time is coming when all who are in the grave will hear his voice .
43005029	They will all come out of their graves . Those who have done good will rise and live again . Those who have done evil will rise and be found guilty .
43005030	" I can do nothing by myself . I judge only as I hear . And my judging is fair . I do not try to please myself . I try only to please the One who sent me .
43005031	" If I give witness about myself , it doesn't count .
43005032	There is someone else who gives witness in my favor . And I know that his witness about me counts .
43005033	" You have sent people to John . He has given witness to the truth .
43005034	I do not accept human witness . I only talk about it so you can be saved .
43005035	John was like a lamp that burned and gave light . For a while you chose to enjoy his light .
43005036	" The witness I have is more important than John's . I am doing the very work the Father gave me to finish . It gives witness that the Father has sent me .
43005037	" The Father who sent me has himself given witness about me . You have never heard his voice . You have never seen what he really looks like .
43005038	And his word does not live in you . This is because you do not believe the One he sent .
43005039	" You study the Scriptures carefully . You study them because you think they will give you eternal life . The Scriptures you study give witness about me .
43005040	But you refuse to come to me and receive life .
43005041	" I do not accept praise from people .
43005042	But I know you . I know that you do not have love for God in your hearts .
43005043	I have come in my Father's name , and you do not accept me . But if someone else comes in his own name , you will accept him .
43005044	" You accept praise from one another . But you make no effort to receive the praise that comes from the only God . So how can you believe ?
43005045	" Do not think I will bring charges against you in front of the Father . Moses is the one who does that . And he is the one you build your hopes on .
43005046	" Do you believe Moses ? Then you should believe me . He wrote about me .
43005047	But you do not believe what he wrote . So how are you going to believe what I say ? "
43006001	Some time after this , Jesus crossed over to the other side of the Sea of Galilee . It is also called the Sea of Tiberias .
43006002	A large crowd of people followed him . They had seen the miraculous signs he had done on those who were sick .
43006003	Then Jesus went up on a mountainside . There he sat down with his disciples .

43006005	Jesus looked up and saw a large crowd coming toward him . So he said to Philip , " Where can we buy bread for these people to eat ? "
43006006	He asked this only to put Philip to the test . He already knew what he was going to do .
43006007	Philip answered him , " Eight months' pay would not buy enough bread for each one to have a bite ! "
43006008	Another of his disciples spoke up . It was Andrew , Simon Peter's brother .

43008001	But Jesus went to the Mount of Olives .

43019041	At the place where Jesus was crucified , there was a garden . A new tomb was there . No one had ever been put in it before .
43019042	That day was the Jewish Preparation Day , and the tomb was nearby . So they placed Jesus there .
43020001	Early on the first day of the week , Mary Magdalene went to the tomb . It was still dark . She saw that the stone had been moved away from the entrance .

43021018	What I'm about to tell you is true . When you were younger , you dressed yourself . You went wherever you wanted to go . But when you are old , you will stretch out your hands . Someone else will dress you . Someone else will lead you where you do not want to go . "

44005037	After this , Judas from Galilee came along . This was in the days when the Romans made a list of all the people . Judas led a gang of men against the Romans . He too was killed . All his followers were scattered .
44005038	So let me give you some advice . Leave these men alone ! Let them go ! If their plans and actions are only human , they will fail .
44005039	But if their plans come from God , you won't be able to stop these men . You will only find yourselves fighting against God . "
44005040	His speech won the leaders over . They called the apostles in and had them whipped . The leaders ordered them not to speak in Jesus' name . Then they let the apostles go .
44005041	The apostles were full of joy as they left the Sanhedrin . They considered it an honor to suffer shame for the name of Jesus .
44005042	Day after day , they kept teaching in the temple courtyards and from house to house . They never stopped telling the good news that Jesus is the Christ .
44006001	In those days the number of believers was growing . The Jews who followed Greek practices complained against the Jews who followed only Jewish practices . They said that the widows of men who followed Greek practices were not being taken care of . They weren't getting their fair share of food each day .
44006002	So the Twelve gathered all the believers together . They said , " It wouldn't be right for us to give up teaching God's word in order to wait on tables .
44006003	Brothers , choose seven of your men . They must be known as men who are wise and full of the Holy Spirit . We will turn this important work over to them .
44006004	Then we can give our attention to prayer and to teaching the word . "
44006005	This plan pleased the whole group . They chose Stephen . He was full of faith and of the Holy Spirit . Philip , Procorus , Nicanor , Timon and Parmenas were chosen too . The group also chose Nicolas from Antioch . He had accepted the Jewish faith .
44006006	The group brought them to the apostles . Then the apostles prayed and placed their hands on them .
44006007	So God's word spread . The number of believers in Jerusalem grew quickly . Also , a large number of priests began to obey Jesus' teachings .
44006008	Stephen was full of God's grace and power . He did great wonders and miraculous signs among the people .
44006009	But members of the group called the Synagogue of the Freedmen began to oppose him . Some of them were Jews from Cyrene and Alexandria . Others were Jews from Cilicia and Asia Minor . They all began to argue with Stephen .
44006010	But he was too wise for them . They couldn't stand up against the Holy Spirit who spoke through him .
44006011	Then in secret they talked some men into lying about Stephen . They said , " We heard Stephen speak evil things against Moses . He also spoke evil things against God . "
44006012	So the people were stirred up . The elders and the teachers of the law were stirred up too . They arrested Stephen and brought him to the Sanhedrin .
44006013	They found people who were willing to tell lies . The false witnesses said , " This fellow never stops speaking against this holy place . He also speaks against the law .
44006014	We have heard him say that this Jesus of Nazareth will destroy this place . He says Jesus will change the practices that Moses handed down to us . "
44006015	All who were sitting in the Sanhedrin looked right at Stephen . They saw that his face was like the face of an angel .
44007001	Then the high priest questioned Stephen . " Is what these people are saying true ? " he asked .
44007002	" Brothers and fathers , listen to me ! " Stephen replied . " The God of glory appeared to our father Abraham . At that time Abraham was still in Mesopotamia . He had not yet begun living in Haran .
44007003	' Leave your country and your people , ' God said . ' Go to the land I will show you . '
44007004	" So Abraham left the land of Babylonia . He settled in Haran . After his father died , God sent Abraham to this land where you are now living .
44007005	God didn't give him any property here . He didn't give him even a foot of land . But God made a promise to him and to all his family after him . He said they would possess the land . The promise was made even though at that time Abraham had no child .
44007006	" Here is what God said to him . ' Your family after you will be strangers in a country that is not their own . They will be slaves and will be treated badly for 400 years .
44007007	But I will punish the nation that makes them slaves , ' God said . ' After that , they will leave that country and worship me here . '
44007008	" Then God made a covenant with Abraham . God told him that circumcision would show who the members of the covenant were . Abraham became Isaac's father . He circumcised Isaac eight days after he was born . Later , Isaac became Jacob's father . Jacob had 12 sons . They became the founders of the 12 tribes of Israel .
44007009	" Jacob's sons were jealous of their brother Joseph . So they sold him as a slave . He was taken to Egypt . But God was with him .
44007010	He saved Joseph from all his troubles . God made Joseph wise . He helped him to become the friend of Pharaoh , the king of Egypt . So Pharaoh made Joseph ruler over Egypt and his whole palace .
44007011	" There was not enough food for all Egypt and Canaan . This brought great suffering . Jacob and his sons couldn't find food .
44007012	But Jacob heard that there was grain in Egypt . So he sent his sons on their first visit .
44007013	On their second visit , Joseph told his brothers who he was . Pharaoh learned about Joseph's family .
44007014	" After this , Joseph sent for his father Jacob and his whole family . The total number of people was 75 .
44007015	Then Jacob went down to Egypt . There he and his family died .
44007016	Some of their bodies were brought back to Shechem . They were placed in a tomb Abraham had bought . He had purchased it from Hamor's sons at Shechem for a certain amount of money .
44007017	" In Egypt the number of our people grew and grew . It was nearly time for God to make his promise to Abraham come true .
44007018	Another king became ruler of Egypt . He knew nothing about Joseph .
44007019	He was very evil and dishonest with our people . He beat them down . He forced them to throw out their newborn babies to die .
44007020	" At that time Moses was born . He was not an ordinary child . For three months he was taken care of by his family .
44007021	Then he was placed outside . But Pharaoh's daughter took him home . She brought him up as her own son .
44007022	Moses was taught all the knowledge of the people of Egypt . He became a powerful speaker and a man of action .
44007023	" When Moses was 40 years old , he decided to visit the people of Israel . They were his own people .
44007024	He saw one of them being treated badly by a man of Egypt . So he went to help him . He got even by killing the man .
44007025	Moses thought his own people would realize that God was using him to save them . But they didn't .
44007026	" The next day Moses saw two men of Israel fighting . He tried to make peace between them . ' Men , you are both of Israel , ' he said . ' Why do you want to hurt each other ? '
44007027	" But the man who was treating the other one badly pushed Moses to one side . He said , ' Who made you ruler and judge over us ?
44007028	Do you want to kill me as you killed the Egyptian yesterday ? '
44007029	When Moses heard this , he escaped to Midian . He lived there as a stranger . He became the father of two sons there .
44007030	" Forty years passed . Then an angel appeared to Moses in the flames of a burning bush . This happened in the desert near Mount Sinai .
44007031	When Moses saw the bush , he was amazed . He went over for a closer look . There he heard the Lord's voice .
44007032	' I am the God of your fathers , ' the Lord said . ' I am the God of Abraham , Isaac and Jacob . ' Moses shook with fear . He didn't dare to look .
44007033	" Then the Lord said to him , ' Take off your sandals . The place you are standing on is holy ground .
44007034	I have seen my people beaten down in Egypt . I have heard their groans . I have come down to set them free . Now come . I will send you back to Egypt . '
44007035	" This is the same Moses the two men of Israel would not accept . They had said , ' Who made you ruler and judge ? ' But God himself sent Moses to rule the people of Israel and set them free . He spoke to Moses through the angel who had appeared to him in the bush .
44007036	So Moses led them out of Egypt . He did wonders and miraculous signs in Egypt , at the Red Sea , and for 40 years in the desert .
44007037	" This is the same Moses who spoke to the people of Israel . ' God will send you a prophet , ' he said . ' He will be like me . He will come from your own people . '
44007038	Moses was with the Israelites in the desert . He was with the angel who spoke to him on Mount Sinai . Moses was with our people of long ago . He received living words to pass on to us .
44007039	" But our people refused to obey Moses . They would not accept him . In their hearts , they wished they were back in Egypt .
44007040	They told Aaron , ' Make us a god who will lead us . This fellow Moses led us out of Egypt . But we don't know what has happened to him ! '
44007041	That was the time they made a statue to be their god . It looked like a calf . They brought sacrifices to it . They were glad because of what they had made with their own hands .
44007042	But God turned away from them . He left them to worship the sun , moon and stars . This agrees with what is written in the book of the prophets . There it says , " ' People of Israel , did you bring me sacrifices and offerings for 40 years in the desert ?
44007043	You lifted up the place where Molech was worshiped . You lifted up the star of your god Rephan . You made statues of them to worship . So I will send you away from your country . ' God sent them to Babylon and even farther .
44007044	" Long ago our people had with them in the desert the holy tent where the tablets of the covenant were kept . Moses had made the holy tent as God had commanded him . It was made like the pattern he had seen .
44007045	Our people received the tent from God . They brought it with them when they took the land of Canaan . God drove out the nations that were in their way . At that time Joshua was Israel's leader . " The tent remained in the land until David's time .
44007046	David was blessed by God . So David asked if he could build a house for the God of Jacob .
44007047	Instead , it was Solomon who built it for him .
44007048	" But the Most High God does not live in houses made by human hands . As God says through the prophet ,
44007049	" ' Heaven is my throne . The earth is under my control . What kind of house will you build for me ? says the Lord . Where will my resting place be ?
44007050	Didn't my hand make all these things ? '
44007051	" You people ! You won't obey ! You are stubborn ! You won't listen ! You are just like your people of long ago ! You always oppose the Holy Spirit !

44007053	The law you received was brought by angels . But you haven't obeyed it . "

44008001	Saul was there . He had agreed that Stephen should die . On that day the church in Jerusalem began to be attacked and treated badly . All except the apostles were scattered throughout Judea and Samaria .

44009001	Meanwhile , Saul continued to oppose the Lord's followers . He said they would be put to death . He went to the high priest .

44009034	" Aeneas , " Peter said to him , " Jesus Christ heals you . Get up ! Take care of your mat ! " So Aeneas got up right away .

44009037	About that time she became sick and died . Her body was washed and placed in a room upstairs .
44009038	Lydda was near Joppa . The believers heard that Peter was in Lydda . So they sent two men to him . They begged him , " Please come at once ! "
44009039	Peter went with them . When he arrived , he was taken upstairs to the room . All the widows stood around him crying . They showed him the robes and other clothes Dorcas had made while she was still alive .
44009040	Peter sent them all out of the room . Then he got down on his knees and prayed . He turned toward the dead woman . He said , " Tabitha , get up . " She opened her eyes . When she saw Peter , she sat up .

44010001	A man named Cornelius lived in Caesarea . He was a Roman commander in the Italian Regiment .
44010002	Cornelius and all his family were faithful and worshiped God . He gave freely to people who were in need . He prayed to God regularly .
44010003	One day about three o'clock in the afternoon he had a vision . He saw an angel of God clearly . The angel came to him and said , " Cornelius ! "

44010006	He is staying with another Simon , a man who works with leather . His house is by the sea . "

44011015	" As I began to speak , the Holy Spirit came on them . He came just as he had come on us at the beginning .
44011016	Then I remembered the Lord's words . ' John baptized with water , ' he had said . ' But you will be baptized with the Holy Spirit . '
44011017	God gave them the same gift he gave those of us who believed in the Lord Jesus Christ . So who was I to think that I could oppose God ? "
44011018	When they heard this , they didn't object anymore . They praised God . They said , " So then , God has allowed even those who aren't Jews to turn away from their sins and live . "
44011019	Some believers had been scattered by the suffering that came to them after Stephen's death . They traveled as far as Phoenicia , Cyprus and Antioch . But they told the message only to Jews .
44011020	Some believers from Cyprus and Cyrene went to Antioch . There they began to speak to Greeks also . They told them the good news about the Lord Jesus .
44011021	The Lord's power was with them . Large numbers of people believed and turned to the Lord .
44011022	The church in Jerusalem heard about this . So they sent Barnabas to Antioch .
44011023	When he arrived and saw what the grace of God had done , he was glad . He told them all to remain true to the Lord with all their hearts .
44011024	Barnabas was a good man . He was full of the Holy Spirit and of faith . Large numbers of people came to know the Lord .
44011025	Then Barnabas went to Tarsus to look for Saul .
44011026	He found him there . Then he brought him to Antioch . For a whole year Barnabas and Saul met with the church . They taught large numbers of people . At Antioch the believers were called Christians for the first time .
44011027	In those days some prophets came down from Jerusalem to Antioch .
44011028	One of them was named Agabus . He stood up and spoke through the Spirit . He said there would not be nearly enough food anywhere in the Roman world . This happened while Claudius was the emperor .
44011029	The believers decided to provide help for the brothers and sisters living in Judea . All of them helped as much as they could .
44011030	They sent their gift to the elders through Barnabas and Saul .
44012001	About this time , King Herod arrested some people who belonged to the church . He planned to make them suffer greatly .
44012002	He had James killed with a sword . James was John's brother .
44012003	Herod saw that the death of James pleased the Jews . So he arrested Peter also . This happened during the Feast of Unleavened Bread .
44012004	After Herod arrested Peter , he put him in prison . Peter was placed under guard . He was watched by four groups of four soldiers each . Herod planned to put Peter on public trial . It would take place after the Passover Feast .
44012005	So Peter was kept in prison . But the church prayed hard to God for him .
44012006	It was the night before Herod was going to bring him to trial . Peter was sleeping between two soldiers . Two chains held him there . Lookouts stood guard at the entrance .
44012007	Suddenly an angel of the Lord appeared . A light shone in the prison cell . The angel struck Peter on his side . Peter woke up . " Quick ! " the angel said . " Get up ! " The chains fell off Peter's wrists .
44012008	Then the angel said to him , " Put on your clothes and sandals . " Peter did so . " Put on your coat , " the angel told him . " Follow me . "
44012009	Peter followed him out of the prison . But he had no idea that what the angel was doing was really happening . He thought he was seeing a vision .
44012010	They passed the first and second guards . Then they came to the iron gate leading to the city . It opened for them by itself . They went through it . They walked the length of one street . Suddenly the angel left Peter .
44012011	Then Peter realized what had happened . He said , " Now I know for sure that the Lord sent his angel . He set me free from Herod's power . He saved me from everything the Jewish people were hoping for . "
44012012	When Peter understood what had happened , he went to Mary's house . Mary was the mother of John Mark . Many people had gathered in her home . They were praying there .
44012013	Peter knocked at the outer entrance . A servant named Rhoda came to answer the door .
44012014	She recognized Peter's voice . She was so excited that she ran back without opening the door . " Peter is at the door ! " she exclaimed .
44012015	" You're out of your mind , " they said to her . But she kept telling them it was true . So they said , " It must be his angel . "
44012016	Peter kept on knocking . When they opened the door and saw him , they were amazed .
44012017	Peter motioned with his hand for them to be quiet . He explained how the Lord had brought him out of prison . " Tell James and the others about this , " he said . Then he went to another place .
44012018	In the morning the soldiers were bewildered . They couldn't figure out what had happened to Peter .
44012019	So Herod had them look everywhere for Peter . But they didn't find him . Then Herod questioned the guards closely . He ordered that they be put to death . Herod went from Judea to Caesarea . He stayed there awhile .
44012020	He had been quarreling with the people of Tyre and Sidon . So they got together and asked for a meeting with him . This was because they depended on the king's country to supply them with food . They gained the support of Blastus and asked for peace . Blastus was a trusted personal servant of the king .
44012021	The appointed day came . Herod was seated on his throne . He was wearing his royal robes . He made a speech to the people .
44012022	Then they shouted , " This is the voice of a god . It's not the voice of a man . "
44012023	Right away an angel of the Lord struck Herod down . Herod had not given praise to God . So he was eaten by worms and died .
44012024	But God's word continued to increase and spread .
44012025	Barnabas and Saul finished their task . Then they returned from Jerusalem . They took John Mark with them .
44013001	In the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers . Among them were Barnabas , Simeon , and Lucius from Cyrene . Simeon was also called Niger . Another was Manaen . He had been brought up with Herod , the ruler of Galilee . Saul was among them too .
44013002	While they were worshiping the Lord and fasting , the Holy Spirit spoke . " Set apart Barnabas and Saul for me , " he said . " I have appointed them to do special work . "
44013003	The prophets and teachers fasted and prayed . They placed their hands on Barnabas and Saul . Then they sent them off .
44013004	Barnabas and Saul were sent on their way by the Holy Spirit . They went down to Seleucia . From there they sailed to Cyprus .
44013005	They arrived at Salamis . There they preached God's word in the Jewish synagogues . John was with them as their helper .
44013006	They traveled all across the island until they came to Paphos . There they met a Jew named Bar-Jesus . He was an evil magician and a false prophet .
44013007	He was an attendant of Sergius Paulus , the governor . Paulus was a man of understanding . He sent for Barnabas and Saul . He wanted to hear God's word .
44013008	But Elymas , the evil magician , opposed them . The name Elymas means " magician . " He tried to keep the governor from becoming a believer .
44013009	Saul was also known as Paul . He was filled with the Holy Spirit . He looked straight at Elymas . He said to him ,
44013010	" You are a child of the devil ! You are an enemy of everything that is right ! You cheat people . You use all kinds of tricks . Won't you ever stop twisting the right ways of the Lord ?
44013011	Now the Lord's hand is against you . You are going to go blind . You won't be able to see the light of the sun for a while . " Right away mist and darkness came over him . He tried to feel his way around . He wanted to find someone to lead him by the hand .
44013012	When the governor saw what had happened , he believed . He was amazed at what Paul was teaching about the Lord .
44013013	From Paphos , Paul and his companions sailed to Perga in Pamphylia . There John left them and returned to Jerusalem .
44013014	From Perga they went on to Pisidian Antioch . On the Sabbath day they entered the synagogue and sat down .
44013015	The Law and the Prophets were read aloud . Then the synagogue rulers sent word to Paul and his companions . They said , " Brothers , do you have a message of hope for the people ? If you do , please speak . "
44013016	Paul stood up and motioned with his hand . Then he said , " Men of Israel , and you non-Jews who worship God , listen to me !
44013017	The God of Israel chose our people who lived long ago . He blessed them greatly while they were in Egypt . With his mighty power he led them out of that country .
44013018	He put up with them for about 40 years in the desert .
44013019	He destroyed seven nations in Canaan . Then he gave the land to his people as their rightful share .
44013020	All of this took about 450 years . " After this , God gave them judges until the time of Samuel the prophet .
44013021	Then the people asked for a king . He gave them Saul , son of Kish . Saul was from the tribe of Benjamin . He ruled for 40 years .
44013022	God removed him and made David their king . Here is God's witness about him . ' David , son of Jesse , is a man dear to my heart , ' he said . ' He will do everything I want him to do . '
44013023	" From this man's family line God has brought to Israel the Savior Jesus . This is what he had promised .
44013024	Before Jesus came , John preached that we should turn away from our sins and be baptized . He preached this to all Israel .
44013025	John was coming to the end of his work . ' Who do you think I am ? ' he said . ' I am not the one you are looking for . No , he is coming after me . I am not good enough to untie his sandals . '
44013026	" Listen , brothers , you children of Abraham ! Listen , you non-Jews who worship God ! This message of salvation has been sent to us .
44013027	The people of Jerusalem and their rulers did not recognize Jesus . By finding him guilty , they made the prophets' words come true . These are read every Sabbath day .
44013028	The people and their rulers had no reason at all for sentencing Jesus to death . But they asked Pilate to have him killed .
44013029	They did everything that had been written about Jesus . Then they took him down from the cross . They laid him in a tomb .
44013030	But God raised him from the dead .
44013031	For many days he was seen by those who had traveled with him from Galilee to Jerusalem . Now they are his witnesses to our people .
44013032	" We are telling you the good news . What God promised our people long ago
44013033	he has done for us , their children . He has raised up Jesus . This is what is written in the second Psalm . It says , " ' You are my Son . Today I have become your Father . '
44013034	God raised Jesus from the dead . He will never rot in the grave . This is what is written in Scripture . It says , " ' Holy and sure blessings were promised to David . I will give them to you . '
44013035	In another place it says , " ' You will not let your Holy One rot away . '
44013036	" David carried out God's purpose while he lived . Then he died . He was buried with his people . His body rotted away .
44013037	But the One whom God raised from the dead did not rot away .
44013038	" My brothers , here is what I want you to know . I announce to you that your sins can be forgiven because of what Jesus has done .
44013039	Through him everyone who believes is made right with God . Moses' law could not make you right in God's eyes .
44013040	Be careful ! Don't let what the prophets spoke about happen to you . They said ,
44013041	" ' Look , you who make fun of the truth ! Wonder and die ! I am going to do something in your days that you would never believe . You wouldn't believe it even if someone told you . ' "
44013042	Paul and Barnabas started to leave the synagogue . The people invited them to say more about these things on the next Sabbath day .
44013043	The people were told they could leave the service . Many Jews followed Paul and Barnabas . Many non-Jews who faithfully worshiped the God of the Jews did the same . Paul and Barnabas talked with them . They tried to get them to keep living in God's grace .
44013044	On the next Sabbath day , almost the whole city gathered to hear the word of the Lord .
44013045	When the Jews saw the crowds , they became very jealous . They said evil things against what Paul was saying .
44013046	Then Paul and Barnabas answered them boldly . " We had to speak God's word to you first , " they said . " But you don't accept it . You don't think you are good enough for eternal life . So now we are turning to those who aren't Jews .
44013047	This is what the Lord has commanded us to do . He said , " ' I have made you a light for those who aren't Jews . You will bring salvation to the whole earth . ' "
44013048	When the non-Jews heard this , they were glad . They honored the word of the Lord . All who were appointed for eternal life believed .
44013049	The word of the Lord spread through the whole area .
44013050	But the Jews stirred up the important women who worshiped God . They also stirred up the men who were leaders in the city . They tried to get them to attack Paul and Barnabas . They threw them out of that area .
44013051	Paul and Barnabas didn't like this . So they shook the dust from their feet . They went on to Iconium .
44013052	The believers were filled with joy and with the Holy Spirit .
44014001	At Iconium , Paul and Barnabas went into the Jewish synagogue as usual . They spoke there with great power . Large numbers of Jews and non-Jews became believers .
44014002	But the Jews who refused to believe stirred up those who weren't Jews . They poisoned their minds against the two men and the new believers .
44014003	So Paul and Barnabas spent a lot of time there . They spoke boldly for the Lord . He gave them the ability to do miraculous signs and wonders . In this way the Lord showed that they were telling the truth about his grace .
44014004	The people of the city did not agree with each other . Some were on the side of the Jews . Others were on the side of the apostles .
44014005	Jews and non-Jews alike planned to treat Paul and Barnabas badly . Their leaders agreed . They planned to kill them by throwing stones at them .
44014006	But Paul and Barnabas found out about the plan . They escaped to the Lycaonian cities of Lystra and Derbe and to the surrounding area .
44014007	There they continued to preach the good news .
44014008	In Lystra there sat a man who couldn't walk . He hadn't been able to use his feet since the day he was born .
44014009	He listened as Paul spoke . Paul looked right at him . He saw that the man had faith to be healed .
44014010	So he called out , " Stand up on your feet ! " Then the man jumped up and began to walk .
44014011	The crowd saw what Paul had done . They shouted in the Lycaonian language . " The gods have come down to us in human form ! " they exclaimed .
44014012	They called Barnabas Zeus . Paul was the main speaker . So they called him Hermes .
44014013	Just outside the city was the temple of the god Zeus . The priest of Zeus brought bulls and wreaths to the city gates . He and the crowd wanted to offer sacrifices to Paul and Barnabas .
44014014	But the apostles Barnabas and Paul heard about this . So they tore their clothes . They rushed out into the crowd . They shouted ,
44014015	" Why are you men doing this ? We are only human , just like you . We are bringing you good news . Turn away from these worthless things . Turn to the living God . He is the one who made the heavens and the earth and the sea . He made everything in them .
44014016	In the past , he let all nations go their own way .
44014017	But he has given proof of what he is like . He has shown kindness by giving you rain from heaven . He gives you crops in their seasons . He provides you with plenty of food . He fills your hearts with joy . "
44014018	Paul and Barnabas told them all these things . But they had trouble keeping the crowd from offering sacrifices to them .
44014019	Then some Jews came from Antioch and Iconium . They won the crowd over to their side . They threw stones at Paul . They thought he was dead , so they dragged him out of the city .
44014020	The believers gathered around Paul . Then he got up and went back into the city . The next day he and Barnabas left for Derbe .
44014021	Paul and Barnabas preached the good news in the city of Derbe . They won large numbers of followers . Then they returned to Lystra , Iconium and Antioch .
44014022	There they helped the believers gain strength . They told them to remain true to what they had been taught . " We must go through many hard times to enter God's kingdom , " they said .
44014023	Paul and Barnabas appointed elders for them in each church . The elders had trusted in the Lord . Paul and Barnabas prayed and fasted . They placed the elders in the Lord's care .
44014024	After going through Pisidia , Paul and Barnabas came into Pamphylia .
44014025	They preached the word in Perga . Then they went down to Attalia .
44014026	From Attalia they sailed back to Antioch . That was where they had been committed to God's grace . They had now completed the work God had given them to do .
44014027	When they arrived at Antioch , they gathered the church together . They reported all that God had done through them . They told how he had opened the way for non-Jews to believe .
44014028	And they stayed there a long time with the believers .
44015001	Certain people came down from Judea to Antioch . Here is what they were teaching the believers . " Moses commanded you to be circumcised , " they said . " If you aren't , you can't be saved . "
44015002	But Paul and Barnabas didn't agree with this . They argued strongly with them . So Paul and Barnabas were appointed to go up to Jerusalem . Some other believers were chosen to go with them . They were supposed to see the apostles and elders about this question .
44015003	The church sent them on their way . As they traveled through Phoenicia and Samaria , they told how those who weren't Jews had turned to God . This news made all the believers very glad .
44015004	When they arrived in Jerusalem , the church welcomed them . The apostles and elders welcomed them too . Then Paul and Barnabas reported everything God had done through them .
44015005	Some of the believers were Pharisees . They stood up and said , " Those who aren't Jews must be circumcised . They must obey the law of Moses . "
44015006	The apostles and elders met to consider this question .
44015007	After they had talked it over , Peter got up and spoke to them . " Brothers , " he said , " you know that some time ago God chose me to take the good news to those who aren't Jews . He wanted them to hear the good news and believe .
44015008	God knows the human heart . By giving the Holy Spirit to non-Jews , he showed that he accepted them . He did the same for them as he had done for us .
44015009	He showed that there is no difference between us and them . He made their hearts pure because of their faith .
44015010	" Now then , why are you trying to test God ? You test him when you put a heavy load on the believers' shoulders . Our people of long ago couldn't carry that load . We can't either .
44015011	No ! We believe we are saved through the grace of our Lord Jesus . Those who aren't Jews are saved in the same way . "
44015012	Everyone became quiet as they listened to Barnabas and Paul . They were telling about the miraculous signs and wonders God had done through them among non-Jews .
44015013	When they finished , James spoke up . " Brothers , " he said , " listen to me .
44015014	Simon Peter has explained to us how God first showed his concern for those who aren't Jews . He chose some of them to be his very own people .
44015015	The prophets' words agree with that . They say ,
44015016	" ' After this I will return and rebuild David's fallen tent . I will rebuild what was destroyed . I will make it what it used to be .
44015017	Then the rest of the people can look to the Lord . This means all the non-Jews who belong to me . The Lord says this . He is the one who does these things . '
44015018	The Lord does things that have been known for a long time .
44015019	" Now here is my opinion . We should not make it hard for the non-Jews who are turning to God .
44015020	Here is what we should write to them . They must not eat food polluted by being offered to statues of gods . They must not commit sexual sins . They must not eat the meat of animals that have been choked to death . And they must not drink blood .
44015021	These laws of Moses have been preached in every city from the earliest times . They are read out loud in the synagogues every Sabbath day . "
44015022	Then the apostles , the elders and the whole church decided what to do . They would choose some of their own men . They would send them to Antioch with Paul and Barnabas . So they chose two leaders among the believers . Their names were Judas Barsabbas and Silas .
44015023	Here is the letter they sent with them . The apostles and elders , your brothers , are writing this letter . We are sending it to the non-Jewish believers in Antioch , Syria and Cilicia . Greetings .
44015024	We have heard that some of our people came to you and caused trouble . You were upset by what they said . But we had given them no authority to go .
44015025	So we all agreed to send our dear friends Barnabas and Paul to you . We chose some others to go with them .
44015026	Barnabas and Paul have put their lives in danger for the name of our Lord Jesus Christ .
44015027	So we are sending Judas and Silas with them . What they say will agree with this letter .
44015028	It seemed good to the Holy Spirit and to us not to give you a load that is too heavy . So here are a few basic rules .
44015029	Don't eat food that has been offered to statues of gods . Don't drink blood . Don't eat the meat of animals that have been choked to death . And don't commit sexual sins . You will do well to keep away from these things . Farewell .
44015030	The men were sent down to Antioch . There they gathered the church together . They gave the letter to them .
44015031	The people read it . They were glad for its message of hope .
44015032	Judas and Silas were prophets . They said many things to give strength and hope to the believers .
44015035	Paul and Barnabas remained in Antioch . There they and many others taught and preached the word of the Lord .
44015036	Some time later Paul spoke to Barnabas . " Let's go back to all the towns where we preached the word of the Lord , " he said . " Let's visit the believers and see how they are doing . "
44015037	Barnabas wanted to take John Mark with them .
44015038	But Paul didn't think it was wise to take him . Mark had deserted them in Pamphylia . He hadn't continued with them in their work .
44015039	Barnabas and Paul strongly disagreed with each other . So they went their separate ways . Barnabas took Mark and sailed for Cyprus .
44015040	But Paul chose Silas . The believers asked the Lord to give his grace to Paul and Silas as they went .
44015041	Paul traveled through Syria and Cilicia . He gave strength to the churches there .
44016001	Paul came to Derbe . Then he went on to Lystra . A believer named Timothy lived there . His mother was Jewish and a believer . His father was a Greek .
44016002	The believers at Lystra and Iconium said good things about Timothy .
44016003	Paul wanted to take him along on the journey . So he circumcised Timothy because of the Jews who lived in that area . They all knew that Timothy's father was a Greek .
44016004	Paul and his companions traveled from town to town . They reported what the apostles and elders in Jerusalem had decided . The people were supposed to obey what was in the report .
44016005	So the churches were made strong in the faith . The number of believers grew every day .
44016006	Paul and his companions traveled all through the area of Phrygia and Galatia . The Holy Spirit had kept them from preaching the word in Asia Minor .
44016007	They came to the border of Mysia . From there they tried to enter Bithynia . But the Spirit of Jesus would not let them .
44016008	So they passed by Mysia . Then they went down to Troas .
44016009	During the night Paul had a vision . He saw a man from Macedonia standing and begging him . " Come over to Macedonia ! " the man said . " Help us ! "
44016010	After Paul had seen the vision , we got ready at once to leave for Macedonia . We decided that God had called us to preach the good news there .
44016011	At Troas we got into a boat . We sailed straight for Samothrace . The next day we went on to Neapolis .
44016012	From there we traveled to Philippi , a Roman colony . It is an important city in that part of Macedonia . We stayed there several days .
44016013	On the Sabbath day we went outside the city gate . We walked down to the river . There we expected to find a place of prayer . We sat down and began to speak to the women who had gathered together .
44016014	One of those listening was a woman named Lydia . She was from the city of Thyatira . Her business was selling purple cloth . She was a worshiper of God . The Lord opened her heart to accept Paul's message .
44016015	She and her family were baptized . Then she invited us to her home . " Do you consider me a believer in the Lord ? " she asked . " If you do , come and stay at my house . " She succeeded in getting us to go home with her .
44016016	One day we were going to the place of prayer . On the way we were met by a female slave . She had a spirit that helped her to tell ahead of time what was going to happen . She earned a lot of money for her owners by telling fortunes .
44016017	The woman followed Paul and the rest of us around . She shouted , " These men serve the Most High God . They are telling you how to be saved . "
44016018	She kept this up for many days . Finally Paul became upset . Turning around , he spoke to the spirit . " In the name of Jesus Christ , " he said , " I command you to come out of her ! " At that very moment the spirit left her .
44016019	The female slave's owners realized that their hope of making money was gone . So they grabbed Paul and Silas . They dragged them into the market place to face the authorities .
44016020	They brought them to the judges . " These men are Jews , " her owners said . " They are making trouble in our city .
44016021	They are suggesting practices that are against Roman law . These are practices we can't accept or take part in . "
44016022	The crowd joined the attack against Paul and Silas . The judges ordered that Paul and Silas be stripped and beaten .
44016023	They were whipped without mercy . Then they were thrown into prison . The jailer was commanded to guard them carefully .
44016024	When he received his orders , he put Paul and Silas deep inside the prison . He fastened their feet so they couldn't get away .
44016025	About midnight Paul and Silas were praying . They were also singing hymns to God . The other prisoners were listening to them .
44016026	Suddenly there was a powerful earthquake . It shook the prison from top to bottom . All at once the prison doors flew open . Everybody's chains came loose .
44016027	The jailer woke up . He saw that the prison doors were open . He pulled out his sword and was going to kill himself . He thought the prisoners had escaped .
44016028	" Don't harm yourself ! " Paul shouted . " We are all here ! "
44016029	The jailer called out for some lights . He rushed in , shaking with fear . He fell down in front of Paul and Silas .
44016030	Then he brought them out . He asked , " Sirs , what must I do to be saved ? "
44016031	They replied , " Believe in the Lord Jesus . Then you and your family will be saved . "
44016032	They spoke the word of the Lord to him . They also spoke to all the others in his house .
44016033	At that hour of the night , the jailer took Paul and Silas and washed their wounds . Right away he and his whole family were baptized .
44016034	The jailer brought them into his house . He set a meal in front of them . He and his whole family were filled with joy . They had become believers in God .
44016035	Early in the morning the judges sent their officers to the jailer . They ordered him , " Let those men go . "
44016036	The jailer told Paul , " The judges have ordered me to set you and Silas free . You can leave now . Go in peace . "
44016037	But Paul replied to the officers . " They beat us in public , " he said . " We weren't given a trial . And we are Roman citizens ! They threw us into prison . And now do they want to get rid of us quietly ? No ! Let them come themselves and personally lead us out . "
44016038	The officers reported this to the judges . When the judges heard that Paul and Silas were Roman citizens , they became afraid .
44016039	So they came and said they were sorry . They led them out of the prison . Then they asked them to leave the city .
44016040	After Paul and Silas came out of the prison , they went to Lydia's house . There they met with the believers . They told them to be brave . Then they left .
44017001	Paul and Silas passed through Amphipolis and Apollonia . They came to Thessalonica . A Jewish synagogue was there .
44017002	Paul went into the synagogue as he usually did . For three Sabbath days in a row he talked about the Scriptures with the Jews .
44017003	He explained and proved that the Christ had to suffer and rise from the dead . " This Jesus I am telling you about is the Christ ! " he said .
44017004	His words won some of the Jews over . They joined Paul and Silas . A large number of Greeks who worshiped God joined them too . So did quite a few important women .
44017005	But the Jews were jealous . So they rounded up some evil fellows from the market place . Forming a crowd , they started all kinds of trouble in the city . The Jews rushed to Jason's house . They were looking for Paul and Silas . They wanted to bring them out to the crowd .
44017006	But they couldn't find them . So they dragged Jason and some other believers to the city officials . " These men have caused trouble all over the world , " they shouted . " Now they have come here .
44017007	Jason has welcomed them into his house . They are all disobeying Caesar's commands . They say there is another king . He is called Jesus . "
44017008	When the crowd and the city officials heard this , they became very upset .
44017009	They made Jason and the others give them money . They wanted to make sure they would return to the court . Then they let them go .
44017010	As soon as it was night , the believers sent Paul and Silas away to Berea . When they arrived , they went to the Jewish synagogue .
44017011	The Bereans were very glad to receive Paul's message . They studied the Scriptures carefully every day . They wanted to see if what Paul said was true . So they were more noble than the Thessalonians .
44017012	Many of the Jews believed . A number of important Greek women also became believers . And so did many Greek men .
44017013	The Jews in Thessalonica found out that Paul was preaching God's word in Berea . So they went there too . They stirred up the crowds and got them all worked up .
