45006010	When he died , he died once and for all time as far as sin is concerned . Now that he lives , he lives as far as God is concerned .
45006011	In the same way , consider yourselves to be dead as far as sin is concerned . Now that you believe in Christ Jesus , consider yourselves to be alive as far as God is concerned .
45006012	So don't let sin rule your body , which is going to die . Don't obey its evil longings .
45006013	Don't give the parts of your body to serve sin . Don't let them be used to do evil . Instead , give yourselves to God . You have been brought from death to life . Give the parts of your body to him to do what is right .
45006014	Sin will not be your master . Law does not rule you . God's grace has set you free .
45006015	What should we say then ? Should we sin because we are not ruled by law but by God's grace ? Not at all !
45006016	Don't you know that when you give yourselves to obey someone you become that person's slave ? You can be slaves of sin . Then you will die . Or you can be slaves who obey God . Then you will live a godly life .
45006017	You used to be slaves of sin . But thank God that with your whole heart you obeyed the teachings you were given !
45006018	You have been set free from sin . You have become slaves to right living .
45006019	Because you are human , you find this hard to understand . So I have said it in a way that will help you understand it . You used to give the parts of your body to be slaves to unclean living . You were becoming more and more evil . Now give your bodies to be slaves to right living . Then you will become holy .
45006020	Once you were slaves of sin . At that time right living did not control you .
45006021	What benefit did you gain from doing the things you are now ashamed of ? Those things lead to death !
45006022	You have been set free from sin . God has made you his slaves . The benefit you gain leads to holy living . And the end result is eternal life .
45006023	When you sin , the pay you get is death . But God gives you the gift of eternal life because of what Christ Jesus our Lord has done .
45007001	Brothers and sisters , I am speaking to you who know the law . Don't you know that the law has authority over us only as long as we are alive ?
45007002	For example , by law a married woman is joined to her husband as long as he is living . But suppose her husband dies . Then the marriage law no longer applies to her .
45007003	But suppose that married woman gets married again while her husband is still alive . Then she is called a woman who commits adultery . But suppose her husband dies . Then she is free from that law . She is not guilty of adultery even if she marries another man .
45007004	My brothers and sisters , when Christ died you also died as far as the law is concerned . Then it became possible for you to belong to him . He was raised from the dead . Now our lives can be useful to God .
45007005	Our sinful nature used to control us . The law stirred up sinful longings in our bodies . So the things we did resulted in death .
45007006	But now we have died to what used to control us . We have been set free from the law . Now we serve in the new way of the Holy Spirit . We no longer serve in the old way of the written law .
45007007	What should we say then ? That the law is sin ? Not at all ! I wouldn't have known what sin was unless the law had told me . The law said , " Do not want what belongs to other people . " If the law hadn't said that , I would not have known what it was like to want what belonged to others .
45007008	But the commandment gave sin an opportunity . Sin caused me to want all kinds of things that belonged to others . No one can break a law that doesn't exist .
45007009	Before I knew about the law , I was alive . But then the commandment came . Sin came to life , and I died .
45007010	I found that the commandment that was supposed to bring life actually brought death .
45007011	When the commandment gave sin the opportunity , sin tricked me . It used the commandment to put me to death .
45007012	So the law is holy . The commandment also is holy and right and good .
45007013	Did what is good cause me to die ? Not at all ! Sin had to be recognized for what it really is . So it produced death in me through what was good . Because of the commandment , sin became totally sinful .
45007014	We know that the law is holy . But I am not . I have been sold to be a slave of sin .
45007015	I don't understand what I do . I don't do what I want to do . Instead , I do what I hate to do .
45007016	I do what I don't want to do . So I agree that the law is good .
45007017	As it is , I am no longer the one who does these things . It is sin living in me that does them .
45007018	I know there is nothing good in my sinful nature . I want to do what is good , but I can't .
45007019	I don't do the good things I want to do . I keep on doing the evil things I don't want to do .
45007020	I do what I don't want to do . But I am not really the one who is doing it . It is sin living in me .
45007021	Here is the law I find working in me . When I want to do good , evil is right there with me .
45007022	Deep inside me I find joy in God's law .
45007023	But I see another law working in the parts of my body . It fights against the law of my mind . It makes me a prisoner of the law of sin . That law controls the parts of my body .
45007024	What a terrible failure I am ! Who will save me from this sin that brings death to my body ?
45007025	I give thanks to God . He will do it through Jesus Christ our Lord . So in my mind I am a slave to God's law . But in my sinful nature I am a slave to the law of sin .
45008001	Those who belong to Christ Jesus are no longer under God's sentence .
45008002	I am now controlled by the law of the Holy Spirit . That law gives me life because of what Christ Jesus has done . It has set me free from the law of sin that brings death .
45008003	The written law was made weak by our sinful nature . But God did what the written law could not do . He made his Son to be like those who have a sinful nature . He sent him to be an offering for sin . In that way , he judged sin in his Son's human body .
45008004	Now we can do everything the law requires . Our sinful nature no longer controls the way we live . The Holy Spirit now controls the way we live .
45008005	Don't live under the control of your sinful nature . If you do , you will think about what your sinful nature wants . Live under the control of the Holy Spirit . If you do , you will think about what the Spirit wants .
45008006	The way a sinful person thinks leads to death . But the mind controlled by the Spirit brings life and peace .
45008007	The sinful mind is at war with God . It does not obey God's law . It can't .
45008008	Those who are controlled by their sinful nature can't please God .
45008009	But your sinful nature does not control you . The Holy Spirit controls you . The Spirit of God lives in you . Anyone who does not have the Spirit of Christ does not belong to Christ .
45008010	Christ lives in you . So your body is dead because of sin . But your spirit is alive because you have been made right with God .
45008011	The Spirit of the One who raised Jesus from the dead is living in you . So the God who raised Christ from the dead will also give life to your bodies , which are going to die . He will do this by the power of his Spirit , who lives in you .
45008012	Brothers and sisters , we have a duty . Our duty is not to live under the control of our sinful nature .
45008013	If you live under the control of your sinful nature , you will die . But by the power of the Holy Spirit you can put to death the sins your body commits . Then you will live .
45008014	Those who are led by the Spirit of God are children of God .
45008015	You didn't receive a spirit that makes you a slave to fear once again . Instead you received the Holy Spirit , who makes you God's child . By the Spirit's power we call God " Abba . " Abba means Father .
45008016	The Spirit himself joins with our spirits . Together they give witness that we are God's children .
45008017	As his children , we will receive all that he has for us . We will share what Christ receives . But we must share in his sufferings if we want to share in his glory .
45008018	What we are suffering now is nothing compared with the glory that will be shown in us .
45008019	Everything God created looks forward to the time when his children will appear in their full and final glory .
45008020	The created world was bound to fail . But that was not the result of its own choice . It was planned that way by the One who made it . God planned
45008021	to set the created world free . He didn't want it to rot away completely . Instead , he wanted it to have the same glorious freedom that his children have .
45008022	We know that all that God created has been groaning . It is in pain as if it were giving birth to a child . The created world continues to groan even now .
45008023	And that's not all . We have the Holy Spirit as the promise of future blessing . But we also groan inside ourselves as we look forward to the time when God will adopt us as full members of his family . Then he will give us everything he has for us . He will raise our bodies and give glory to them .
45008024	That's the hope we had when we were saved . But hope that can be seen is no hope at all . Who hopes for what he already has ?
45008025	We hope for what we don't have yet . So we are patient as we wait for it .
45008026	In the same way , the Holy Spirit helps us when we are weak . We don't know what we should pray for . But the Spirit himself prays for us . He prays with groans too deep for words .
45008027	God , who looks into our hearts , knows the mind of the Spirit . And the Spirit prays for God's people just as God wants him to pray .
45008028	We know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him . He appointed them to be saved in keeping with his purpose .
45008029	God planned that those he had chosen would become like his Son . In that way , Christ will be the first and most honored among many brothers .
45008030	And those God has planned for , he has also appointed to be saved . Those he has appointed , he has made right with himself . To those he has made right with himself , he has given his glory .
45008031	What should we say then ? Since God is on our side , who can be against us ?
45008032	God did not spare his own Son . He gave him up for us all . Then won't he also freely give us everything else ?
45008033	Who can bring any charge against God's chosen ones ? God makes us right with himself .
45008034	Who can sentence us to death ? Christ Jesus is at the right hand of God and is also praying for us . He died . More than that , he was raised to life .
45008035	Who can separate us from Christ's love ? Can trouble or hard times or harm or hunger ? Can nakedness or danger or war ?
45008036	It is written , " Because of you , we face death all day long . We are considered as sheep to be killed . "
45008037	No ! In all these things we will do even more than win ! We owe it all to Christ , who has loved us .
45008038	I am absolutely sure that not even death or life can separate us from God's love . Not even angels or demons , the present or the future , or any powers can do that .
45008039	Not even the highest places or the lowest , or anything else in all creation can do that . Nothing at all can ever separate us from God's love because of what Christ Jesus our Lord has done .
45009001	I speak the truth in Christ . I am not lying . My mind tells me that what I say is true . It is guided by the Holy Spirit .
45009002	My heart is full of sorrow . My sadness never ends .
45009003	I am so concerned about my people , who are members of my own race . I am ready to be cursed , if that would help them . I am even willing to be separated from Christ .
45009004	They are the people of Israel . They have been adopted as God's children . God's glory belongs to them . So do the covenants . They received the law . They were taught to worship in the temple . They were given the promises .
45009005	The founders of our nation belong to them . Christ comes from their family line . He is God over all . May he always be praised ! Amen .
45009006	Their condition does not mean that God's word has failed . Not everyone in the family line of Israel really belongs to Israel .
45009007	Not everyone in Abraham's family line is really his child . Not at all ! Scripture says , " Your family line will continue through Isaac . "
45009008	In other words , God's children are not just Abraham's natural children . Instead , they are the children God promised to him . They are the ones considered to be Abraham's children .
45009009	God promised , " I will return at the appointed time . Sarah will have a son . "
45009010	And that's not all . Rebekah's children had the same father . He was our father Isaac .
45009011	Here is what happened . Rebekah's twins had not even been born . They hadn't done anything good or bad yet . So they show that God's purpose is based firmly on his free choice .
45009012	It was not because of anything they did but because of God's choice . So Rebekah was told , " The older son will serve the younger one . "
45009013	It is written , " I chose Jacob instead of Esau . "
45009014	What should we say then ? Is God unfair ? Not at all !
45009015	He said to Moses , " I will have mercy on whom I have mercy . I will show love to those I love . "
45009016	So it doesn't depend on what we want or do . It depends on God's mercy .
45009017	In Scripture , God says to Pharaoh , " I had a special reason for making you king . I decided to use you to show my power . I wanted my name to become known everywhere on earth . "
45009018	So God does what he wants to do . He shows mercy to one person and makes another stubborn .
45009019	One of you will say to me , " Then why does God still blame us ? Who can oppose what he wants to do ? "
45009020	But you are a mere man . So who are you to talk back to God ? Scripture says , " Can what is made say to the one who made it , ' Why did you make me like this ? ' "
45009021	Isn't the potter free to make different kinds of pots out of the same lump of clay ? Some are for special purposes . Others are for ordinary use .
45009022	What if God chose to show his great anger ? What if he chose to make his power known ? That is why he put up with people he was angry with . They had been made to be destroyed .
45009023	What if he did that to show the riches of his glory to others ? Those are the people he shows his mercy to . He had prepared them to receive his glory .
45009024	We are those people . He has chosen us . We do not come only from the Jewish race . Many of us are not Jews .
45009025	God says in Hosea , " I will call those who are not my people ' my people . ' I will call the one who is not my loved one ' my loved one . ' "
45009026	He also says , " Once it was said to them , ' You are not my people . ' In that very place they will be called ' children of the living God . ' "
45009027	Isaiah cries out concerning Israel . He says , " The number of people from Israel may be like the sand by the sea . But only a few of them will be saved .
45009028	The Lord will carry out his sentence . He will be quick to carry it out on earth , once and for all . "
45009029	Earlier Isaiah had said , " The Lord who rules over all left us children and grandchildren . If he hadn't , we would have become like Sodom . We would have been like Gomorrah . "
45009030	What should we say then ? Those who aren't Jews did not look for a way to be right with God . But they found it by having faith .
45009031	Israel did look for a law that could make them right with God . But they didn't find it .
45009032	Why not ? Because they didn't look for it by faith . They tried to get it by working for it . They tripped over the stone that causes people to trip and fall .
45009033	It is written , " Look ! In Zion I am laying a stone that causes people to trip . It is a rock that makes them fall . The one who trusts in him will never be put to shame . "
45010001	Brothers and sisters , with all my heart I long for the people of Israel to be saved . I pray to God for them .
45010002	I can give witness about them that they really want to serve God . But how they are trying to do it is not based on what they know .
45010003	They didn't know how God makes people right with himself . They tried to get right with God in their own way . They didn't do it in God's way .
45010004	Christ has completed the law . So now everyone who believes can be right with God .
45010005	Moses explained how the law could help a person do what God requires . He said , " The one who does those things will live by them . "
45010006	But the way to do what God requires must begin by having faith in him . Scripture says , " Do not say in your heart , ' Who will go up into heaven ? ' " That means to go up into heaven and bring Christ down .
45010007	" And do not say , ' Who will go down into the grave ? ' " That means to bring Christ up from the dead .
45010008	But what does it say ? " The word is near you . It's in your mouth and in your heart . " That means the word we are preaching . You must put your faith in it .
45010009	Say with your mouth , " Jesus is Lord . " Believe in your heart that God raised him from the dead . Then you will be saved .
45010010	With your heart you believe and are made right with God . With your mouth you say that Jesus is Lord . And so you are saved .
45010011	Scripture says , " The one who trusts in him will never be put to shame . "
45010012	There is no difference between those who are Jews and those who are not . The same Lord is Lord of all . He richly blesses everyone who calls on him .
45010013	Scripture says , " Everyone who calls on the name of the Lord will be saved . "
45010014	How can they call on him unless they believe in him ? How can they believe in him unless they hear about him ? How can they hear about him unless someone preaches to them ?
45010015	And how can anyone preach without being sent ? It is written , " How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news ! "
45010016	But not all the people of Israel accepted the good news . Isaiah says , " Lord , who has believed our message ? "
45010017	So faith comes from hearing the message . And the message that is heard is the word of Christ .
45010018	But I ask , " Didn't the people of Israel hear ? " Of course they did . It is written , " Their voice has gone out into the whole earth . Their words have gone out from one end of the world to the other . "
45010019	Again I ask , " Didn't Israel understand ? " First , Moses says , " I will use people who are not a nation to make you jealous . I will use a nation that has no understanding to make you angry . "
45010020	Then Isaiah boldly speaks about what God says . God said , " I was found by those who were not trying to find me . I made myself known to those who were not asking for me . "
45010021	But Isaiah also speaks about what God says concerning Israel . God said , " All day long I have held out my hands . I have held them out to a stubborn people who do not obey me . "
45011001	So here is what I ask . Did God turn his back on his people ? Not at all ! I myself belong to Israel . I am one of Abraham's children . I am from the tribe of Benjamin .
45011002	God didn't turn his back on his people . After all , he chose them . Don't you know what Scripture says about Elijah ? He complained to God about Israel .
45011003	He said , " Lord , they have killed your prophets . They have torn down your altars . I'm the only one left . And they are trying to kill me . "
45011004	How did God answer him ? God said , " I have kept 7,000 people for myself . They have not bowed down to Baal . "
45011005	Some are also faithful today . They have been chosen by God's grace .
45011006	And if they are chosen by grace , it is no longer a matter of working for it . If it were , grace wouldn't be grace anymore .
45011007	What should we say then ? Israel did not receive what they wanted so badly . But those who were chosen did . God made the rest of them stubborn .
45011008	It is written , " God made it hard for them to understand . He gave them eyes that could not see . He gave them ears that could not hear . And they are still like that today . "
45011009	David says , " Let their feast be a trap and a snare . Let it make Israel trip and fall . Let Israel get what's coming to them .
45011010	Let their eyes grow dark so they can't see . Let their backs be bent forever . "
45011011	Again , here is what I ask . They didn't trip and fall once and for all time , did they ? Not at all ! Because Israel sinned , those who aren't Jews can be saved . That will make Israel jealous of them .
45011012	Israel's sin brought riches to the world . Their loss brought riches to the non-Jews . What greater riches will come when all Israel turns to God !
45011013	I am talking to you who are not Jews . I am the apostle to the non-Jews . So I think the work I do for God and others is very important .
45011014	I hope somehow to stir up my own people to want what you have . Perhaps I can save some of them .
45011015	When they were not accepted , it became possible for the whole world to be brought back to God . So what will happen when they are accepted ? It will be like life from the dead .
45011016	The first handful of dough that is offered is holy . This makes all of the dough holy . If the root is holy , so are the branches .
45011017	Some of the natural branches have been broken off . You are a wild olive branch . But you have been joined to the tree with the other branches . Now you enjoy the life-giving sap of the olive tree root .
45011018	So don't think you are better than the other branches . Remember , you don't give life to the root . The root gives life to you .
45011019	You will say , " Some branches were broken off so that I could be joined to the tree . "
45011020	That's true . But they were broken off because they didn't believe . You stand only because you do believe . So don't be proud . Be afraid .
45011021	God didn't spare the natural branches . He won't spare you either .
45011022	Think about how kind God is ! Also think about how firm he is ! He was hard on those who stopped following him . But he is kind to you . So you must continue to live in his kindness . If you don't , you also will be cut off .
45011023	If the people of Israel do not continue in their unbelief , they will again be joined to the tree . God is able to join them to the tree again .
45011024	After all , weren't you cut from a wild olive tree ? Weren't you joined to an olive tree that was taken care of ? And wasn't that the opposite of how things should be done ? How much more easily will the natural branches be joined to their own olive tree !
45011025	Brothers and sisters , here is a mystery I want you to understand . It will keep you from being proud . Part of Israel has refused to obey God . That will continue until the full number of non-Jews has entered God's kingdom .
45011026	And so all Israel will be saved . It is written , " The One who saves will come from Mount Zion . He will remove sin from Jacob .
45011027	Here is my covenant with them . I will take away their sins . "
45011028	As far as the good news is concerned , the people of Israel are enemies . That is for your good . But as far as God's choice is concerned , the people of Israel are loved . That is because of God's promises to the founders of our nation .
45011029	God does not take back his gifts . He does not change his mind about those he has chosen .
45011030	At one time you did not obey God . But now you have received mercy because Israel did not obey .
45011031	In the same way , Israel has not been obeying God . But now they receive mercy because of God's mercy to you .
45011032	God has found everyone guilty of not obeying him . So now he can have mercy on everyone .
45011033	How very rich are God's wisdom and knowledge ! How he judges is more than we can understand ! The way he deals with people is more than we can know !
45011034	" Who can ever know what is in the Lord's mind ? Or who can ever give him advice ? "
45011035	" Has anyone ever given anything to God , so that God has to pay him back ? "
45011036	All things come from him . All things are directed by him . All things are for his good . May God be given the glory forever ! Amen .
45012001	Brothers and sisters , God has shown you his mercy . So I am asking you to offer up your bodies to him while you are still alive . Your bodies are a holy sacrifice that is pleasing to God . When you offer your bodies to God , you are worshiping him .
45012002	Don't live any longer the way this world lives . Let your way of thinking be completely changed . Then you will be able to test what God wants for you . And you will agree that what he wants is right . His plan is good and pleasing and perfect .
45012003	God's grace has been given to me . So here is what I say to every one of you . Don't think of yourself more highly than you should . Be reasonable when you think about yourself . Keep in mind the amount of faith God has given you .
45012004	Each of us has one body with many parts . And the parts do not all have the same purpose .
45012005	So also we are many persons . But in Christ we are one body . And each part of the body belongs to all the other parts .
45012006	We all have gifts . They differ in keeping with the grace that God has given each of us . Do you have the gift of prophecy ? Then use it in keeping with the faith you have .
45012007	Is it your gift to serve ? Then serve . Is it teaching ? Then teach .
45012008	Is it telling others how they should live ? Then tell them . Is it giving to those who are in need ? Then give freely . Is it being a leader ? Then work hard at it . Is it showing mercy ? Then do it cheerfully .
45012009	Love must be honest and true . Hate what is evil . Hold on to what is good .
45012010	Love each other deeply . Honor others more than yourselves .
45012011	Never let the fire in your heart go out . Keep it alive . Serve the Lord .
45012012	When you hope , be joyful . When you suffer , be patient . When you pray , be faithful .
45012013	Share with God's people who are in need . Welcome others into your homes .
45012014	Bless those who hurt you . Bless them , and do not call down curses on them .
45012015	Be joyful with those who are joyful . Be sad with those who are sad .
45012016	Agree with each other . Don't be proud . Be willing to be a friend of people who aren't considered important . Don't think that you are better than others .
45012017	Don't pay back evil with evil . Be careful to do what everyone thinks is right .
45012018	If possible , live in peace with everyone . Do that as much as you can .
45012019	My friends , don't try to get even . Leave room for God to show his anger . It is written , " I am the One who judges people . I will pay them back , " says the Lord .
45012020	Do just the opposite . Scripture says , " If your enemies are hungry , give them food to eat . If they are thirsty , give them something to drink . By doing those things , you will pile up burning coals on their heads . "
45012021	Don't let evil overcome you . Overcome evil by doing good .
45013001	All of you must be willing to obey completely those who rule over you . There are no authorities except the ones God has chosen . Those who now rule have been chosen by God .
45013002	So when you oppose the authorities , you are opposing those whom God has appointed . Those who do that will be judged .
45013003	If you do what is right , you won't need to be afraid of your rulers . But watch out if you do what is wrong ! You don't want to be afraid of those in authority , do you ? Then do what is right . The one in authority will praise you .
45013004	He serves God and will do you good . But if you do wrong , watch out ! The ruler doesn't carry a sword for no reason at all . He serves God . And God is carrying out his anger through him . The ruler punishes anyone who does wrong .
45013005	You must obey the authorities . Then you will not be punished . You must also obey them because you know it is right .
45013006	That's also why you pay taxes . The authorities serve God . Ruling takes up all their time .
45013007	Give to everyone what you owe . Do you owe taxes ? Then pay them . Do you owe anything else to the government ? Then pay it . Do you owe respect ? Then give it . Do you owe honor ? Then show it .
45013008	Pay everything you owe . But you can never pay back all the love you owe each other . Those who love others have done everything the law requires .
45013009	Here are some commandments to think about . " Do not commit adultery . " " Do not commit murder . " " Do not steal . " " Do not want what belongs to others . " These and other commandments are all included in one rule . Here's what it is . " Love your neighbor as you love yourself . "
45013010	Love does not harm its neighbor . So love does everything the law requires .
45013011	When you do those things , keep in mind the times we are living in . The hour has come for you to wake up from your sleep . Our full salvation is closer now than it was when we first believed in Christ .
45013012	The dark night of evil is nearly over . The day of Christ's return is almost here . So let us get rid of the works of darkness . Let us put on the armor of light .
45013013	Let us act as we should , like people living in the daytime . Have nothing to do with wild parties . Don't get drunk . Don't take part in sexual sins or evil conduct . Don't fight with each other . Don't be jealous of anyone .
45013014	Instead , put on the Lord Jesus Christ as your clothing . Don't think about how to satisfy what your sinful nature wants .
45014001	Accept those whose faith is weak . Don't judge them where you have differences of opinion .
45014002	The faith of some people allows them to eat anything . But others eat only vegetables because their faith is weak .
45014003	People who eat everything must not look down on those who do not . And people who don't eat everything must not judge those who do . God has accepted them .
45014004	Who are you to judge someone else's servants ? Whether they are faithful or not is their own master's concern . They will be faithful , because the Lord has the power to make them faithful .
45014005	Some people consider one day to be more holy than another . Others think all days are the same . Each person should be absolutely sure in his own mind .
45014006	Those who think one day is special do it to honor the Lord . Those who eat meat do it to honor the Lord . They give thanks to God . Those who don't eat meat do it to honor the Lord . They also give thanks to God .
45014007	We don't live for ourselves alone . And we don't die all by ourselves .
45014008	If we live , we live to honor the Lord . If we die , we die to honor the Lord . So whether we live or die , we belong to the Lord .
45014009	Christ died and came back to life . He did this to become the Lord of both the dead and the living .
45014010	Now then , who are you to judge your brother or sister ? Why do you look down on them ? We will all stand in God's courtroom to be judged .
45014011	It is written , " ' You can be sure that I live , ' says the Lord . ' And you can be just as sure that every knee will bow down in front of me . Every tongue will tell the truth to God . ' "
45014012	So we will all have to explain to God the things we have done .
45014013	Let us stop judging one another . Instead , make up your mind not to put anything in your brother's way that would make him trip and fall .
45014014	I am absolutely sure that no food is " unclean " in itself . I say this as one who belongs to the Lord Jesus . But some people may consider a thing to be " unclean . " If they do , it is " unclean " for them .
45014015	Your brothers and sisters may be upset by what you eat . If they are , you are no longer acting as though you love them . So don't destroy them by what you eat . Christ died for them .
45014016	Don't let something you consider good be spoken of as if it were evil .
45014017	God's kingdom has nothing to do with eating or drinking . It is a matter of being right with God . It brings the peace and joy the Holy Spirit gives .
45014018	Those who serve Christ in this way are pleasing to God . They are pleasing to people too .
45014019	So let us do all we can to live in peace . And let us work hard to build each other up .
45014020	Don't destroy the work of God because of food . All food is " clean . " But it is wrong for you to eat anything that causes someone else to trip and fall .
45014021	Don't eat meat if it will cause your brothers and sisters to fall . Don't drink wine or do anything else that will make them fall .
45014022	No matter what you think about those things , keep it between yourself and God . Blessed are those who do not have to feel guilty for what they allow .
45014023	But those who have doubts are guilty if they eat . Their eating is not based on faith . Everything that is not based on faith is sin .
45015001	We who have strong faith should help the weak with their problems . We should not please only ourselves .
45015002	We should all please our neighbors . Let us do what is good for them . Let us build them up .
45015003	Even Christ did not please himself . It is written , " Those who make fun of you have made fun of me also . "
45015004	Everything that was written in the past was written to teach us . The Scriptures give us strength to go on . They cheer us up and give us hope .
45015005	Our God is a God who strengthens you and cheers you up . May he help you agree with each other as you follow Christ Jesus .
45015006	Then you can give glory to God with one heart and voice . He is the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ .
45015007	Christ has accepted you . So accept one another in order to bring praise to God .
45015008	I tell you that Christ has become a servant of the Jews . He teaches us that God is true . He shows us that God will keep the promises he made to the founders of our nation .
45015009	Jesus became a servant of the Jews so that people who are not Jews could give glory to God for his mercy . It is written , " I will praise you among those who aren't Jews . I will sing praises to you . "
45015010	Again it says , " You non-Jews , be full of joy . Be joyful together with God's people . "
45015011	And again it says , " All you non-Jews , praise the Lord . All you nations , sing praises to him . "
45015012	And Isaiah says , " The Root of Jesse will grow up quickly . He will rule over the nations . Those who aren't Jews will put their hope in him . "
45015013	May the God who gives hope fill you with great joy . May you have perfect peace as you trust in him . May the power of the Holy Spirit fill you with hope .
45015014	My brothers and sisters , I am sure that you are full of goodness . What you know is complete . You are able to teach one another .
45015015	I have written to you very boldly about some things . I wanted you to think about them again . The grace of God has allowed me
45015016	to serve Christ Jesus among those who aren't Jews . My duty as a priest is to preach God's good news . Then the non-Jews will become an offering that pleases God . The Holy Spirit will make the offering holy .
45015017	Because I belong to Christ Jesus , I can take pride in my work for God .
45015018	I will not try to speak of anything except what Christ has done through me . He has been leading those who aren't Jews to obey God . He has been doing this by what I have said and done .
45015019	He has given me power to do signs and miracles . He has given me the power of the Holy Spirit . From Jerusalem all the way around to Illyricum I have finished preaching the good news about Christ .
45015020	I have always wanted to preach the good news where Christ was not known . I don't want to build on what someone else has started .
45015021	It is written , " Those who were not told about him will understand . Those who have not heard will know what it all means . "
45015022	That's why I have often been kept from coming to you .
45015023	Now there is no more place for me to work in those areas . For many years I have been longing to see you .
45015024	So I plan to see you when I go to Spain . I hope to visit you while I am passing through . And I hope you will help me on my journey there . But first I want to enjoy being with you for a while .
45015025	Now I am on my way to Jerusalem to serve God's people there .
45015026	The believers in Macedonia and Achaia were pleased to take an offering for those who were poor among God's people in Jerusalem .
45015027	They were happy to do it . And of course they owe it to them . Those who aren't Jews have shared from the Jews' spiritual blessings . So the non-Jews should share their earthly blessings with the Jews .
45015028	I want to finish my task . I want to make sure that the poor in Jerusalem have received the offering . Then I will go to Spain . On my way I will visit you .
45015029	I know that when I come to you , I will come with the full blessing of Christ .
45015030	Brothers and sisters , I am asking you through the authority of our Lord Jesus Christ to join me in my struggle by praying to God for me . Pray for me with the love the Holy Spirit provides .
45015031	Pray that I will be saved from those in Judea who do not believe . Pray that my work in Jerusalem will be accepted by God's people there .
45015032	Then , as God has planned , I will come to you with joy . Together we will be renewed .
45015033	May the God who gives peace be with you all . Amen .
45016001	I would like you to welcome our sister Phoebe . She serves the church in Cenchrea .
45016002	I ask you to receive her as one who belongs to the Lord . Receive her in the way God's people should . Give her any help she may need from you . She has been a great help to many people , including me .
45016003	Greet Priscilla and Aquila . They work together with me in serving Christ Jesus .
45016004	They have put their lives in danger for me . I am thankful for them . So are all the non-Jewish churches .
45016005	Greet also the church that meets in the house of Priscilla and Aquila . Greet my dear friend Epenetus . He was the first person in Asia Minor to become a believer in Christ .
45016006	Greet Mary . She worked very hard for you .
45016007	Greet Andronicus and Junias , my relatives . They have been in prison with me . They are leaders among the apostles . They became believers in Christ before I did .
45016008	Greet Ampliatus . I love him as a brother in the Lord .
45016009	Greet Urbanus . He works together with me in serving Christ . And greet my dear friend Stachys .
45016010	Greet Apelles . Even though he was put to the test , he remained faithful as one who belonged to Christ . Greet those who live in the house of Aristobulus .
45016011	Greet Herodion , my relative . Greet the believers who live in the house of Narcissus .
45016012	Greet Tryphena and Tryphosa . Those women work hard for the Lord . Greet my dear friend Persis . She is another woman who has worked very hard for the Lord .
45016013	Greet Rufus . He is a choice believer in the Lord . And greet his mother . She has been like a mother to me too .
