45016015	Greet Philologus , Julia , Nereus and his sister . Greet Olympas and all of God's people with them .
45016016	Greet one another with a holy kiss . All the churches of Christ send their greetings .
45016017	I am warning you , brothers and sisters , to watch out for those who try to keep you from staying together . They want to trip you up . They teach you things opposite to what you have learned . Stay away from them .
45016018	People like that are not serving Christ our Lord . They are serving only themselves . With smooth talk and with words they don't mean they fool people who don't know any better .
45016019	Everyone has heard that you obey God . So you have filled me with joy . I want you to be wise about what is good . And I want you to have nothing to do with what is evil .
45016020	The God who gives peace will soon crush Satan under your feet . May the grace of our Lord Jesus be with you .
45016021	Timothy works together with me . He sends his greetings to you . So do Lucius , Jason and Sosipater , my relatives .
45016022	I , Tertius , wrote down this letter . I greet you as a believer in the Lord .
45016025	May God receive glory . He is able to strengthen your faith because of the good news I preach . It is the message about Jesus Christ . It is in keeping with the mystery that was hidden for a very long time .
45016026	The mystery has now been made known through the writings of the prophets . The eternal God commanded that it be made known . He wanted all nations to believe and obey him .
45016027	May the only wise God receive glory forever through Jesus Christ . Amen .
46001001	I , Paul , am writing this letter . I have been chosen to be an apostle of Christ Jesus just as God planned . Our brother Sosthenes joins me in writing .
46001002	We are sending this letter to you , the members of God's church in Corinth . You have been made holy because you belong to Christ Jesus . God has chosen you to be his holy people . He has done the same for all those everywhere who pray to our Lord Jesus Christ . Jesus is their Lord and ours .
46001003	May God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ give you grace and peace .
46001004	I always thank God for you . I thank him because of the grace he has given to you who belong to Christ Jesus .
46001005	You have been blessed in every way because of him . All your teaching of the truth is better . Your understanding of it is more complete .
46001006	Our witness about Christ has been proved to be true in you .
46001007	There is no gift of the Holy Spirit that you don't have . You are full of hope as you wait for our Lord Jesus Christ to come again .
46001008	God will keep you strong to the very end . Then you will be without blame on the day our Lord Jesus Christ returns .
46001009	God is faithful . He has chosen you to share life with his Son , Jesus Christ our Lord .
46001010	Brothers and sisters , I ask all of you to agree with one another . I make my appeal in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ . Then you won't take sides . You will be in complete agreement in all that you think .
46001011	My brothers and sisters , some people who live in Chloe's house have told me you are arguing with each other .
46001012	Here is what I mean . One of you says , " I follow Paul . " Another says , " I follow Apollos . " Another says , " I follow Peter . " And still another says , " I follow Christ . "
46001013	Does Christ take sides ? Did Paul die on the cross for you ? Were you baptized in the name of Paul ?
46001014	I'm thankful that I didn't baptize any of you except Crispus and Gaius .
46001015	No one can say that you were baptized in my name .
46001016	It's true that I also baptized those who live in the house of Stephanas . Besides that , I don't remember if I baptized anyone else .
46001017	Christ did not send me to baptize . He sent me to preach the good news . He commanded me not to use the kind of wisdom that people commonly use . That would take all the power away from the cross of Christ .
46001018	The message of the cross seems foolish to those who are lost and dying . But it is God's power to us who are being saved .
46001019	It is written , " I will destroy the wisdom of those who are wise . I will do away with the cleverness of those who think they are so smart . "
46001020	Where is the wise person ? Where is the educated person ? Where are the great thinkers of this world ? Hasn't God made the wisdom of the world foolish ?
46001021	God wisely planned that the world would not know him through its own wisdom . It pleased God to use the foolish things we preach to save those who believe .
46001022	Jews require miraculous signs . Greeks look for wisdom .
46001023	But we preach about Christ and his death on the cross . That is very hard for Jews to accept . And everyone else thinks it's foolish .
46001024	But there are those God has chosen , both Jews and others . To them Christ is God's power and God's wisdom .
46001025	The foolish things of God are wiser than human wisdom . The weakness of God is stronger than human strength .
46001026	Brothers and sisters , think of what you were when God chose you . Not many of you were considered wise by human standards . Not many of you were powerful . Not many of you belonged to important families .
46001027	But God chose the foolish things of the world to shame the wise . He chose the weak things of the world to shame the strong .
46001028	God chose the things of this world that are common and looked down on . He chose what is not considered to be important to do away with what is considered to be important .
46001029	So no one can brag to God .
46001030	Because of what God has done , you belong to Christ Jesus . He has become God's wisdom for us . He makes us right with God . He makes us holy and sets us free .
46001031	It is written , " The one who brags should brag about what the Lord has done . "
46002001	Brothers and sisters , when I came to you I didn't come with fancy words or great wisdom . I preached to you the truth about God's love .
46002002	I made up my mind to pay attention to only one thing while I was with you . That one thing was Jesus Christ and his death on the cross .
46002003	When I came to you , I was weak and afraid and trembling all over .
46002004	I didn't preach my message with clever and compelling words . As I preached , the Holy Spirit showed his power .
46002005	That was so you would believe not because of human wisdom but because of God's power .
46002006	The words we speak to those who have grown in the faith are wise . Our words are different from the words of the wise people or rulers of this world . People like that aren't going anywhere .
46002007	No , we speak about God's secret wisdom . His wisdom has been hidden . But before time began , God planned that his wisdom would bring us heavenly glory .
46002008	None of the rulers of this world understood God's wisdom . If they had , they would not have nailed the Lord of glory to the cross .
46002009	It is written , " No eye has seen , no ear has heard , no mind has known what God has prepared for those who love him . "
46002010	But God has shown it to us through his Spirit . The Spirit understands all things . He understands even the deep things of God .
46002011	Who can know the thoughts of another person ? Only a person's own spirit can know them . In the same way , only the Spirit of God knows God's thoughts .
46002012	We have not received the spirit of the world . We have received the Spirit who is from God . The Spirit helps us understand what God has freely given us .
46002013	That is what we speak about . We don't use words taught to us by people . We use words taught to us by the Holy Spirit . We use the words of the Spirit to teach the truths of the Spirit .
46002014	Some people don't have the Holy Spirit . They don't accept the things that come from the Spirit of God . Things like that are foolish to them . They can't understand them . In fact , such things can't be understood without the Spirit's help .
46002015	Everyone who has the Spirit can judge all things . But no one can judge those who have the Spirit . It is written ,
46002016	" Who can ever know what is in the Lord's mind ? Can anyone ever teach him ? " But we have the mind of Christ .
46003001	Brothers and sisters , I couldn't speak to you as if you were guided by the Holy Spirit . I had to speak to you as if you were following the ways of the world . You aren't growing as Christ wants you to . You are still like babies .
46003002	The words I spoke to you were like milk , not like solid food . You weren't ready for solid food yet . And you still aren't ready for it .
46003003	You are still following the ways of the world . Some of you are jealous . Some of you argue . So aren't you following the ways of the world ? Aren't you acting like ordinary human beings ?
46003004	One of you says , " I follow Paul . " Another says , " I follow Apollos . " Aren't you acting like ordinary human beings ?
46003005	After all , what is Apollos ? And what is Paul ? We are only people who serve . We helped you to believe . The Lord has given each of us our own work to do .
46003006	I planted the seed . Apollos watered it . But God made it grow .
46003007	So the one who plants is not important . The one who waters is not important . It is God who makes things grow . He is the One who is important .
46003008	The one who plants and the one who waters have the same purpose . The Lord will give each of us a reward for our work .
46003009	We work together with God . You are like God's field . You are like his building .
46003010	God has given me the grace to lay a foundation as a master builder . Now someone else is building on it . But each one should build carefully .
46003011	No one can lay any other foundation than the one that has already been laid . That foundation is Jesus Christ .
46003012	A person may build on it using gold , silver , jewels , wood , hay or straw .
46003013	But each person's work will be shown for what it is . On judgment day it will be brought to light . It will be put through fire . The fire will test how good everyone's work is .
46003014	If the building doesn't burn up , God will give the builder a reward for his work .
46003015	If the building burns up , the builder will lose everything . The builder will be saved , but only like one escaping through the flames .
46003016	Don't you know that you yourselves are God's temple ? God's Spirit lives in you .
46003017	If anyone destroys God's temple , God will destroy him . God's temple is holy . And you are that temple .
46003018	Don't fool yourselves . Suppose some of you think you are wise by the standards of the world . Then you should become a " fool " so that you can become wise .
46003019	The wisdom of this world is foolish in God's eyes . It is written , " God catches wise people in their own tricks . "
46003020	It is also written , " The Lord knows that the thoughts of the wise don't amount to anything . "
46003021	So no more bragging about human beings ! All things are yours .
46003022	That means Paul or Apollos or Peter or the world or life or death or the present or the future . All are yours .
46003023	You are joined to Christ and belong to him . And Christ is joined to God .
46004001	Here is how you should think of us . We serve Christ . We are trusted with God's secret truth .
46004002	Those who have been given a trust must prove that they are faithful .
46004003	I care very little if I am judged by you or by any human court . I don't even judge myself .
46004004	I don't feel I have done anything wrong . But that doesn't mean I'm not guilty . The Lord judges me .
46004005	So don't judge anything before the appointed time . Wait until the Lord returns . He will bring to light what is hidden in the dark . He will show the real reasons why people do what they do . At that time each person will receive praise from God .
46004006	Brothers and sisters , I have used myself and Apollos as examples to help you . You can learn from us the meaning of the saying , " Don't go beyond what is written . " Then you won't be proud that you follow one person instead of another .
46004007	Who makes you different from anyone else ? What do you have that you did not receive ? And if you did receive it , why do you brag as though you did not ?
46004008	You already have everything you want , don't you ? Have you already become rich ? Have you begun to rule as kings ? And did you do that without us ? I wish that you really had begun to rule . Then we could rule with you !
46004009	It seems to me that God has put us apostles on display at the end of a parade . We are like men sentenced to die in front of a crowd . We have been made a show for the whole creation to see . Angels and people are staring at us .
46004010	We are fools for Christ . But you are so wise in Christ ! We are weak . But you are so strong ! You are honored . But we are looked down on !
46004011	Up to this very hour we are hungry and thirsty . We are dressed in rags . We are being treated badly . We have no homes .
46004012	We work hard with our own hands . When others call down a curse on us , we bless them . When we are attacked , we put up with it .
46004013	When others say bad things about us , we answer kindly . Up to this moment we have become the world's garbage . We are everybody's trash .
46004014	I am not writing this to shame you . You are my dear children , and I want to warn you .
46004015	You may have 10,000 believers in Christ watching over you . But you don't have many fathers . I became your father by serving Christ Jesus and telling you the good news .
46004016	So I'm asking you to follow my example .
46004017	That's the reason I'm sending Timothy to you . He is like a son to me , and I love him . He is faithful in serving the Lord . He will remind you of my way of life in serving Christ Jesus . And that agrees with what I teach everywhere in every church .
46004018	Some of you have become proud . You act as if I weren't coming to you .
46004019	But I will come very soon , if that's what the Lord wants . Then I will find out how those proud people are talking . I will also find out what power they have .
46004020	The kingdom of God is not a matter of talk . It is a matter of power .
46004021	Which do you want ? Should I come to you with a whip ? Or should I come in love and with a gentle spirit ?
46005001	It is actually reported that there is sexual sin among you . I'm told that a man is living with his father's wife and is having sex with her . Even people who do not know God don't commit that sin .
46005002	And you are proud ! Shouldn't you be filled with sadness instead ? Shouldn't you have put the man who did that out of your church ?
46005003	Even though I am not right there with you , I am with you in spirit . And I have already judged the one who did that , just as if I were there .
46005004	When you come together in the name of our Lord Jesus , I will be with you in spirit . The power of our Lord Jesus will also be with you .
46005005	When you come together like that , hand that man over to Satan . Then his sinful nature will be destroyed . His spirit will be saved on the day the Lord returns .
46005006	Your bragging is not good . It is like yeast . Don't you know that just a little yeast works its way through the whole batch of dough ?
46005007	Get rid of the old yeast . Be like a new batch of dough without yeast . That is what you really are , because Christ has been offered up for us . He is our Passover lamb .
46005008	So let us keep the Feast , but not with the old yeast . I'm talking about yeast that is full of hatred and evil . Let us keep the Feast with bread made without yeast . Let us do it with bread that is honest and true .
46005009	I wrote a letter to you to tell you to stay away from people who commit sexual sins .
46005010	I didn't mean the people of this world who sin that way or who always want more and more . I didn't mean those who cheat or who worship statues of gods . In that case you would have to leave this world !
46005011	But here is what I am writing to you . You must stay away from anyone who claims to be a believer but who does those things . Stay away from anyone who commits sexual sins or who always wants more and more things . Stay away from a person who worships statues of gods or who tells lies about others . Stay away from anyone who gets drunk or who cheats . Don't even eat with a person like that .
46005012	Is it my business to judge those outside the church ? Aren't you supposed to judge those inside the church ?
46005013	God will judge those outside . Scripture says , " Get rid of that evil person ! "
46006001	Suppose one of you wants to bring a charge against another believer . Should you take it to the ungodly to be judged ? Why not take it to God's people ?
46006002	Don't you know that God's people will judge the world ? And if you are going to judge the world , aren't you able to judge small cases ?
46006003	Don't you know that we will judge angels ? Then we should be able to judge the things of this life even more !
46006004	So if you want to press charges in matters like that , appoint as judges members of the church who aren't very important !
46006005	I say this to shame you . Is it possible that no one among you is wise enough to judge matters between believers ?
46006006	Instead , one believer goes to court against another . And this happens in front of unbelievers !
46006007	The very fact that you take another believer to court means you have lost the battle already . Why not be treated wrongly ? Why not be cheated ?
46006008	Instead , you yourselves cheat and do wrong . And you do it to your brothers and sisters .
46006009	Don't you know that evil people will not receive God's kingdom ? Don't be fooled . Those who commit sexual sins will not receive the kingdom . Neither will those who worship statues of gods or commit adultery . Neither will men who are prostitutes or who commit homosexual acts .
46006010	Neither will thieves or those who always want more and more . Neither will those who are often drunk or tell lies or cheat . People who live like that will not receive God's kingdom .
46006011	Some of you used to do those things . But your sins were washed away . You were made holy . You were made right with God . All of that was done in the name of the Lord Jesus Christ and by the Spirit of our God .
46006012	Some of you say , " Everything is permitted for me . " But not everything is good for me . Again some of you say , " Everything is permitted for me . " But I will not be controlled by anything .
46006013	Some of you say , " Food is for the stomach . And the stomach is for food . " But God will destroy both of them . The body is not meant for sexual sins . The body is meant for the Lord . And the Lord is meant for the body .
46006014	By his power God raised the Lord from the dead . He will also raise us up .
46006015	Don't you know that your bodies belong to the body of Christ ? Should I take what belongs to Christ and join it to a prostitute ? Never !
46006016	Don't you know that when you join yourself to a prostitute , you become one with her in body ? Scripture says , " The two will become one . "
46006017	But anyone who is joined to the Lord becomes one with him in spirit .
46006018	Keep far away from sexual sins . All the other sins a person commits are outside his body . But sexual sins are sins against one's own body .
46006019	Don't you know that your bodies are temples of the Holy Spirit ? The Spirit is in you . You have received him from God . You do not belong to yourselves .
46006020	Christ has paid the price for you . So use your bodies in a way that honors God .
46007001	Now I want to deal with the things you wrote me about . Some of you say , " It is good for a man not to have sex with a woman . "
46007002	But since there is so much sexual sin , each man should have his own wife . And each woman should have her own husband .
46007003	A husband should satisfy his wife's sexual needs . And a wife should satisfy her husband's sexual needs .
46007004	The wife's body does not belong only to her . It also belongs to her husband . In the same way , the husband's body does not belong only to him . It also belongs to his wife .
46007005	You shouldn't stop giving yourselves to each other except when you both agree to do so . And that should be only to give yourselves time to pray for a while . Then you should come together again . In that way , Satan will not tempt you when you can't control yourselves .
46007006	I say those things to you as my advice , not as a command .
46007007	I wish all of you were like me . But you each have your own gift from God . One has this gift . Another has that .
46007008	I speak to those who are not married . I also speak to widows . It is good for you to stay single like me .
46007009	But if you can't control yourselves , you should get married . It is better to get married than to burn with sexual longing .
46007010	I give a command to those who are married . It is a direct command from the Lord , not from me . A wife must not leave her husband .
46007011	But if she does , she must not get married again . Or she can go back to her husband . And a husband must not divorce his wife .
46007012	I also have something to say to everyone else . It is from me , not a direct command from the Lord . Suppose a brother has a wife who is not a believer . If she is willing to live with him , he must not divorce her .
46007013	And suppose a woman has a husband who is not a believer . If he is willing to live with her , she must not divorce him .
46007014	The unbelieving husband has been made holy through his wife . The unbelieving wife has been made holy through her believing husband . If that were not the case , your children would not be pure and clean . But as it is , they are holy .
46007015	If the unbeliever leaves , let that person go . In that case , a believing man or woman does not have to stay married . God wants us to live in peace .
46007016	Wife , how do you know if you can save your husband ? Husband , how do you know if you can save your wife ?
46007017	But each of you should remain in the place in life that the Lord has given you . Stay as you were when God chose you . That's the rule all the churches must follow .
46007018	Was a man already circumcised when God chose him ? Then he should not become uncircumcised . Was he uncircumcised when God chose him ? Then he should not be circumcised .
46007019	Being circumcised means nothing . Being uncircumcised means nothing . Doing what God commands is what counts .
46007020	Each of you should stay as you were when God chose you .
46007021	Were you a slave when God chose you ? Don't let it trouble you . But if you can get your master to set you free , do it .
46007022	Those who were slaves when the Lord chose them are now the Lord's free people . Those who were free when God chose them are now slaves of Christ .
46007023	Christ has paid the price for you . Don't become slaves of human beings .
46007024	Brothers and sisters , you are accountable to God . So all of you should stay as you were when God chose you .
46007025	Now I want to say something about virgins . I have no direct command from the Lord . But I give my opinion . Because of the Lord's mercy , I give it as one who can be trusted .
46007026	Times are hard for you right now . So I think it's good for you to stay as you are .
46007027	Are you married ? Then don't get a divorce . Are you single ? Then don't look for a wife .
46007028	But if you get married , you have not sinned . And if a virgin gets married , she has not sinned . But those who get married will have many troubles in this life . I want to save you from that .
46007029	Brothers and sisters , what I mean is that the time is short . From now on , those who have a husband or wife should live as if they did not .
46007030	Those who are sad should live as if they were not . Those who are happy should live as if they were not . Those who buy something should live as if it were not theirs to keep .
46007031	Those who use the things of the world should not become all wrapped up in them . The world as it now exists is passing away .
46007032	I don't want you to have anything to worry about . A single man is concerned about the Lord's matters . He wants to know how he can please the Lord .
46007033	But a married man is concerned about the matters of this world . He wants to know how he can please his wife .
46007034	His concerns pull him in two directions . A single woman or a virgin is concerned about the Lord's matters . She wants to serve the Lord with both body and spirit . But a married woman is concerned about the matters of this world . She wants to know how she can please her husband .
46007035	I'm saying those things for your own good . I'm not trying to hold you back . I want you to be free to live in a way that is right . I want you to give yourselves completely to the Lord .
46007036	Suppose a man thinks he is not acting properly toward the virgin he has promised to marry . Suppose she is getting old , and he feels that he should marry her . He should do as he wants . He is not sinning . They should get married .
46007037	But suppose the man has decided not to marry the virgin . And suppose he has no compelling need to get married and can control himself . If he has made up his mind not to get married , he also does the right thing .
46007038	So then , the man who marries the virgin does the right thing . But the man who doesn't marry her does an even better thing .
46007039	A woman has to stay married to her husband as long as he lives . If he dies , she is free to marry anyone she wants to . But the one she marries must belong to the Lord .
46007040	In my opinion , she is happier if she stays single . And I also think that I am led by the Spirit of God in saying that .
46008001	Now I want to deal with food offered to statues of gods . We know that we all have knowledge . Knowledge makes people proud . But love builds them up .
46008002	Those who think they know something still don't know as they should .
46008003	But those who love God are known by God .
46008004	So then , here is what I say about eating food that is offered to statues of gods . We know that a god made by human hands is really nothing at all in the world . We know there is only one God .
46008005	There may be so-called gods either in heaven or on earth . In fact , there are many " gods " and many " lords . "
46008006	But for us there is only one God . He is the Father . All things came from him , and we live for him . And there is only one Lord . He is Jesus Christ . All things came because of him , and we live because of him .
46008007	But not everyone knows that . Some people still think that statues of gods are real gods . When they eat food that was offered to statues of gods , they think of it as food that was offered to real gods . And because they have a weak sense of what is right and wrong , they feel guilty .
46008008	But food doesn't bring us close to God . We are no worse if we don't eat . We are no better if we do eat .
46008009	But be careful how you use your freedom . Be sure it doesn't trip up someone who is weaker than you .
46008010	Suppose you who have that knowledge are eating in a temple of one of those gods . And suppose someone who has a weak sense of what is right and wrong sees you . Won't that person become bold and eat what has been offered to statues of gods ?
46008011	If so , then your knowledge destroys that weak brother or sister for whom Christ died .
46008012	When you sin against other believers in that way , you harm their weak sense of what is right and wrong . By doing that you sin against Christ .
46008013	So what should I do if what I eat causes my brother or sister to fall into sin ? I will never eat meat again . In that way , I will not cause them to fall .
46009001	Am I not free ? Am I not an apostle ? Haven't I seen Jesus our Lord ? Aren't you the result of my work for the Lord ?
46009002	Even though others may not think of me as an apostle , I am certainly one to you ! You are the proof that I am the Lord's apostle .
46009003	That is what I say to stand up for myself when people judge me .
46009004	Don't we have the right to eat and drink ?
46009005	Don't we have the right to take a believing wife with us when we travel ? The other apostles do . The Lord's brothers do . Peter does .
46009006	Or are Barnabas and I the only ones who have to work for a living ?
46009007	Who serves as a soldier but doesn't get paid ? Who plants a vineyard but doesn't eat any of its grapes ? Who takes care of a flock but doesn't drink any of the milk ?
46009008	Do I say that from only a human point of view ? The Law says the same thing .
46009009	Here is what is written in the Law of Moses . " Do not stop an ox from eating while it helps separate the grain from the straw . " Is it oxen that God is concerned about ?
46009010	Doesn't he say that for us ? Yes , it was written for us . When a farmer plows and separates the grain , he does it because he hopes to share in the crop .
46009011	We have planted spiritual seed among you . Is it too much to ask that we receive from you some of the things we need ?
46009012	Others have the right to receive help from you . Don't we have even more right to do so ? But we didn't use that right . No , we have put up with everything . We didn't want to keep the good news of Christ from spreading .
46009013	Don't you know that those who work in the temple get their food from the temple ? Don't you know that those who serve at the altar eat from what is offered on the altar ?
46009014	In the same way , those who preach the good news should receive their living from their work . That is what the Lord has commanded .
46009015	But I haven't used any of those rights . And I'm not writing because I hope you will do things like that for me . I would rather die than have anyone take away my pride in my work .
46009016	But when I preach the good news , I can't brag . I have to preach it . How terrible it will be for me if I do not preach the good news !
46009017	If I preach because I want to , I get a reward . If I preach because I have to , I'm only doing my duty .
46009018	Then what reward do I get ? Here is what it is . I am able to preach the good news free of charge . And I can do it without making use of my rights when I preach it .
46009019	I am free . I don't belong to anyone . But I make myself a slave to everyone . I do it to win as many as I can to Christ .
46009020	To the Jews I became like a Jew . That was to win the Jews . To those under the law I became like one who was under the law , even though I myself am not under the law . That was to win those under the law .
46009021	To those who don't have the law I became like one who doesn't have the law . I am not free from God's law . I am under Christ's law . Now I can win those who don't have the law .
46009022	To those who are weak I became weak . That was to win the weak . I have become all things to all people so that in all possible ways I might save some .
46009023	I do all of that because of the good news . And I want to share in its blessings .
46009024	In a race all the runners run . But only one gets the prize . You know that , don't you ? So run in a way that will get you the prize .
46009025	All who take part in the games train hard . They do it to get a crown that will not last . But we do it to get a crown that will last forever .
46009026	So I do not run like someone who doesn't run toward the finish line . I do not fight like a boxer who hits nothing but air .
46009027	No , I train my body and bring it under control . Then after I have preached to others , I myself will not break the rules and fail to win the prize .
46010001	Brothers and sisters , here is what I want you to know about our people who lived long ago . They were all led by the cloud . They all walked through the Red Sea .
46010002	They were all baptized into Moses in the cloud and in the sea .
46010003	They all ate the same supernatural food .
46010004	They all drank the same supernatural water . They drank from the supernatural rock that went with them . That rock was Christ .
46010005	But God was not pleased with most of them . Their bodies were scattered all over the desert .
46010006	Now those things happened as examples for us . They are supposed to keep us from longing for evil things , as the people of Israel did .
46010007	So don't worship statues of gods , as some of them did . It is written , " The people sat down to eat and drink . Then they got up to dance wildly in front of their god . "
46010008	We should not commit sexual sins , as some of them did . In one day 23,000 of them died .
46010009	We should not put the Lord to the test , as some of them did . They were killed by snakes .
46010010	Don't tell your leaders how unhappy you are with them . That's what some of the people of Israel did . And they were killed by the destroying angel .
46010011	Those things happened to them as examples for us . They were written down to warn us who are living at the time when God's work is being completed .
46010012	So be careful . When you think you are standing firm , you might fall .
46010013	You are tempted in the same way all other human beings are . God is faithful . He will not let you be tempted any more than you can take . But when you are tempted , God will give you a way out so that you can stand up under it .
46010014	My dear friends , run away from statues of gods . Don't worship them .
46010015	I'm talking to people who are reasonable . Judge for yourselves what I say .
46010016	When we give thanks for the cup at the Lord's Supper , aren't we sharing in the blood of Christ ? When we break the bread , aren't we sharing in the body of Christ ?
46010017	Just as there is one loaf , so we who are many are one body . We all eat from the one loaf .
46010018	Think about the people of Israel . Don't those who eat the offerings share in the altar ?
46010019	Do I mean that what is offered to a statue of a god is anything ? Do I mean that a statue of a god is anything ?
46010020	No ! But what is offered by those who worship statues of gods is really offered to demons . It is not offered to God . I don't want you to be sharing with demons .
46010021	You can't drink the cup of the Lord and the cup of demons too . You can't have a part in both the Lord's table and the table of demons .
46010022	Are we trying to make the Lord jealous ? Are we stronger than he is ?
46010023	You say , " Everything is permitted . " But not everything is good for us . Again you say , " Everything is permitted . " But not everything builds us up .
46010024	We should not look out for our own interests . Instead , we should look out for the interests of others .
46010025	Eat anything that is sold in the meat market . Don't ask if it's right or wrong .
46010026	Scripture says , " The earth belongs to the Lord . And so does everything in it . "
46010027	Suppose an unbeliever invites you to a meal and you want to go . Then eat anything that is put in front of you . Don't ask if it's right or wrong .
46010028	But suppose someone says to you , " This food has been offered to a statue of a god . " Then don't eat it . Keep in mind the good of the one who told you . And don't eat because of a sense of what is right and wrong .
46010029	I'm talking about the other person's sense of what is right and wrong , not yours . Why should my freedom be judged by what someone else thinks ?
46010030	Suppose I give thanks when I eat . Then why should I be blamed for eating food I thank God for ?
46010031	So eat and drink and do everything else for the glory of God .
46010032	Don't do anything that causes another person to trip and fall . It doesn't matter if that person is a Jew or a Greek or a member of God's church .
46010033	Follow my example . I try to please everyone in every way . I'm not looking out for what is good for me . I'm looking out for the interests of others . I do it so that they might be saved .
46011001	Follow my example , just as I follow the example of Christ .
46011002	I praise you for being faithful in remembering me . I also praise you for staying true to all my teachings , just as I gave them to you .
46011003	Now I want you to know that the head of every man is Christ . The head of the woman is the man . And the head of Christ is God .
46011004	Every man who prays or prophesies with his head covered brings shame on his head .
46011005	And every woman who prays or prophesies with her head uncovered brings shame on her head . It is just as if her head were shaved .
46011006	What if a woman does not cover her head ? She should have her hair cut off . But it is shameful for her to cut her hair or shave it off . So she should cover her head .
46011007	A man should not cover his head . He is the likeness and glory of God . But the woman is the glory of the man .
46011008	The man did not come from the woman . The woman came from the man .
46011009	Also , the man was not created for the woman . The woman was created for the man .
46011010	That's why a woman should have her head covered . It shows that she is under authority . She should also cover her head because of the angels .
46011011	But here is how things are for those who belong to the Lord . The woman is not independent of the man . And the man is not independent of the woman .
46011012	The woman came from the man , and the man is born from the woman . But everything comes from God .
46011013	You be the judge . Is it proper for a woman to pray to God without covering her head ?
46011014	Suppose a man has long hair . Doesn't the very nature of things teach you that it is shameful ?
46011015	And suppose a woman has long hair . Doesn't the very nature of things teach you that it is her glory ? Long hair is given to her as a covering .
46011016	If anyone wants to argue about that , we don't have any other practice . And God's churches don't either .
46011017	In the following matters , I don't praise you . Your meetings do more harm than good .
46011018	First , here is what people are telling me . When you come together as a church , you take sides . And in some ways I believe it .
46011019	No doubt you need to take sides in order to show which of you God agrees with !
46011020	When you come together , it is not the Lord's Supper you eat .
46011021	As you eat , each of you goes ahead without waiting for anyone else . One remains hungry and another gets drunk .
46011022	Don't you have homes to eat and drink in ? Or do you think so little of God's church that you shame those in it who have nothing ? What should I say to you ? Should I praise you for that ? Certainly not !
46011023	I passed on to you what I received from the Lord . On the night the Lord Jesus was handed over to his enemies , he took bread .
46011024	When he had given thanks , he broke it . He said , " This is my body . It is given for you . Every time you eat it , do it in memory of me . "
46011025	In the same way , after supper he took the cup . He said , " This cup is the new covenant in my blood . Every time you drink it , do it in memory of me . "
46011026	When you eat the bread and drink the cup , you are announcing the Lord's death until he comes again .
46011027	So do not eat the bread or drink the cup of the Lord in a way that isn't worthy of him . If you do , you will be guilty of sinning against the body and blood of the Lord .
46011028	A person should take a careful look at himself before he eats the bread and drinks from the cup .
46011029	Anyone who eats and drinks must recognize the body of the Lord . If he doesn't , God will judge him for it .
46011030	That is why many of you are weak and sick . That is why a number of you have died .
46011031	We should judge ourselves . Then we would not be found guilty .
46011032	When the Lord judges us , he corrects us . Then we will not be judged along with the rest of the world .
46011033	My brothers and sisters , when you come together to eat , wait for each other .
46011034	Those who are hungry should eat at home . Then when you come together , you will not be judged . When I come , I will give you more directions .
46012001	Brothers and sisters , I want you to know about the gifts of the Holy Spirit .
46012002	You know that at one time you were unbelievers . You were somehow drawn away to worship statues of gods that couldn't even speak .
46012003	So I tell you that no one who is speaking with the help of God's Spirit says , " May Jesus be cursed . " And without the help of the Holy Spirit no one can say , " Jesus is Lord . "
46012004	There are different kinds of gifts . But they are all given by the same Spirit .
46012005	There are different ways to serve . But they all come from the same Lord .
46012006	There are different ways to work . But the same God makes it possible for all of us to have all those different things .
46012007	The Holy Spirit is given to each of us in a special way . That is for the good of all .
46012008	To some people the Spirit gives the message of wisdom . To others the same Spirit gives the message of knowledge .
46012009	To others the same Spirit gives faith . To others that one Spirit gives gifts of healing .
46012010	To others he gives the power to do miracles . To others he gives the ability to prophesy . To others he gives the ability to tell the spirits apart . To others he gives the ability to speak in different kinds of languages they had not known before . And to still others he gives the ability to explain what was said in those languages .
46012011	All of the gifts are produced by one and the same Spirit . He gives them to each person , just as he decides .
46012012	There is one body . But it has many parts . Even though it has many parts , they make up one body . It is the same with Christ .
46012013	We were all baptized by one Holy Spirit into one body . It didn't matter whether we were Jews or Greeks , slaves or free people . We were all given the same Spirit to drink .
46012014	The body is not made up of just one part . It has many parts .
46012015	Suppose the foot says , " I am not a hand . So I don't belong to the body . " It is still part of the body .
46012016	And suppose the ear says , " I am not an eye . So I don't belong to the body . " It is still part of the body .
46012017	If the whole body were an eye , how could it hear ? If the whole body were an ear , how could it smell ?
46012018	God has placed each part in the body just as he wanted it to be .
46012019	If all the parts were the same , how could there be a body ?
46012020	As it is , there are many parts . But there is only one body .
46012021	The eye can't say to the hand , " I don't need you ! " The head can't say to the feet , " I don't need you ! "
46012022	In fact , it is just the opposite . The parts of the body that seem to be weaker are the ones we can't do without .
46012023	The parts that we think are less important we treat with special honor . The private parts aren't shown . But they are treated with special care .
46012024	The parts that can be shown don't need special care . But God has joined together all the parts of the body . And he has given more honor to the parts that didn't have any .
46012025	In that way , the parts of the body will not take sides . All of them will take care of each other .
46012026	If one part suffers , every part suffers with it . If one part is honored , every part shares in its joy .
46012027	You are the body of Christ . Each one of you is a part of it .
46012028	First , God has appointed apostles in the church . Second , he has appointed prophets . Third , he has appointed teachers . Then he has appointed people who do miracles and those who have gifts of healing . He also appointed those able to help others , those able to direct things , and those who can speak in different kinds of languages they had not known before .
46012029	Is everyone an apostle ? Is everyone a prophet ? Is everyone a teacher ? Do all work miracles ?
46012030	Do all have gifts of healing ? Do all speak in languages they had not known before ? Do all explain what is said in those languages ?
46012031	But above all , you should want the more important gifts . And now I will show you the best way of all .
46013001	Suppose I speak in the languages of human beings and of angels . If I don't have love , I am only a loud gong or a noisy cymbal .
46013002	Suppose I have the gift of prophecy . Suppose I can understand all the secret things of God and know everything about him . And suppose I have enough faith to move mountains . If I don't have love , I am nothing at all .
46013003	Suppose I give everything I have to poor people . And suppose I give my body to be burned . If I don't have love , I get nothing at all .
46013004	Love is patient . Love is kind . It does not want what belongs to others . It does not brag . It is not proud .
46013005	It is not rude . It does not look out for its own interests . It does not easily become angry . It does not keep track of other people's wrongs .
46013006	Love is not happy with evil . But it is full of joy when the truth is spoken .
46013007	It always protects . It always trusts . It always hopes . It never gives up .
46013008	Love never fails . But prophecy will pass away . Speaking in languages that had not been known before will end . And knowledge will pass away .
46013009	What we know now is not complete . What we prophesy now is not perfect .
46013010	But when what is perfect comes , the things that are not perfect will pass away .
46013011	When I was a child , I talked like a child . I thought like a child . I had the understanding of a child . When I became a man , I put childish ways behind me .
46013012	Now we see only a dim likeness of things . It is as if we were seeing them in a mirror . But someday we will see clearly . We will see face to face . What I know now is not complete . But someday I will know completely , just as God knows me completely .
46013013	The three most important things to have are faith , hope and love . But the greatest of them is love .
46014001	Follow the way of love . You should also want the gifts the Holy Spirit gives . Most of all , you should want the gift of prophecy .
46014002	Anyone who speaks in a language he had not known before doesn't speak to people . He speaks only to God . In fact , no one understands that person . What he says with his spirit remains a mystery .
46014003	But anyone who prophesies speaks to people . He says things to make them stronger , to give them hope and to comfort them .
46014004	Those who speak in other languages build themselves up . But those who prophesy build up the church .
46014005	I would like all of you to speak in other languages . But I would rather have you prophesy . Those who prophesy are more helpful than those who speak in other languages . But that is not the case if those who speak in other languages explain what they have said . Then the whole church can be built up .
46014006	Brothers and sisters , suppose I were to come to you and speak in other languages . What good would I be to you ? None ! I would need to come with new truth or knowledge , or a prophecy or a teaching .
46014007	Here are some examples . Certain objects make sounds . Take a flute or a harp . No one will know what the tune is unless different notes are played .
46014008	Also , if the trumpet call isn't clear , who will get ready for battle ?
46014009	It's the same with you . You must speak words that people understand . If you don't , no one will know what you are saying . You will just be speaking into the air .
46014010	It is true that there are all kinds of languages in the world . And they all have meaning .
46014011	But if I don't understand what someone is saying , I am a stranger to that person . And that person is a stranger to me .
46014012	It's the same with you . You want to have gifts of the Spirit . So try to do your best in using gifts that build up the church .
46014013	For that reason , those who speak in languages they had not known before should pray that they can explain what they say .
46014014	If I pray in another language , my spirit prays . But my mind does not pray .
46014015	So what should I do ? I will pray with my spirit . But I will also pray with my mind . I will sing with my spirit . But I will also sing with my mind .
46014016	Suppose you are praising God with your spirit . And suppose there are visitors among you who don't understand what's going on . How can they say " Amen " when you give thanks ? They don't know what you are saying .
46014017	You might be giving thanks well enough . But the others are not being built up .
46014018	I thank God that I speak in other languages more than all of you do .
46014019	But in the church I would rather speak five words that people can understand than 10,000 words in another language . Then I would be teaching others .
46014020	Brothers and sisters , stop thinking like children . Be like babies as far as evil is concerned . But be grown up in your thinking .
46014021	In the Law it is written , " Through people who speak unfamiliar languages and through the lips of strangers I will speak to these people . But even then they will not listen to me . " That is what the Lord says .
46014022	So speaking in other languages is a sign for those who don't believe . It is not a sign for those who do believe . But prophecy is for believers . It is not for those who don't believe .
46014023	Suppose the whole church comes together and everyone speaks in other languages . And suppose visitors or unbelievers come in . Won't they say you are out of your minds ?
46014024	But suppose unbelievers or visitors come in while everyone is prophesying . Then they will be shown by all who speak that they are sinners . They will be judged by all .
46014025	The secrets of their hearts will be brought out into the open . They will fall down and worship God . They will exclaim , " God is really here among you ! "
46014026	Brothers and sisters , what should we say then ? When you come together , every one of you brings something . You bring a hymn or a teaching or a word from God . You bring a message in another language or explain what was said . All of those things must be done to make the church strong .
46014027	No more than two or three people should speak in another language . And they should speak one at a time . Then someone must explain what was said .
46014028	If there is no one to explain , the speakers should keep quiet in the church . They can speak to themselves and to God .
46014029	Only two or three prophets are supposed to speak . Others should decide if what is being said is true .
46014030	What if a message from God comes to someone else who is sitting there ? Then the one who is speaking should stop .
46014031	Those who prophesy can all take turns . In that way , everyone can be taught and be given hope .
46014032	Those who prophesy should control their speaking .
46014033	God is not a God of disorder . He is a God of peace . As in all the churches of God's people ,
46014034	women should remain silent in the meetings . They are not allowed to speak . They must follow the lead of those who are in authority , as the Law says .
46014035	If they have a question about something , they should ask their own husbands at home . It is shameful for women to speak in church meetings .
46014036	Did the word of God begin with you ? Or are you the only people it has reached ?
46014037	Suppose some think they are prophets or have gifts of the Holy Spirit . They should agree that what I am writing to you is the Lord's command .
46014038	Anyone who does not recognize that will not be recognized .
46014039	Brothers and sisters , you should want to prophesy . And don't stop people from speaking in languages they had not known before .
46014040	But everything should be done in a proper and orderly way .
46015001	Brothers and sisters , I want to remind you of the good news I preached to you . You received it and have put your faith in it .
46015002	Because you believed the good news , you are saved . But you must hold firmly to the message I preached to you . If you don't , you have believed it for nothing .
46015003	What I received I passed on to you . And it is the most important of all . Here is what it is . Christ died for our sins , just as Scripture said he would .
46015004	He was buried . He was raised from the dead on the third day , just as Scripture said he would be .
46015005	He appeared to Peter . Then he appeared to the Twelve .
46015006	After that , he appeared to more than 500 believers at the same time . Most of them are still living . But some have died .
46015007	He appeared to James . Then he appeared to all the apostles .
46015008	Last of all , he also appeared to me . I was like someone who wasn't born at the right time or in a normal way .
46015009	I am the least important of the apostles . I'm not even fit to be called an apostle . I tried to destroy God's church .
46015010	But because of God's grace I am what I am . And his grace was not wasted on me . No , I have worked harder than all the other apostles . But I didn't do the work . God's grace was with me .
46015011	So whether it was I or the other apostles who preached to you , that is what we preach . And that is what you believed .
46015012	We have preached that Christ has been raised from the dead . So how can some of you say that no one rises from the dead ?
46015013	If no one rises from the dead , then not even Christ has been raised .
46015014	And if Christ has not been raised , what we preach doesn't mean anything . Your faith doesn't mean anything either .
46015015	More than that , we would be lying about God . We have given witness that God raised Christ from the dead . But he did not raise him if the dead are not raised .
46015016	If the dead are not raised , then Christ has not been raised either .
46015017	And if Christ has not been raised , your faith doesn't mean anything . Your sins have not been forgiven .
46015018	Those who have died believing in Christ are also lost .
46015019	Do we have hope in Christ only for this life ? Then people should pity us more than anyone else .
46015020	But Christ really has been raised from the dead . He is the first of all those who will rise .
46015021	Death came because of what a man did . Rising from the dead also comes because of what a man did .
46015022	Because of Adam , all people die . So because of Christ , all will be made alive .
46015023	But here is the order of events . Christ is the first of those who rise from the dead . When he comes back , those who belong to him will be raised .
46015024	Then the end will come . Christ will destroy all rule , authority and power . He will hand over the kingdom to God the Father .
46015025	Christ must rule until he has put all his enemies under his control .
46015026	The last enemy that will be destroyed is death .
46015027	Scripture says that God " has put everything under his control . " It says that " everything " has been put under him . But it is clear that this does not include God himself , who puts everything under Christ .
46015028	When he has done that , the Son also will be under God's rule . God puts everything under the Son . In that way , God will be all in all .
46015029	Suppose no one rises from the dead . Then what will people do who are baptized for the dead ? Suppose the dead are not raised at all . Then why are people baptized for them ?
46015030	And why would we put ourselves in danger every hour ?
46015031	I die every day . I really mean that , brothers and sisters . Here is something you can be sure of . I take pride in what Christ Jesus our Lord has done for you through my work .
46015032	Did I fight wild animals in Ephesus for only human reasons ? Then what have I gotten for it ? If the dead are not raised , " Let us eat and drink , because tomorrow we will die . "
46015033	Don't let anyone fool you . " Bad companions make a good person bad . "
46015034	You should come back to your senses and stop sinning . Some of you don't know anything about God . I say this to make you ashamed .
46015035	But someone might ask , " How are the dead raised ? What kind of body will they have ? "
46015036	How foolish ! What you plant doesn't come to life unless it dies .
46015037	When you plant something , it isn't a completely grown plant that you put in the ground . You only plant a seed . Maybe it's wheat or something else .
46015038	But God gives the seed a body just as he has planned . And to each kind of seed he gives its own body .
46015039	All earthly creatures are not the same . People have one kind of body . Animals have another . Birds have another kind . Fish have still another .
46015040	There are also heavenly bodies as well as earthly bodies . Heavenly bodies have one kind of glory . Earthly bodies have another .
46015041	The sun has one kind of glory . The moon has another kind . The stars have still another . And one star's glory is different from that of another star .
46015042	It will be like that with bodies that are raised from the dead . The body that is planted does not last forever . The body that is raised from the dead lasts forever .
46015043	It is planted without honor . But it is raised in glory . It is planted in weakness . But it is raised in power .
46015044	It is planted as an earthly body . But it is raised as a spiritual body . Just as there is an earthly body , there is also a spiritual body .
46015045	It is written , " The first man Adam became a living person . " The last Adam became a spirit that gives life .
46015046	What is spiritual did not come first . What is earthly came first . What is spiritual came after that .
46015047	The first man came from the dust of the earth . The second man came from heaven .
46015048	Those who belong to the earth are like the one who came from the earth . And those who are spiritual are like the one who came from heaven .
46015049	We are like the earthly man . And we will be like the man from heaven .
46015050	Brothers and sisters , here is what I'm telling you . Bodies made of flesh and blood can't share in the kingdom of God . And what dies can't share in what never dies .
46015051	Listen ! I am telling you a mystery . We will not all die . But we will all be changed .
46015052	That will happen in a flash , as quickly as you can wink an eye . It will happen when the last trumpet sounds . The trumpet will sound , and the dead will be raised to live forever . And we will be changed .
46015053	Our natural bodies don't last forever . They must be dressed with what does last forever . What dies must be dressed with what does not die .
46015054	In fact , that is going to happen . What does not last will be dressed with what lasts forever . What dies will be dressed with what does not die . Then what is written will come true . It says , " Death has been swallowed up . It has lost the battle . "
46015055	" Death , where is the battle you thought you were winning ? Death , where is your sting ? "
46015056	The sting of death is sin . And the power of sin is the law .
46015057	But let us give thanks to God ! He wins the battle for us because of what our Lord Jesus Christ has done .
46015058	My dear brothers and sisters , stand firm . Don't let anything move you . Always give yourselves completely to the work of the Lord . Because you belong to the Lord , you know that your work is not worthless .
46016001	Now I want to deal with the offering of money for God's people . Do what I told the churches in Galatia to do .
46016002	On the first day of every week , each of you should put some money away . The amount should be in keeping with how much money you make . Save the money so that you won't have to take up an offering when I come .
46016003	When I arrive , I will send some people with your gift to Jerusalem . They will be people you consider to be good . And I will give them letters that explain who they are .
46016004	If it seems good for me to go also , they will go with me .
46016005	After I go through Macedonia , I will come to you . I will only be passing through Macedonia .
46016006	But I might stay with you for a while . I might even spend the winter . Then you can help me on my journey everywhere I go .
46016007	I don't want to see you now while I am just passing through . I hope to spend some time with you , if the Lord allows it .
46016008	But I will stay at Ephesus until the day of Pentecost .
46016009	A door has opened wide for me to do some good work here . There are many people who oppose me .
46016010	Timothy might come to you . Make sure he has nothing to worry about while he is with you . He is doing the work of the Lord , just as I am .
46016011	No one should refuse to accept him . Send him safely on his way so he can return to me . I'm expecting him to come back along with the others .
46016012	I want to say something about our brother Apollos . I tried my best to get him to go to you with the others . But he didn't want to go right now . He will go when he can .
46016013	Be on your guard . Stand firm in the faith . Be brave . Be strong .
46016014	Be loving in everything you do .
46016015	You know that the first believers in Achaia were from the family of Stephanas . They have spent all their time serving God's people . Brothers and sisters , I am asking you
46016016	to follow the lead of people like them . Follow everyone who joins in the task and works hard at it .
46016017	I was glad when Stephanas , Fortunatus and Achaicus arrived . They have supplied me with what you couldn't give me .
46016018	They renewed my spirit , and yours also . People like that are worthy of honor .
46016019	The churches in Asia Minor send you greetings . Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly because of the Lord's love . So does the church that meets in their house .
46016020	All the brothers and sisters here send you greetings . Greet one another with a holy kiss .
46016021	I , Paul , am writing this greeting with my own hand .
46016022	If anyone does not love the Lord , let a curse be on that person ! Come , Lord !
