47001001	I , Paul , am writing this letter . I am an apostle of Christ Jesus just as God planned . Timothy our brother joins me in writing . We are sending this letter to you , the members of God's church in Corinth . It is also for all of God's people everywhere in Achaia .
47001002	May God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ give you grace and peace .
47001003	Give praise to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ ! He is the Father who gives tender love . All comfort comes from him .
47001004	He comforts us in all our troubles . Now we can comfort others when they are in trouble . We ourselves have received comfort from God .
47001005	We share the sufferings of Christ . We also share his comfort .
47001006	If we are having trouble , it is so that you will be comforted and renewed . If we are comforted , it is so that you will be comforted . Then you will be able to put up with the same suffering we have gone through .
47001007	Our hope for you remains firm . We know that you suffer just as we do . In the same way , God comforts you just as he comforts us .
47001008	Brothers and sisters , we want you to know about the hard times we suffered in Asia Minor . We were having a lot of trouble . It was far more than we could stand . We even thought we were going to die .
47001009	In fact , in our hearts we felt as if we were under the sentence of death . But that happened so that we would not depend on ourselves but on God . He raises the dead to life .
47001010	God has saved us from deadly dangers . And he will continue to do it . We have put our hope in him . He will continue to save us .
47001011	You must help us by praying for us . Then many people will give thanks because of what will happen to us . They will thank God for his kindness to us in answer to the prayers of many .
47001012	Here is what we take pride in . Our sense of what is right and wrong gives witness that we have acted in God's holy and honest ways . That is how we live in the world . We live that way most of all when we are dealing with you . Our way of living is not wise in the eyes of the world . But it is in keeping with God's grace .
47001013	We are writing only what you can read and understand . And here is what I hope .
47001014	Up to this point you have understood some of the things we have said . But now I hope that someday you will be able to take pride in us , just as we will take pride in you on the day the Lord Jesus returns . When you are able to do that , you will understand us completely .
47001015	I was sure of those things . So I planned to visit you first . Here is how I thought you would be helped twice .
47001016	I planned to visit you on my way to Macedonia . I would have come back to you from there . Then you would have sent me on my way to Judea .
47001017	When I planned all of that , did I do it without much thought ? No . I don't make my plans the way the world makes theirs . In the same breath the world says , " Yes ! Yes ! " and " No ! No ! "
47001018	But just as sure as God is faithful , our message to you is not " Yes " and " No . "
47001019	Silas , Timothy and I preached to you about the Son of God , Jesus Christ . Our message did not say " Yes " and " No " at the same time . The message of Christ has always been " Yes . "
47001020	God has made a great many promises . They are all " Yes " because of what Christ has done . So through Christ we say " Amen . " We want God to receive glory .
47001021	He makes both us and you stand firm because we belong to Christ . He anointed us .
47001022	He put his Spirit in our hearts and marked us as his own . We can now be sure that he will give us everything he promised us .
47001023	I call God as my witness . I wanted to spare you . So I didn't return to Corinth .
47001024	Your faith is not under our control . You stand firm in your own faith . But we work together with you for your joy .
47002001	So I made up my mind that I would not make another painful visit to you .
47002002	If I make you sad , who is going to make me glad ? Only you , the one I made sad .
47002003	I wrote what I did for a special reason . When I came , I didn't want to be troubled by those who should make me glad . I was sure that all of you would share my joy .
47002004	I was very troubled when I wrote to you . My heart was sad . My eyes were full of tears . I didn't want to make you sad . I wanted to let you know that I love you very deeply .
47002005	Suppose someone has made us sad . In some ways , he hasn't made me sad so much as he has made all of you sad . But I don't want to put this too strongly .
47002006	He has been punished because most of you decided he should be . That is enough for him .
47002007	Now you should forgive him and comfort him . Then he won't be sad more than he can stand .
47002008	So I'm asking you to tell him again that you still love him .
47002009	I wrote to you for a special reason . I wanted to see if you could stand the test . I wanted to see if you could obey everything that was asked of you .
47002010	Anyone you forgive I also forgive . Was there anything to forgive ? If so , I have forgiven it for your benefit , knowing that Christ is watching .
47002011	We don't want Satan to outsmart us . We know how he does his evil work .
47002012	I went to Troas to preach the good news about Christ . There I found that the Lord had opened a door of opportunity for me .
47002013	But I still had no peace of mind . I couldn't find my brother Titus there . So I said good-by to the believers at Troas and went on to Macedonia .
47002014	Give thanks to God ! He always leads us in the winners' parade because we belong to Christ . Through us , God spreads the knowledge of Christ everywhere like perfume .
47002015	God considers us to be the sweet smell that Christ is spreading among people who are being saved and people who are dying .
47002016	To the one , we are the smell of death . To the other , we are the perfume of life . Who is able to do that work ?
47002017	Unlike many people , we aren't selling God's word to make money . In fact , it is just the opposite . Because of Christ we speak honestly before God . We speak like people God has sent .
47003001	Are we beginning to praise ourselves again ? Some people need letters that speak well of them . Do we need those kinds of letters , either to you or from you ?
47003002	You yourselves are our letter . You are written on our hearts . Everyone knows you and reads you .
47003003	You make it clear that you are a letter from Christ . You are the result of our work for God . You are a letter written not with ink but with the Spirit of the living God . You are a letter written not on tablets made out of stone but on human hearts .
47003004	Through Christ , we can be sure of this because of our faith in God's power .
47003005	In ourselves we are not able to claim anything for ourselves . The power to do what we do comes from God .
47003006	He has given us the power to serve under a new covenant . The covenant is not based on the written Law of Moses . It comes from the Holy Spirit . The written Law kills , but the Spirit gives life .
47003007	The Law was written in letters on stone . Even though it was a way of serving God , it led to death . But even that way of serving God came with glory . And even though the glory was fading , the people of Israel couldn't look at Moses' face very long .
47003008	Since all of that is true , won't the work of the Holy Spirit be even more glorious ?
47003009	The Law that sentences people to death is glorious . How much more glorious is the work of the Spirit ! His work makes people right with God .
47003010	The glory of the old covenant is nothing compared with the far greater glory of the new .
47003011	The glory of the old is fading away . How much greater is the glory of the new ! It will last forever .
47003012	Since we have that kind of hope , we are very bold .
47003013	We are not like Moses . He used to cover his face with a veil . That was to keep the people of Israel from looking at his face while the brightness was fading away .
47003014	But their minds were made stubborn . To this very day , the same veil remains when the old covenant is read . The veil has not been removed . Only faith in Christ can take it away .
47003015	To this very day , when the Law of Moses is read , a veil covers the minds of those who hear it .
47003016	But when anyone turns to the Lord , the veil is taken away .
47003017	Now the Lord is the Holy Spirit . And where the Spirit of the Lord is , freedom is also there .
47003018	Our faces are not covered with a veil . We all display the Lord's glory . We are being changed to become more like him so that we have more and more glory . And the glory comes from the Lord , who is the Holy Spirit .
47004001	So because of God's mercy , we have work to do . He has given it to us . And we don't give up .
47004002	Instead , we have given up doing secret and shameful things . We don't twist God's word . In fact , we do just the opposite . We present the truth plainly . In the sight of God , we make our appeal to everyone's sense of what is right and wrong .
47004003	Suppose our good news is covered with a veil . Then it is veiled to those who are dying .
47004004	The god of this world has blinded the minds of those who don't believe . They can't see the light of the good news of Christ's glory . He is the likeness of God .
47004005	We do not preach about ourselves . We preach about Jesus Christ . We say that he is Lord . And we serve you because of him .
47004006	God said , " Let light shine out of darkness . " He made his light shine in our hearts . It shows us the light of God's glory in the face of Christ .
47004007	Treasure is kept in clay jars . In the same way , we have the treasure of the good news in these earthly bodies of ours . That shows that the mighty power of the good news comes from God . It doesn't come from us .
47004008	We are pushed hard from all sides . But we are not beaten down . We are bewildered . But that doesn't make us lose hope .
47004009	Others make us suffer . But God does not desert us . We are knocked down . But we are not knocked out .
47004010	We always carry around the death of Jesus in our bodies . In that way , the life of Jesus can be shown in our bodies .
47004011	We who are alive are always in danger of death because we are serving Jesus . So his life can be shown in our earthly bodies .
47004012	Death is at work in us . But life is at work in you .
47004013	It is written , " I believed , and so I have spoken . " With that same spirit of faith we also believe . And we also speak .
47004014	We know that God raised the Lord Jesus from the dead . And he will also raise us up with Jesus . He will bring us with you to God in heaven .
47004015	All of that is for your benefit . God's grace is reaching more and more people . So they will become more and more thankful . They will give glory to God .
47004016	We don't give up . Our bodies are becoming weaker and weaker . But our spirits are being renewed day by day .
47004017	Our troubles are small . They last only for a short time . But they are earning for us a glory that will last forever . It is greater than all our troubles .
47004018	So we don't spend all our time looking at what we can see . Instead , we look at what we can't see . What can be seen lasts only a short time . But what can't be seen will last forever .
47005001	We know that the earthly tent we live in will be destroyed . But we have a building made by God . It is a house in heaven that lasts forever . Human hands did not build it .
47005002	During our time on earth we groan . We long to put on our house in heaven as if it were clothing .
47005003	Then we will not be naked .
47005004	While we live in this tent of ours , we groan under our heavy load . We don't want to be naked . We want to be dressed with our house in heaven . What must die will be swallowed up by life .
47005005	God has made us for that very purpose . He has given us the Holy Spirit as a down payment . The Spirit makes us sure of what is still to come .
47005006	So here is what we can always be certain about . As long as we are at home in our bodies , we are away from the Lord .
47005007	We live by believing , not by seeing .
47005008	We are certain about that . We would rather be away from our bodies and at home with the Lord .
47005009	So we try our best to please him . We want to please him whether we are at home in our bodies or away from them .
47005010	We must all stand in front of Christ to be judged . Each one of us will be judged for the good things and the bad things we do while we are in our bodies . Then each of us will receive what we are supposed to get .
47005011	We know what it means to have respect for the Lord . So we try to help other people to understand it . What we are is plain to God . I hope it is also plain to your way of thinking .
47005012	We are not trying to make an appeal to you again . But we are giving you a chance to take pride in us . Then you can answer those who take pride in how people look rather than in what is really in their hearts .
47005013	Are we out of our minds ? That is because we want to serve God . Does what we say make sense ? That is because we want to serve you .
47005014	Christ's love controls us . We are sure that one person died for everyone . And so everyone died .
47005015	Christ died for everyone . He died so that those who live should not live for themselves anymore . They should live for Christ . He died for them and was raised again .
47005016	So from now on we don't look at anyone the way the world does . At one time we looked at Christ in that way . But we don't anymore .
47005017	Anyone who believes in Christ is a new creation . The old is gone ! The new has come !
47005018	It is all from God . He brought us back to himself through Christ's death on the cross . And he has given us the task of bringing others back to him through Christ .
47005019	God was bringing the world back to himself through Christ . He did not hold people's sins against them . God has trusted us with the message that people may be brought back to him .
47005020	So we are Christ's official messengers . It is as if God were making his appeal through us . Here is what Christ wants us to beg you to do . Come back to God !
47005021	Christ didn't have any sin . But God made him become sin for us . So we can be made right with God because of what Christ has done for us .
47006001	We work together with God . So we are asking you not to receive God's grace and then do nothing with it .
47006002	He says , " When I showed you my favor , I heard you . On the day I saved you , I helped you . " I tell you , now is the time God shows his favor . Now is the day he saves .
47006003	We don't put anything in anyone's way . So no one can find fault with our work for God .
47006004	Instead , we make it clear that we serve God in every way . We serve him by holding steady . We stand firm in all kinds of trouble , hard times and suffering .
47006005	We don't give up when we are beaten or put in prison . When people stir up trouble in the streets , we continue to serve God . We work hard for him . We go without sleep and food .
47006006	We remain pure . We understand completely what it means to serve God . We are patient and kind . We serve him in the power of the Holy Spirit . We serve him with true love .
47006007	We speak the truth . We serve in the power of God . We hold the weapons of godliness in the right hand and in the left .
47006008	We serve God in times of glory and shame . We serve him whether the news about us is bad or good . We are true to our calling . But people treat us as if we were pretenders .
47006009	We are known , but people treat us as if we were unknown . We are dying , but we continue to live . We are beaten , but we are not killed .
47006010	We are sad , but we are always full of joy . We are poor , but we make many people rich . We have nothing , but we own everything .
47006011	Believers at Corinth , we have spoken freely to you . We have opened our hearts wide to you .
47006012	We are not holding back our love from you . But you are holding back your love from us .
47006013	I speak to you as if you were my children . It is only fair that you open your hearts wide to us also .
47006014	Do not be joined to unbelievers . What do right and wrong have in common ? Can light and darkness be friends ?
47006015	How can Christ and Satan agree ? What does a believer have in common with an unbeliever ?
47006016	How can the temple of the true God and the statues of other gods agree ? We are the temple of the living God . God has said , " I will live with them . I will walk among them . I will be their God . And they will be my people . "
47006017	" So come out from among them and be separate , says the Lord . Do not touch anything that is not pure and clean . Then I will receive you . "
47006018	" I will be your Father . You will be my sons and daughters , says the Lord who rules over all . "
47007001	Dear friends , we have these promises from God . So let us make ourselves pure from everything that pollutes our bodies and spirits . Let us be completely holy . We want to honor God .
47007002	Make room for us in your hearts . We haven't done anything wrong to anyone . We haven't caused anyone to sin . We haven't taken advantage of anyone .
47007003	I don't say this to judge you . I have told you before that you have an important place in our hearts . We would live or die with you .
47007004	I have great faith in you . I am very proud of you . I am very happy . Even with all our troubles , my joy has no limit .
47007005	When I came to Macedonia , my body wasn't able to rest . I was attacked no matter where I went . I had battles on the outside and fears on the inside .
47007006	But God comforts those who are sad . He comforted me when Titus came .
47007007	I was comforted not only when he came but also by the comfort you had given him . He told me how much you longed for me . He told me about your deep sadness and concern for me . That made my joy greater than ever .
47007008	Even if my letter made you sad , I'm not sorry I sent it . At first I was sorry . I see that my letter hurt you , but only for a little while .
47007009	Now I am happy . I'm not happy because you were made sad . I'm happy because your sadness led you to turn away from your sins . You became sad just as God wanted you to . So you were not hurt in any way by us .
47007010	Godly sadness causes us to turn away from our sins and be saved . And we are certainly not sorry about that ! But worldly sadness brings death .
47007011	Look at what that godly sadness has produced in you . You are working hard to clear yourselves . You are angry and alarmed . You are longing to see me . You are concerned . You are ready to make sure that the right thing is done . In every way you have proved that you are not guilty in that matter .
47007012	So even though I wrote to you , it wasn't because of the one who did the wrong . It wasn't because of the one who was hurt . Instead , I wrote you so that in the sight of God you could see for yourselves how faithful you are to us .
47007013	All of that cheers us up . We were also very glad to see how happy Titus was . You have all renewed his spirit .
47007014	I had bragged about you to him . And you have not let me down . Everything we said to you was true . In the same way , our bragging about you to Titus has also turned out to be true .
47007015	His love for you is even greater when he remembers that you all obeyed his teaching . You received him with fear and trembling .
47007016	I am glad I can have complete faith in you .
47008001	Brothers and sisters , we want you to know about the grace that God has given to the churches in Macedonia .
47008002	They have suffered a great deal . But their joy was more than full . Even though they were very poor , they gave very freely .
47008003	I give witness that they gave as much as they could . In fact , they gave even more than they could . Completely on their own ,
47008004	they begged us for the chance to share in serving God's people in that way .
47008005	They did more than we expected . First they gave themselves to the Lord . Then they gave themselves to us in keeping with what God wanted .
47008006	Titus had already started collecting money from you . So we asked him to get you to finish making your kind gift .
47008007	You do well in everything else . You do well in faith and in speaking . You do well in knowledge and in complete commitment . And you do well in your love for us . So make sure that you also do well in the grace of giving to others .
47008008	I am not commanding you to do it . But I want to put you to the test . I want to find out if you really love God . I want to compare your love with that of others .
47008009	You know the grace shown by our Lord Jesus Christ . Even though he was rich , he became poor to help you . Because he became poor , you can become rich .
47008010	Here is my advice about what is best for you in that matter . Last year you were the first to give . You were also the first to want to give .
47008011	So finish the work . Then your longing to do it will be matched by your finishing it . Give on the basis of what you have .
47008012	Do you really want to give ? Then the gift is received in keeping with what you have , not with what you don't have .
47008013	We don't want others to have it easy at your expense . We want things to be equal .
47008014	Right now you have plenty in order to take care of what they need . Then they will have plenty to take care of what you need . That will make things equal .
47008015	It is written , " Those who gathered a lot didn't have too much . And those who gathered a little had enough . "
47008016	God put into the heart of Titus the same concern I have for you . I am thankful to God for this .
47008017	Titus welcomed our appeal . He is also excited about coming to you . It was his own idea .
47008018	Along with Titus , we are sending another brother . All the churches praise him for his service in telling the good news .
47008019	He was also chosen by the churches to go with us as we bring the offering . We are in charge of it . We want to honor the Lord himself . We want to show how ready we are to help .
47008020	We want to keep anyone from blaming us for how we take care of that large gift .
47008021	We are trying hard to do what is right in the Lord's eyes and in the eyes of people .
47008022	We are also sending another one of our brothers with them . He has often proved to us in many ways that he is very committed . He is now even more committed because he has great faith in you .
47008023	Titus is my helper . He and I work together among you . Our brothers are messengers from the churches . They honor Christ .
47008024	So show them that you really love them . Show them why we are proud of you . Then the churches can see it .
47009001	I don't need to write to you about giving to God's people .
47009002	I know how much you want to help . I have been bragging about it to the people in Macedonia . I have been telling them that since last year you who live in Achaia were ready to give . You are so excited that it has stirred up most of them to take action .
47009003	But I am sending the brothers . Then our bragging about you in this matter will have a good reason . You will be ready , just as I said you would be .
47009004	Suppose people from Macedonia come with me and find out that you are not prepared . Then we , as well as you , would be ashamed of being so certain .
47009005	So I thought I should try to get the brothers to visit you ahead of time . They will finish the plans for the large gift you had promised . Then it will be ready as a gift that is freely given . It will not be given by force .
47009006	Here is something to remember . The one who plants only a little will gather only a little . And the one who plants a lot will gather a lot .
47009007	You should each give what you have decided in your heart to give . You shouldn't give if you don't want to . You shouldn't give because you are forced to . God loves a cheerful giver .
47009008	And God is able to shower all kinds of blessings on you . In all things and at all times you will have everything you need . You will do more and more good works .
47009009	It is written , " They have spread their gifts around to poor people . Their good works continue forever . "
47009010	God supplies seed to the planter . He supplies bread for food . God will also supply and increase the amount of your seed . He will increase the results of your good works .
47009011	You will be made rich in every way . Then you can always give freely . We will take your many gifts to the people who need them . And they will give thanks to God .
47009012	Your gifts meet the needs of God's people . And that's not all . Your gifts also cause many people to thank God .
47009013	You have shown yourselves to be worthy by what you have given . So people will praise God because you obey him . That proves that you really believe the good news about Christ . They will also praise God because you share freely with them and with everyone else .
47009014	Their hearts will be filled with longing for you when they pray for you . God has given you grace that is better than anything .
47009015	Let us give thanks to God for his gift . It is so great that no one can tell how wonderful it really is !
47010001	Christ is gentle and free of pride . So I make my appeal to you . I , Paul , am the one you call shy when I am face to face with you . But when I am away from you , you call me bold .
47010002	I beg you that when I come I won't have to be as bold as I expect to be toward some people . They think that I live the way the people of this world live .
47010003	I do live in the world . But I don't fight my battles the way the people of the world do .
47010004	The weapons I fight with are not the weapons the world uses . In fact , it is just the opposite . My weapons have the power of God to destroy the camps of the enemy .
47010005	I destroy every claim and every reason that keeps people from knowing God . I keep every thought under control in order to make it obey Christ .
47010006	Until you have obeyed completely , I will be ready to punish you every time you don't obey .
47010007	You are looking only at what appears on the surface of things . Suppose you are sure you belong to Christ . Then you should consider again that I belong to Christ just as much as you do .
47010008	Do I brag too much about the authority the Lord gave me ? If I do , it's because I want to build you up , not pull you down . And I'm not ashamed of that kind of bragging .
47010009	Don't think that I'm trying to scare you with my letters .
47010010	Some say , " His letters sound important . They are powerful . But in person he doesn't seem like much . And what he says doesn't amount to anything . "
47010011	People like that have a lot to learn . What I say in my letters when I'm away from you , I will do in my actions when I'm with you .
47010012	I don't dare to compare myself with those who praise themselves . I'm not that kind of person . They measure themselves by themselves . They compare themselves with themselves . When they do that , they are not wise .
47010013	But I won't brag more than I should . Instead , I will brag only about what I have done in the area God has given me . It is an area that reaches all the way to you .
47010014	I am not going too far in my bragging . I would be going too far if I hadn't come to where you live . But I did get there with the good news about Christ .
47010015	And I won't brag about work done by others . If I did , I would be bragging more than I should . As your faith continues to grow , I hope that my work among you will greatly increase .
47010016	Then I will be able to preach the good news in the areas beyond you . I don't want to brag about work already done in someone else's territory .
47010017	But , " The one who brags should brag about what the Lord has done . "
47010018	Those who praise themselves are not accepted . Those the Lord praises are accepted .
47011001	I hope you will put up with a little of my foolish bragging . But you are already doing that .
47011002	My jealousy for you comes from God himself . I promised to give you to only one husband . That husband is Christ . I wanted to be able to give you to him as if you were a pure virgin .
47011003	But Eve was tricked by the snake's clever lies . And I'm afraid that in the same way your minds will somehow be led down the wrong path . They will be led away from your true and pure love for Christ .
47011004	Suppose someone comes to you and preaches about a Jesus different from the Jesus we preached about . Or suppose you receive a spirit different from the one you received before . Or suppose you receive a message of good news different from the one you accepted earlier . You put up with those kinds of things easily enough .
47011005	But I don't think I'm in any way less important than those " super-apostles . "
47011006	I may not be a trained speaker . But I do have knowledge . I've made that very clear to you in every way .
47011007	When I preached God's good news to you free of charge , I put myself down in order to lift you up . Was that a sin ?
47011008	Did I rob other churches when I received help from them so that I could serve you ?
47011009	When I was with you and needed something , I didn't cause you any expense . The believers who came from Macedonia gave me what I needed . I haven't caused you any expense at all . And I won't ever do it .
47011010	I'm sure that the truth of Christ is in me . And I'm just as sure that nobody in Achaia will keep me from bragging .
47011011	Why ? Because I don't love you ? No ! God knows I do !
47011012	And I will keep on doing what I'm doing . That will stop those who claim they have things to brag about . They think they have a chance to be considered equal with us .
47011013	People like that are false apostles . They work hard to trick others . They only pretend to be apostles of Christ .
47011014	That comes as no surprise . Even Satan himself pretends to be an angel of light .
47011015	So it doesn't surprise us that those who serve Satan pretend to be serving God . They will finally get exactly what they should .
47011016	I will say it again . Don't let anyone think I'm a fool . But if you do , receive me just as you would receive a fool . Then I can do a little bragging .
47011017	When I brag about myself like this , I'm not talking the way the Lord would . I'm talking like a fool .
47011018	Many are bragging the way the people of the world do . So I will brag like that too .
47011019	You are so wise ! You gladly put up with fools !
47011020	In fact , you even put up with anyone who makes you a slave or uses you . You put up with those who take advantage of you . You put up with those who claim to be better than you . You put up with those who slap you in the face .
47011021	I'm ashamed to have to say that I was too weak for that ! What anyone else dares to brag about , I also dare to brag about . I'm speaking like a fool !
47011022	Are they Hebrews ? So am I . Do they belong to the people of Israel ? So do I . Are they Abraham's children ? So am I .
47011023	Are they serving Christ ? I am serving him even more . I'm out of my mind to talk like this ! I have worked much harder . I have been in prison more often . I have suffered terrible beatings . Again and again I almost died .
47011024	Five times the Jews gave me 39 strokes with a whip .
47011025	Three times I was beaten with sticks . Once they tried to kill me by throwing stones at me . Three times I was shipwrecked . I spent a night and a day in the open sea .
47011026	I have had to keep on the move . I have been in danger from rivers . I have been in danger from robbers . I have been in danger from people from my own country . I have been in danger from those who aren't Jews . I have been in danger in the city , in the country , and at sea . I have been in danger from people who pretended they were believers .
47011027	I have worked very hard . Often I have gone without sleep . I have been hungry and thirsty . Often I have gone without food . I have been cold and naked .
47011028	Besides everything else , every day I am concerned about all the churches . It is a very heavy load .
47011029	If anyone is weak , I feel weak . If anyone is led into sin , I burn on the inside .
47011030	If I have to brag , I will brag about the things that show how weak I am .
47011031	I am not lying . The God and Father of the Lord Jesus knows this . May God be praised forever .
47011032	In Damascus the governor who served under King Aretas had their city guarded . He wanted to arrest me .
47011033	But I was lowered in a basket from a window in the wall . So I slipped through the governor's hands .
47012001	We can't gain anything by bragging . But I have to do it anyway . I am going to tell you what I've seen . I want to talk about what the Lord has shown me .
47012002	I know a believer in Christ who was taken up to the third heaven 14 years ago . I don't know if his body was taken up or not . Only God knows .
47012003	I don't know if that man was in his body or out of it . Only God knows . But I do know that
47012004	he was taken up to paradise . He heard things that couldn't be put into words . They were things that people aren't allowed to talk about .
47012005	I will brag about a man like that . But I won't brag about myself . I will brag only about how weak I am .
47012006	Suppose I decide to brag . That would not make me a fool , because I would be telling the truth . But I don't do it . Then no one will think more of me than he should because of what I do or say .
47012007	I could have become proud of myself because of the amazing and wonderful things God has shown me . So I was given a problem that caused pain in my body . It is a messenger from Satan to make me suffer .
47012008	Three times I begged the Lord to take it away from me .
47012009	But he said to me , " My grace is all you need . My power is strongest when you are weak . " So I am very happy to brag about how weak I am . Then Christ's power can rest on me .
47012010	Because of how I suffered for Christ , I'm glad that I am weak . I am glad in hard times . I am glad when people say mean things about me . I am glad when things are difficult . And I am glad when people make me suffer . When I am weak , I am strong .
47012011	I have made a fool of myself . But you made me do it . You should have praised me . Even though I am nothing , I am in no way less important than the " super-apostles . "
47012012	You can recognize apostles by the signs , wonders and miracles they do . Those things were faithfully done among you no matter what happened .
47012013	How were you less important than the other churches ? The only difference was that I didn't cause you any expense . Forgive me for that wrong !
47012014	Now I am ready to visit you for the third time . I won't cause you any expense . I don't want what you have . What I really want is you . After all , children shouldn't have to save up for their parents . Parents should save up for their children .
47012015	So I will be very happy to spend everything I have for you . I will even spend myself . If I love you more , will you love me less ?
47012016	In any case , I haven't caused you any expense . But I'm such a tricky fellow ! I have caught you by tricking you !
47012017	Did I take advantage of you through any of the men I sent to you ?
47012018	I asked Titus to go to you . And I sent our brother with him . Titus didn't take advantage of you , did he ? Didn't I act in the same spirit ? Didn't I follow the same path ?
47012019	All this time , have you been thinking that I've been speaking up for myself ? No , I've been speaking with God as my witness . I've been speaking like a believer in Christ . Dear friends , everything I do is to help you become stronger .
47012020	I'm afraid that when I come I won't find you as I want you to be . I'm afraid that you won't find me as you want me to be . I'm afraid there will be arguing , jealousy and fits of anger . I'm afraid you will separate into your own little groups . Then you will tell lies about each other . You will talk about each other . I'm afraid you will be proud and cause trouble .
47012021	I'm afraid that when I come again my God will put me to shame in front of you . Then I will be sad about many who sinned earlier and have not turned away from it . They have not turned away from uncleanness , sexual sins and wild living . They have done all those things .
47013001	This will be my third visit to you . Scripture says , " Every matter must be proved by the words of two or three witnesses . "
47013002	I already warned you during my second visit . I now say it again while I'm away . When I return , I won't spare those who sinned earlier . I won't spare any of the others either .
47013003	You are asking me to prove that Christ is speaking through me . He is not weak in dealing with you . He is powerful among you .
47013004	It is true that Christ was nailed to the cross because he was weak . But he lives by God's power . In the same way , I share his weakness . But by God's power I will live with him to serve you .
47013005	Take a good look at yourselves to see if you are really believers . Test yourselves . Don't you realize that Christ Jesus is in you ? Unless , of course , you fail the test !
47013006	I hope you will discover that I haven't failed the test .
47013007	I pray to God that you won't do anything wrong . I don't pray so that people will see that I have passed the test . Instead , I pray so that you will do what is right , even if it seems I have failed .
47013008	I can't do anything to stop the truth . I can only work for the truth .
47013009	I'm glad when I am weak but you are strong . I pray that you will become perfect .
47013010	That's why I write these things before I come to you . Then when I do come , I won't have to be hard on you when I use my authority . The Lord gave me the authority to build you up . He didn't give it to me to tear you down .
47013011	Finally , brothers and sisters , good-by . Try to be perfect . Pay attention to what I'm saying . Agree with one another . Live in peace . And the God who gives love and peace will be with you .
47013012	Greet one another with a holy kiss .
47013013	All of God's people send their greetings .
47013014	May the grace shown by the Lord Jesus Christ , and the love that God has given us , and the sharing of life brought about by the Holy Spirit be with you all .
48001001	I , Paul , am writing this letter . I am an apostle . People have not sent me . No human authority has sent me . I have been sent by Jesus Christ and by God the Father . God raised Jesus from the dead .
48001002	All the brothers who are with me join me in writing . We are sending this letter to you , the members of the churches in Galatia .
48001003	May God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ give you grace and peace .
48001004	Jesus gave his life for our sins . He set us free from this evil world . That was what our God and Father wanted .
48001005	Give glory to God for ever and ever . Amen .
48001006	I am amazed . You are so quickly deserting the One who chose you because of the grace that Christ has provided . You are turning to a different " good news . "
48001007	What you are accepting is really not the good news at all . It seems that some people have gotten you all mixed up . They are trying to twist the good news about Christ .
48001008	But suppose even we should preach a different " good news . " Suppose even an angel from heaven should preach it . I'm talking about a different one than the good news we gave you . Let anyone who does that be judged by God forever .
48001009	I have already said it . Now I will say it again . Anyone who preaches a " good news " that is different from the one you accepted should be judged by God forever .
48001010	Am I now trying to get people to think well of me ? Or do I want God to think well of me ? Am I trying to please people ? If I were , I would not be serving Christ .
48001011	Brothers and sisters , here is what I want you to know . The good news I preached is not something a human being made up .
48001012	No one gave it to me . No one taught it to me . Instead , I received it from Jesus Christ . He showed it to me .
48001013	You have heard of my earlier way of life as a Jew . With all my strength I attacked the church of God . I tried to destroy it .
48001014	I was moving ahead in my Jewish way of life . I went beyond many Jews who were my own age . I held firmly to the teachings passed down by my people .
48001015	But God set me apart from the time I was born . He showed me his grace by appointing me . He was pleased
48001016	to show his Son in my life . He wanted me to preach about Jesus among those who aren't Jews . When God appointed me , I didn't talk to anyone .
48001017	I didn't go up to Jerusalem to see those who were apostles before I was . Instead , I went at once into Arabia . Later I returned to Damascus .
48001018	Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem . I went there to get to know Peter . I stayed with him for 15 days .
48001019	I didn't see any of the other apostles . I only saw James , the Lord's brother .
48001020	Here is what you can be sure of . And God gives witness to it . What I am writing you is not a lie .
48001021	Later I went to Syria and Cilicia .
48001022	The members of Christ's churches in Judea did not know me in a personal way .
48001023	They only heard others say , " The man who used to attack us has changed . He is now preaching the faith he once tried to destroy . "
48001024	And they praised God because of me .
48002001	Fourteen years later I went up again to Jerusalem . This time I went with Barnabas . I took Titus along also .
48002002	I went because God showed me what he wanted me to do . I told the people there the good news that I preach among those who aren't Jews . But I spoke in private to those who seemed to be leaders . I was afraid that I was running or had run my race for nothing .
48002003	Titus was with me . He was a Greek . But even he was not forced to be circumcised .
48002004	That matter came up because some who pretended to be believers had slipped in among us . They wanted to find out about the freedom we have because we belong to Christ Jesus . They wanted to make us slaves again .
48002005	We didn't give in to them for a moment . We wanted the truth of the good news to remain with you .
48002006	Some people in Jerusalem seemed to be important . It makes no difference to me what they were . God does not judge by what he sees on the outside . Those people added nothing to my message .
48002007	In fact , it was just the opposite . They saw that I had been trusted with the task of preaching the good news just as Peter had been . My task was to preach to the non-Jews . Peter's task was to preach to the Jews .
48002008	God was working through Peter as an apostle to the Jews . He was also working through me as an apostle to the non-Jews .
48002009	James , Peter and John are considered to be pillars in the church . They recognized the special grace that was given to me . So they shook my hand and the hand of Barnabas . They wanted to show they accepted us . They agreed that we should go to the non-Jews . They would go to the Jews .
48002010	They asked only one thing . They wanted us to continue to remember poor people . That was what I really wanted to do anyway .
48002011	When Peter came to Antioch , I told him to his face that I was against what he was doing . He was clearly wrong .
48002012	He used to eat with those who weren't Jews . But certain men came from the group that was led by James . When they arrived , Peter began to draw back . He separated himself from the non-Jews . He was afraid of the circumcision group .
48002013	Peter's actions were not honest . The other Jews joined him . Even Barnabas was led down the wrong path .
48002014	I saw what they were doing . It was not in line with the truth of the good news . So I spoke to Peter in front of them all . " You are a Jew , " I said . " But you live like one who is not . So why do you force non-Jews to follow Jewish ways ? "
48002015	We are Jews by birth . We are not " non-Jewish sinners . "
48002016	We know that no one is made right with God by obeying the law . It is by believing in Jesus Christ . So we too have put our faith in Christ Jesus . That is so we can be made right with God by believing in Christ , not by obeying the law . No one can be made right with God by obeying the law .
48002017	We are trying to be made right with God through Christ . But it is clear that we are sinners . So does that mean that Christ causes us to sin ? Certainly not !
48002018	Suppose I build again what I had destroyed . Then I prove that I break the Law .
48002019	Because of the law , I died as far as the law is concerned . I died so that I might live for God .
48002020	I have been crucified with Christ . I don't live any longer . Christ lives in me . My faith in the Son of God helps me to live my life in my body . He loved me . He gave himself for me .
48002021	I do not get rid of the grace of God . What if a person could become right with God by obeying the law ? Then Christ died for nothing !
48003001	You foolish people of Galatia ! Who has put you under an evil spell ? When I preached , I clearly showed you that Jesus Christ had been nailed to the cross .
48003002	I would like to learn just one thing from you . Did you receive the Holy Spirit by obeying the law ? Or did you receive the Spirit by believing what you heard ?
48003003	Are you so foolish ? You began with the Holy Spirit . Are you now trying to complete God's work in you by your own strength ?
48003004	Have you suffered so much for nothing ? And was it really for nothing ?
48003005	Why does God give you his Spirit ? Why does he work miracles among you ? Is it because you do what the law says ? Or is it because you believe what you have heard ?
48003006	Think about Abraham . Scripture says , " Abraham believed God . God accepted Abraham because he believed . So his faith made him right with God . "
48003007	So you see , those who have faith are children of Abraham .
48003008	Long ago , Scripture knew that God would make non-Jews right with himself by believing in him . He announced the good news ahead of time to Abraham . He said , " All nations will be blessed because of you . "
48003009	So those who have faith are blessed along with Abraham . He was the man of faith .
48003010	All who depend on obeying the law are under a curse . It is written , " May everyone who doesn't continue to do everything that is written in the Book of the Law be under God's curse . "
48003011	We know that no one is made right with God by keeping the law . Scripture says , " Those who are right with God will live by faith . "
48003012	The law is not based on faith . In fact , it is just the opposite . It teaches that " the one who does those things will live by them . "
48003013	Christ set us free from the curse of the law . He did it by becoming a curse for us . It is written , " Everyone who is hung on a pole is under God's curse . "
48003014	Christ Jesus set us free so that the blessing given to Abraham would come to non-Jews through Christ . He did it so that we might receive the promise of the Holy Spirit by believing in Christ .
48003015	Brothers and sisters , let me give you an example from everyday life . No one can get rid of an official agreement between people . No one can add to it . It can't be changed after it has been made . It is the same with God's covenant .
48003016	The promises were given to Abraham . They were also given to his seed . Scripture does not say , " and to seeds . " That means many people . It says , " and to your seed . " That means one person . And that one person is Christ .
48003017	Here is what I mean . The law came 430 years after the promise . But the law does not get rid of God's covenant and promise . The covenant had already been made by God . So the law does not do away with the promise .
48003018	The great gift that God has for us does not depend on the law . If it did , it would no longer depend on a promise . But God gave it to Abraham as a free gift through a promise .
48003019	Then what was the purpose of the law ? It was added because of human sin . And it was supposed to control us until the promised Seed had come . The law was put into effect through angels by a go-between .
48003020	A go-between does not take sides . God didn't use a go-between when he made his promise to Abraham . But the same God was at work in both the law and the promise .
48003021	So is the law opposed to God's promises ? Certainly not ! What if a law had been given that could give life ? Then people could become right with God by obeying the law .
48003022	But Scripture announces that the whole world is a prisoner because of sin . It does so in order that what was promised might be given to those who believe . The promise comes through faith in Jesus Christ .
48003023	Before faith in Christ came , we were held prisoners by the law . We were locked up until faith was made known .
48003024	So the law was put in charge until Christ came . He came so that we might be made right with God by believing in Christ .
48003025	But now faith in Christ has come . So we are no longer under the control of the law .
48003026	You are all children of God by believing in Christ Jesus .
48003027	All of you who were baptized into Christ have put on Christ as if he were your clothes .
48003028	There is no Jew or Greek . There is no slave or free person . There is no male or female . Because you belong to Christ Jesus , you are all one .
48003029	You who belong to Christ are Abraham's seed . You will receive what God has promised .
48004001	Here is what I have been saying . As long as your own children are young , they are no different from slaves in your house . They are no different , even though they own all of the property .
48004002	They are under the care of guardians and those who manage the property . They are under their care until the time when their fathers give them the property .
48004003	It is the same with us . When we were children , we were slaves to the basic things the people of the world believe .
48004004	But then the right time came . God sent his Son . A woman gave birth to him . He was born under the authority of the law .
48004005	He came to set free those who were under the law . He wanted us to be adopted as children with all the rights children have .
48004006	Because you are his children , God sent the Spirit of his Son into our hearts . He is the Holy Spirit . By his power we call God " [ Abba . ] " Abba means Father .
48004007	So you aren't slaves any longer . You are God's children . Because you are his children , he gives you what he promised to give his people .
48004008	At one time you didn't know God . You were slaves to gods that are really not gods at all .
48004009	But now you know God . Even better , God knows you . So why are you turning back to those weak and worthless beliefs ? Do you want to be slaves to them all over again ?
48004010	You are observing special days and months and seasons and years !
48004011	I am afraid for you . I am afraid that somehow I have wasted my efforts on you .
48004012	I make my appeal to you , brothers and sisters . I'm asking you to become like me . After all , I became like you . You didn't do anything wrong to me .
48004013	As you know , it was because I was sick that I first preached the good news to you .
48004014	My sickness was hard on you . But you didn't put me off . You didn't make fun of me . Instead , you welcomed me as if I were an angel of God . You welcomed me as if I were Christ Jesus himself .
48004015	What has happened to all of your joy ? If you could have torn out your own eyes and given them to me , you would have . I can give witness to that .
48004016	Have I become your enemy now by telling you the truth ?
48004017	Those people are trying hard to win you over . But it is not for your good . They want to take you away from us . They want you to commit yourselves to them .
48004018	It is fine to be committed to something , if the purpose is good . And you shouldn't be committed only when I am with you . You should always be committed .
48004019	My dear children , I am in pain for you . Once again I have pain like a woman giving birth . And my pain will continue until Christ makes you like himself .
48004020	I wish I could be with you now . I wish I could change my tone of voice . As it is , you bewilder me .
48004021	You who want to be under the authority of the law , tell me something . Don't you know what the law says ?
48004022	It is written that Abraham had two sons . The slave woman gave birth to one of them . The free woman gave birth to the other one .
48004023	Abraham's son by the slave woman was born in the usual way . But his son by the free woman was born because of God's promise .
48004024	Those things can be taken as examples . The two women stand for two covenants . One covenant comes from Mount Sinai . It gives birth to children who are going to be slaves . It is Hagar .
48004025	Hagar stands for Mount Sinai in Arabia . She stands for the present city of Jerusalem . That's because she and her children are slaves .
48004026	But the Jerusalem that is above is free . She is our mother .
48004027	It is written , " Be glad , woman , you who have no children . Start shouting , you who have no labor pains . The woman who is all alone has more children than the woman who has a husband . "
48004028	Brothers and sisters , you are children because of God's promise just as Isaac was .
48004029	At that time , the son born in the usual way tried to hurt the son born by the power of the Holy Spirit . It is the same now .
48004030	But what does Scripture say ? " Get rid of the slave woman . Get rid of her son . The slave woman's son will never have a share of the family's property with the free woman's son . "
48004031	Brothers and sisters , we are not the slave woman's children . We are the free woman's children .
48005001	Christ has set us free . He wants us to enjoy freedom . So stand firm . Don't let the chains of slavery hold you again .
48005002	Here is what I , Paul , say to you . Don't let yourselves be circumcised . If you do , Christ won't be of any value to you .
48005003	I say it again . Every man who lets himself be circumcised must obey the whole law .
48005004	Some of you are trying to be made right with God by obeying the law . You have been separated from Christ . You have fallen away from God's grace .
48005005	But we expect to be made completely holy because of our faith in Christ . Through the Holy Spirit we wait in hope .
48005006	Circumcision and uncircumcision aren't worth anything to those who believe in Christ Jesus . The only thing that really counts is faith that shows itself through love .
48005007	You were running a good race . Who cut in on you and kept you from obeying the truth ?
48005008	The One who chooses you does not keep you from obeying the truth .
48005009	You should know that " just a little yeast works its way through the whole batch of dough . "
48005010	The Lord makes me certain that you will not think in any other way . The one who has gotten you all mixed up will pay the price . It doesn't matter who that may be .
48005011	Brothers and sisters , I am not still preaching that people must be circumcised . If I were , why am I still being opposed ? If that were what I preach , then the cross wouldn't upset anyone .
48005012	So then , what about troublemakers who try to get others to be circumcised ? I wish they would go the whole way ! I wish they would cut off everything that marks them as men !
48005013	My brothers and sisters , you were chosen to be free . But don't use your freedom as an excuse to live in sin . Instead , serve one another in love .
48005014	The whole law can be found in a single command . " Love your neighbor as you love yourself . "
48005015	You must not keep on biting each other . You must not keep eating each other up . Watch out ! You might destroy each other .
48005016	So I say , live by the Holy Spirit's power . Then you will not do what your sinful nature wants you to do .
48005017	The sinful nature does not want what the Spirit delights in . And the Spirit does not want what the sinful nature delights in . The two are at war with each other . That's what makes you do what you don't want to do .
48005018	But if you are led by the Spirit , you are not under the authority of the law .
48005019	What the sinful nature does is clear . It enjoys sexual sins , impure acts and wild living .
48005020	It worships statues of gods . It also worships evil powers . It is full of hatred and fighting . It is full of jealousy and fits of anger . It is interested only in getting ahead . It stirs up trouble . It separates people into their own little groups .
48005021	It wants what others have . It gets drunk and takes part in wild parties . It does many things of that kind . I warn you now as I did before . People who live like that will not receive God's kingdom .
48005022	But the fruit the Holy Spirit produces is love , joy and peace . It is being patient , kind and good . It is being faithful
48005023	and gentle and having control of oneself . There is no law against things of that kind .
48005024	Those who belong to Christ Jesus have nailed their sinful nature to his cross . They don't want what their sinful nature loves and longs for .
48005025	Since we live by the Spirit , let us march in step with the Spirit .
48005026	Let us not become proud . Let us not make each other angry . Let us not want what belongs to others .
48006001	Brothers and sisters , what if someone is caught in a sin ? Then you who are guided by the Spirit should correct that person . Do it in a gentle way . But be careful . You could be tempted too .
48006002	Carry each other's heavy loads . If you do , you will give the law of Christ its full meaning .
48006003	If you think you are somebody when you are nobody , you are fooling yourselves .
48006004	Each of you should put your own actions to the test . Then you can take pride in yourself . You won't be comparing yourself to somebody else .
48006005	Each of you should carry your own load .
48006006	Those who are taught the word must share all good things with their teacher .
48006007	Don't be fooled . You can't outsmart God . A man gathers a crop from what he plants .
48006008	Some people plant to please their sinful nature . From that nature they will harvest death . Others plant to please the Holy Spirit . From the Spirit they will harvest eternal life .
48006009	Let us not become tired of doing good . At the right time we will gather a crop if we don't give up .
48006010	So when we can do good to everyone , let us do it . Let us make a special point of doing good to those who belong to the family of believers .
48006011	Look at the big letters I'm using as I write to you with my own hand !
48006012	Some people want others to think well of them . They are trying to force you to be circumcised . They do it for only one reason . They don't want to suffer by being connected with the cross of Christ .
48006013	Even those who are circumcised don't obey the law . But they want you to be circumcised . Then they can brag about what has been done to your body .
48006014	I never want to brag about anything except the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ . Through that cross the ways of the world have been crucified as far as I am concerned . And I have been crucified as far as the ways of the world are concerned .
48006015	Circumcision and uncircumcision don't mean anything . What really counts is the creation of a new nature .
48006016	May peace and mercy be given to all who follow this rule . May peace and mercy be given to the Israel that belongs to God .
48006017	Finally , let no one cause trouble for me . My body has marks that show I belong to Jesus .
48006018	Brothers and sisters , may the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .

49002001	You were living in your sins and lawless ways . But in fact you were dead .
49002002	You used to live as sinners when you followed the ways of this world . You served the one who rules over the spiritual forces of evil . He is the spirit who is now at work in those who don't obey God .
49002003	At one time we all lived among them . We tried to satisfy what our sinful nature wanted to do . We followed its longings and thoughts . God was angry with us and everyone else because of the kind of people we were .
49002004	But God loves us deeply . He is full of mercy .
49002005	So he gave us new life because of what Christ has done . He gave us life even when we were dead in sin . God's grace has saved you .
49002006	God raised us up with Christ . He has seated us with him in his heavenly kingdom because we belong to Christ Jesus .
49002007	He has done it to show the riches of his grace for all time to come . His grace can't be compared with anything else . He has shown it by being kind to us because of what Christ Jesus has done .
49002008	God's grace has saved you because of your faith in Christ . Your salvation doesn't come from anything you do . It is God's gift .
49002009	It is not based on anything you have done . No one can brag about earning it .
49002010	God made us . He created us to belong to Christ Jesus . Now we can do good things . Long ago God prepared them for us to do .

49002013	At one time you were far away from God . But now you belong to Christ Jesus . He spilled his blood for you . That has brought you near to God .

49003001	I , Paul , am a prisoner because of Christ Jesus . I am in prison because of my work among you who are not Jews .

49003018	May you have power with all God's people to understand Christ's love . May you know how wide and long and high and deep it is .
49003019	And may you know his love , even though it can't be known completely . Then you will be filled with everything God has for you .
49003020	God is able to do far more than we could ever ask for or imagine . He does everything by his power that is working in us .
49003021	Give him glory in the church and in Christ Jesus . Give him glory through all time and for ever and ever . Amen .
49004001	I am a prisoner because of the Lord . So I am asking you to live a life worthy of what God chose you for .
49004002	Don't be proud at all . Be completely gentle . Be patient . Put up with one another in love .
49004003	The Holy Spirit makes you one in every way . So try your best to remain as one . Let peace keep you together .
49004004	There is one body . There is one Spirit . You were appointed to one hope when you were chosen .
49004005	There is one Lord . There is one faith and one baptism .
49004006	There is one God and Father of all . He is over everything . He is through everything . He is in everything .
49004007	But each one of us has received a gift of grace , just as Christ wanted us to have it .
49004008	That is why Scripture says , " When he went up to his place on high , he led a line of prisoners . He gave gifts to people . "
49004009	What does " he went up " mean ? It can only mean that he also came down to the lower , earthly places .
49004010	The One who came down is the same as the One who went up higher than all the heavens . He did it in order to fill all of creation .
49004011	He is the One who gave some the gift to be apostles . He gave some the gift to be prophets . He gave some the gift of preaching the good news . And he gave some the gift to be pastors and teachers .
49004012	He did it so that they might prepare God's people to serve . If they do , the body of Christ will be built up .
49004013	That will continue until we all become one in the faith and in the knowledge of God's Son . Then we will be grown up in the faith . We will receive everything that Christ has for us .
49004014	We will no longer be babies in the faith . We won't be like ships tossed around by the waves . We won't be blown here and there by every new teaching . We won't be blown around by the cleverness and tricks of people who try to hide their evil plans .
49004015	Instead , we will speak the truth in love . We will grow up into Christ in every way . He is the Head .
49004016	He makes the whole body grow and build itself up in love . Under the control of Christ , each part of the body does its work . It supports the other parts . In that way , the body is joined and held together .
49004017	Here is what I'm telling you . I am speaking for the Lord as I warn you . You must no longer live like those who aren't Jews . Their thoughts don't have any purpose .
49004018	They can't understand the truth . They are separated from the life of God . That is because they don't know him . And they don't know him because their hearts are stubborn .
49004019	They have lost all feeling for what is right . They have given themselves over to the evil pleasures of their bodies . They take part in every kind of unclean act . And they always long for more .
49004020	But that is not what you have learned about Christ .
49004021	I'm sure you heard of him . I'm sure you were taught by him . What you learned was the truth about Jesus .
49004022	You were taught not to live the way you used to . You must get rid of your old way of life . That's because it is polluted by longing for things that lead you down the wrong path .
49004023	You were taught to be made new in your thinking .
49004024	You were taught to start living a new life . It is created to be truly good and holy , just as God is .
49004025	So each of you must get rid of your lying . Speak the truth to your neighbor . We are all parts of one body .
49004026	Scripture says , " When you are angry , do not sin . " Do not let the sun go down while you are still angry .
49004027	Don't give the devil a chance .
49004028	Those who have been stealing must never steal again . Instead , they must work . They must do something useful with their own hands . Then they will have something to give to people in need .
49004029	Don't let any evil talk come out of your mouths . Say only what will help to build others up and meet their needs . Then what you say will help those who listen .
49004030	Do not make God's Holy Spirit sad . He marked you with a seal for the day when God will set you completely free .
49004031	Get rid of all hard feelings , anger and rage . Stop all fighting and lying . Put away every form of hatred .
49004032	Be kind and tender to one another . Forgive each other , just as God forgave you because of what Christ has done .
49005001	You are the children that God dearly loves . So be just like him .
49005002	Lead a life of love , just as Christ did . He loved us . He gave himself up for us . He was a sweet-smelling offering and sacrifice to God .
49005003	There should not be even a hint of sexual sin among you . Don't do anything unclean . And do not always want more and more . Things like that are not what God's holy people should do .
49005004	There must not be any unclean speech or foolish talk or dirty jokes . All of them are out of place . Instead , you should give thanks .
49005005	Here is what you can be sure of . Those who give themselves over to sexual sins are lost . So are people whose lives are not pure . The same is true of those who always want more and more . People who do those things might as well worship statues of gods . No one who does them will receive a share in the kingdom of Christ and of God .
49005006	Don't let anyone fool you with words that don't mean anything . Because of things like that , God is angry with those who don't obey .
49005007	So don't go along with people like that .
49005008	At one time you were in the dark . But now you are in the light because of what the Lord has done . Live like children of the light .
49005009	The light produces what is completely good , right and true .
49005010	Find out what pleases the Lord .
49005011	Have nothing to do with the acts of darkness . They don't produce anything good . Show what they are really like .
49005012	It is shameful even to talk about what people who don't obey do in secret .
49005013	But everything the light shines on can be seen .
49005014	Light makes everything clear . That is why it is said , " Wake up , sleeper . Rise from the dead . Then Christ will shine on you . "
49005015	So be very careful how you live . Do not live like people who aren't wise . Live like people who are wise .
49005016	Make the most of every opportunity . The days are evil .
49005017	So don't be foolish . Instead , understand what the Lord wants .
49005018	Don't fill yourself up with wine . Getting drunk will lead to wild living . Instead , be filled with the Holy Spirit .
49005019	Speak to each other with psalms , hymns and spiritual songs . Sing and make music in your heart to the Lord .
49005020	Always give thanks to God the Father for everything . Give thanks to him in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ .
49005021	Follow the lead of one another because of your respect for Christ .
49005022	Wives , follow the lead of your husbands as you follow the Lord .
49005023	The husband is the head of the wife , just as Christ is the head of the church . The church is Christ's body . He is its Savior .
49005024	The church follows the lead of Christ . In the same way , wives should follow the lead of their husbands in everything .
49005025	Husbands , love your wives . Love them just as Christ loved the church . He gave himself up for her .
49005026	He did it to make her holy . He made her clean by washing her with water and the word .
49005027	He did it to bring her to himself as a brightly shining church . He wants a church that has no stain or wrinkle or any other flaw . He wants a church that is holy and without blame .
49005028	In the same way , husbands should love their wives . They should love them as they love their own bodies . Any man who loves his wife loves himself .
49005029	After all , people have never hated their own bodies . Instead , they feed and care for their bodies . And that is what Christ does for the church .
49005030	We are parts of his body .
49005031	Scripture says , " That's why a man will leave his father and mother and be joined to his wife . The two will become one . "
49005032	That is a deep mystery . But I'm talking about Christ and the church .
49005033	A husband also must love his wife . He must love her just as he loves himself . And a wife must respect her husband .
49006001	Children , obey your parents as believers in the Lord . Obey them because it's the right thing to do .
49006002	Scripture says , " Honor your father and mother . " That is the first commandment that has a promise .
49006003	" Then things will go well with you . You will live a long time on the earth . "
49006004	Fathers , don't make your children angry . Instead , train them and teach them the ways of the Lord as you raise them .
49006005	Slaves , obey your masters here on earth . Respect them and honor them with a heart that is true . Obey them just as you would obey Christ .
49006006	Don't obey them only to please them when they are watching . Do it because you are slaves of Christ . Be sure your heart does what God wants .
49006007	Serve your masters with all your heart . Work as if you were not serving people but the Lord .
49006008	You know that the Lord will give you a reward . He will give to each of you in keeping with the good you do . It doesn't matter whether you are slaves or free .
49006009	Masters , treat your slaves in the same way . When you warn them , don't be too hard on them . You know that the One who is their Master and yours is in heaven . And he treats everyone the same .
49006010	Finally , let the Lord make you strong . Depend on his mighty power .
49006011	Put on all of God's armor . Then you can stand firm against the devil's evil plans .
49006012	Our fight is not against human beings . It is against the rulers , the authorities and the powers of this dark world . It is against the spiritual forces of evil in the heavenly world .
49006013	So put on all of God's armor . Evil days will come . But you will be able to stand up to anything . And after you have done everything you can , you will still be standing .
49006014	So stand firm . Put the belt of truth around your waist . Put the armor of godliness on your chest .
49006015	Wear on your feet what will prepare you to tell the good news of peace .
49006016	Also , pick up the shield of faith . With it you can put out all of the flaming arrows of the evil one .
49006017	Put on the helmet of salvation . And take the sword of the Holy Spirit . The sword is God's word .
49006018	At all times , pray by the power of the Spirit . Pray all kinds of prayers . Be watchful , so that you can pray . Always keep on praying for all of God's people .
49006019	Pray also for me . Pray that when I open my mouth , the right words will be given to me . Then I can be bold as I tell the mystery of the good news .
49006020	Because of the good news , I am being held by chains as the Lord's messenger . So pray that I will be bold as I preach the good news . That's what I should do .
49006021	Tychicus is a dear brother . He is faithful in serving the Lord . He will tell you everything about me . Then you will know how I am and what I am doing .
49006022	That's why I am sending him to you . I want you to know how we are . And I want him to cheer you up .
49006023	May God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ give peace to the brothers and sisters . May they also give them love and faith .
49006024	May grace be given to everyone who loves our Lord Jesus Christ with a love that will never die .
50001001	We , Paul and Timothy , are writing this letter . We serve Christ Jesus . We are sending this letter to you , all of God's people in Philippi . You belong to Christ Jesus . We are also sending this letter to your leaders and deacons .
50001002	May God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ give you grace and peace .
50001003	I thank my God every time I remember you .
50001004	In all my prayers for all of you , I always pray with joy .
50001005	I am happy because you have joined me in spreading the good news . You have done so from the first day until now .
50001006	I am sure that the One who began a good work in you will carry it on until it is completed . That will be on the day Christ Jesus returns .
50001007	It is right for me to feel this way about all of you . I love you with all my heart . I may be held by chains , or I may be standing up for the truth of the good news . Either way , all of you share in God's grace together with me .
50001008	God can give witness that I long for all of you . I love you with the love that Christ Jesus gives .
50001009	I pray that your love will grow more and more . And let it be based on knowledge and understanding .
50001010	Then you will be able to know what is best . You will be pure and without blame until the day Christ returns .
50001011	You will be filled with the fruit of right living produced by Jesus Christ . All of those things bring glory and praise to God .
50001012	Brothers and sisters , here is what I want you to know . What has happened to me has really helped to spread the good news .
50001013	One thing has become clear . I am being held by chains because of my stand for Christ . All of the palace guards and everyone else know it .
50001014	Because I am being held by chains , most of the believers in the Lord have become bolder . They now speak God's word more boldly and without fear .
50001015	It's true that some preach about Christ because they are jealous . But others preach about Christ to help me in my work .
50001016	The last group acts out of love . They know I have been put here to stand up for the good news .
50001017	But the others preach about Christ only to get ahead . They are not honest and true . They think they can stir up trouble for me while I am being held by chains .
50001018	But what does it matter ? Here is the important thing . Whether for reasons that are right or wrong , Christ is being preached about . That makes me very glad . And I will continue to be glad .
50001019	I know that you are praying for me . I also know that the Spirit of Jesus Christ will help me . So no matter what happens , I'm sure I will still be saved .
50001020	I completely expect and hope that I won't be ashamed in any way . I'm sure I will be brave enough . Now as always Christ will be lifted high through my body . He will be lifted up whether I live or die .
50001021	For me , life finds all of its meaning in Christ . Death also has its benefits .
50001022	Suppose I go on living in my body . Then I will be able to carry on my work . It will bear a lot of fruit . But what should I choose ? I don't know .
50001023	I can't decide between the two . I long to leave this world and be with Christ . That is better by far .
50001024	But it is more important for you that I stay alive .
50001025	I'm sure of that . So I know I will remain with you . And I will continue with all of you to help you grow and be joyful in what you have been taught .
50001026	I'm sure I will be with you again . Then your joy in Christ Jesus will be greater than ever because of me .
50001027	No matter what happens , live in a way that brings honor to the good news about Christ . Then I will know that you stand firm with one purpose . I may come and see you or only hear about you . But I will know that you work together as one person . And I will know that you work to spread the teachings of the good news .
50001028	So don't be afraid in any way of those who oppose you . That will show them that they will be destroyed and that you will be saved . That's what God will do .
50001029	Here is what he has given you to do for Christ . You must not only believe in him . You must also suffer for him .
50001030	You are going through the same struggle you saw me go through . As you have heard , I am still struggling .

50002002	Then make my joy complete by agreeing with each other . Have the same love . Be one in spirit and purpose .
50002003	Don't do anything only to get ahead . Don't do it because you are proud . Instead , be free of pride . Think of others as better than yourselves .
50002004	None of you should look out just for your own good . You should also look out for the good of others .
50002005	You should think in the same way Christ Jesus does .
50002006	In his very nature he was God . But he did not think that being equal with God was something he should hold on to .

50002027	He was very sick . In fact , he almost died . But God had mercy on him . He also had mercy on me . God spared me sadness after sadness .
50002028	So I want even more to send him to you . Then when you see him again , you will be glad . And I won't worry so much .
50002029	Welcome him as a brother in the Lord with great joy . Honor people like him .
50002030	He almost died for the work of Christ . He put his life in danger to make up for the help you couldn't give me .
