50003002	Watch out for those dogs . They do evil things . When they circumcise , it is nothing more than a useless cutting of the body .
50003003	But we have been truly circumcised . We worship God by the power of his Spirit . We brag about what Christ Jesus has done . We don't put our trust in our weak human nature .

50003006	As far as being committed is concerned , I opposed and attacked the church . As far as keeping the Law is concerned , I kept it perfectly .

50003014	I move on toward the goal to win the prize . God has appointed me to win it . The heavenly prize is Christ Jesus himself .
50003015	All of us who are grown up in the faith should see things that way . Maybe you think differently about something . But God will make it clear to you .

50003020	But we are citizens of heaven . And we can hardly wait for a Savior from there . He is the Lord Jesus Christ .
50003021	He has the power to bring everything under his control . By his power he will change our earthly bodies . They will become like his glorious body .

51001021	At one time you were separated from God . You were enemies in your minds because of your evil ways .

51002007	Have your roots in him . Build yourselves up in him . Grow strong in what you believe , just as you were taught . Be more thankful than ever before .

51002009	God's whole nature is living in Christ in human form .
51002010	Because you belong to Christ , you have everything you need . He is the ruler over every power and authority .
51002011	When you received Christ , you were also circumcised by putting away your sinful nature . Human hands didn't circumcise you . Christ did .
51002012	When you were baptized , you were buried together with him . You were raised to life together with him by believing in God's power . God raised Jesus from the dead .
51002013	At one time you were dead in your sins . Your sinful nature was not circumcised . But God gave you new life together with Christ . He forgave us all of our sins .
51002014	He wiped out the written Law with its rules . The Law was against us . It opposed us . He took it away and nailed it to the cross .
51002015	He took away the weapons of the powers and authorities . He made a public show of them . He won the battle over them by dying on the cross .
51002016	So don't let anyone judge you because of what you eat or drink . Don't let anyone judge you about holy days . I'm talking about special feasts and New Moons and Sabbath days .
51002017	They are only a shadow of the things that were going to come . But what is real is found in Christ .
51002018	Some people enjoy pretending they aren't proud . They worship angels . But don't let people like that hold you back from winning the prize . They tell you every little thing about what they have seen . Their minds are not guided by the Holy Spirit . So they are proud of their useless ideas .
51002019	They aren't connected to the Head . But the whole body grows from the Head . The muscles and tendons hold the body together . And God causes it to grow .
51002020	The people of the world believe certain basic things . You died with Christ as far as things like that are concerned . So why do you act as if you still belong to the world ? Here are the rules you follow .
51002021	" Do not handle ! Do not taste ! Do not touch ! "
51002022	Rules like that are all going to die out as time goes by . They are only based on human rules and teachings .
51002023	It is true that those rules seem wise . Because of them , people give themselves over to their own kind of worship . They pretend they aren't proud . They treat their bodies very badly . But rules like that don't help . They don't stop people from chasing after sinful pleasures .
51003001	You have been raised up with Christ . So think about things that are in heaven . That is where Christ is . He is sitting at God's right hand .
51003002	Think about things that are in heaven . Don't think about things that are on earth .
51003003	You died . Now your life is hidden with Christ in God .
51003004	Christ is your life . When he appears again , you also will appear with him in heaven's glory .
51003005	So put to death anything that belongs to your earthly nature . Get rid of your sexual sins and unclean acts . Don't let your feelings get out of control . Remove from your life all evil longings . Stop always wanting more and more . You might as well be worshiping statues of gods .
51003006	God's anger is going to come because of those things .
51003007	That's the way you lived at one time in your life .

51003010	You have started living a new life . It is being made new so that what you know has the Creator's likeness .
51003011	Here there is no Greek or Jew . There is no difference between those who are circumcised and those who are not . There is no rude outsider , or even a Scythian . There is no slave or free person . But Christ is everything . And he is in everything .
51003012	You are God's chosen people . You are holy and dearly loved . So put on tender mercy and kindness as if they were your clothes . Don't be proud . Be gentle and patient .
51003013	Put up with each other . Forgive the things you are holding against one another . Forgive , just as the Lord forgave you .
51003014	And over all of those good things put on love . Love holds them all together perfectly as if they were one .
51003015	Let the peace that Christ gives rule in your hearts . As parts of one body , you were appointed to live in peace . And be thankful .

51003018	Wives , follow the lead of your husbands . That's what the Lord wants you to do .

51003021	Fathers , don't make your children bitter . If you do , they will lose hope .
51003022	Slaves , obey your earthly masters in everything . Don't do it just to please them when they are watching you . Obey them with an honest heart . Do it out of respect for the Lord .
51003023	Work at everything you do with all your heart . Work as if you were working for the Lord , not for human masters .
51003024	Work because you know that you will finally receive as a reward what the Lord wants you to have . You are serving the Lord Christ .
51003025	Anyone who does wrong will be paid back for what he does . God treats everyone the same .

54002005	There is only one God . And there is only one go-between for God and human beings . He is the man Christ Jesus .
54002006	He gave himself to pay for the sins of everyone . That was a witness given by God at just the right time .
54002007	I was appointed to be a messenger and an apostle to preach the good news . I am telling the truth . I'm not lying . God appointed me to be a teacher of the true faith to those who aren't Jews .
54002008	I want men everywhere to pray . I want them to lift up holy hands . I don't want them to be angry when they pray . I don't want them to argue .
54002009	I also want women to dress simply . They should wear clothes that are right and proper . They shouldn't braid their hair . They shouldn't wear gold or pearls . They shouldn't spend too much on clothes .
54002010	Instead , they should put on good works as if they were their clothes . That is proper for women who claim to worship God .
54002011	When a woman is learning , she should be quiet . She should follow the leaders in every way .
54002012	I do not let women teach . I do not let them have authority over men . They must be quiet .
54002013	Adam was made first . Then Eve was made .
54002014	Adam was not the one who was tricked . The woman was tricked and became a sinner .
54002015	Will women be saved by having children ? Only if they keep on believing , loving , and leading a holy life in a proper way .
54003001	Here is a saying you can trust . If anyone wants to be a leader in the church , he wants to do a good work for God and people .
54003002	A leader must be free from blame . He must be faithful to his wife . In anything he does , he must not go too far . He must control himself . He must be worthy of respect . He must welcome people into his home . He must be able to teach .
54003003	He must not get drunk . He must not push people around . He must be gentle . He must not be a person who likes to argue . He must not love money .
54003004	He must manage his own family well . He must make sure that his children obey him and show him proper respect .
54003005	Suppose someone doesn't know how to manage his own family . Then how can he take care of God's church ?
54003006	The leader must not be a new believer . If he is , he might become proud . Then he would be judged just like the devil .
54003007	The leader must also be respected by those who are outside the church . Then he will not be put to shame . He will not fall into the devil's trap .
54003008	Deacons also must be worthy of respect . They must be honest and true . They must not drink too much wine . They must not try to get money by cheating people .
54003009	They must hold on to the deep truths of the faith . Even their own minds tell them to do that .
54003010	First they must be tested . Then let them serve as deacons if there is nothing against them .
54003011	In the same way , their wives must be worthy of respect . They must not say things that harm others . In anything they do , they must not go too far . They must be worthy of trust in everything .
54003012	A deacon must be faithful to his wife . He must manage his children and family well .
54003013	Those who have served well earn the full respect of others . They also become more sure of their faith in Christ Jesus .
54003014	I hope I can come to you soon . But now I am writing these directions to you .
54003015	Then if I have to put off my visit , you will know how you should act in God's family . The family of God is the church of the living God . It is the pillar and foundation of the truth .
54003016	There is no doubt that godliness is a great mystery . Jesus appeared in a body . The Holy Spirit proved that he was the Son of God . He was seen by angels . He was preached among the nations . People in the world believed in him . He was taken up to heaven in glory .
54004001	The Holy Spirit clearly says that in the last days some people will leave the faith . They will follow spirits that will fool them . They will believe things that demons will teach them .
54004002	Teachings like those come from liars who pretend to be what they are not . Their sense of what is right and wrong has been burned as if with a hot iron .
54004003	They do not allow people to get married . They order them not to eat certain foods . But God created those foods . So people who believe and know the truth should receive them and give thanks for them .
54004004	Everything God created is good . You shouldn't turn anything down . Instead , you should thank God for it .
54004005	The word of God and prayer make it holy .
54004006	Point these things out to the brothers and sisters . Then you will serve Christ Jesus well . You were brought up in the truths of the faith . You received good teaching . You followed it .
54004007	Don't have anything to do with godless stories and silly tales . Instead , train yourself to be godly .
54004008	Training the body has some value . But being godly has value in every way . It promises help for the life you are now living and the life to come .
54004009	Here is a saying you can trust . You can accept it completely .
54004010	We work hard for it . Here is the saying . We have put our hope in the living God . He is the Savior of all people . Most of all he is the Savior of those who believe .
54004011	Command those things . Teach them .
54004012	Don't let anyone look down on you because you are young . Set an example for the believers in what you say and in how you live . Also set an example in how you love and in what you believe . Show the believers how to be pure .
54004013	Until I come , spend your time reading Scripture out loud to one another . Spend your time preaching and teaching .
54004014	Don't fail to use the gift the Holy Spirit gave you . He gave it to you through a message from God . It was given when the elders placed their hands on you .
54004015	Keep on doing those things . Give them your complete attention . Then everyone will see how you are coming along .
54004016	Be careful of how you live and what you believe . Never give up . Then you will save yourself and those who hear you .
54005001	Don't tell an older man off . Make an appeal to him as if he were your father . Treat younger men as if they were your brothers .
54005002	Treat older women as if they were your mothers . Treat younger women as if they were your sisters . Be completely pure in the way you treat them .
54005003	Take care of the widows who really need help .
54005004	But suppose a widow has children or grandchildren . They should first learn to put their faith into practice . They should care for their own family . In that way they will pay back their parents and grandparents . That pleases God .
54005005	The widow who really needs help and is left all alone puts her hope in God . Night and day she keeps on praying . Night and day she asks God for help .
54005006	But the widow who lives for pleasure is dead even while she is still living .
54005007	Give those directions to the people also . Then no one can be blamed .
54005008	Everyone should provide for his own relatives . Most of all , everyone should take care of his own family . If he doesn't , he has left the faith . He is worse than someone who doesn't believe .
54005009	No widow should be put on the list of widows unless she is more than 60 years old . She must also have been faithful to her husband .
54005010	She must be well known for the good things she does . That includes bringing up children . It includes inviting guests into her home . It includes washing the feet of God's people . It includes helping those who are in trouble . A widow should spend her time doing all kinds of good things .
54005011	Don't put younger widows on that kind of list . They might want pleasure more than they want Christ . Then they would want to get married again .
54005012	If they do that , they will be judged . They have broken their first promise .
54005013	Besides , they get into the habit of having nothing to do . They go around from house to house . They waste time . They talk about others . They bother people . They say things they shouldn't say .
54005014	So here is the advice I give to younger widows . Get married . Have children . Take care of your own homes . Don't give the enemy the chance to tell lies about you .
54005015	In fact , some have already turned away to follow Satan .
54005016	Suppose a woman is a believer and has widows in her family . She should help them . She shouldn't let the church pay the expenses . Then the church can help the widows who really need it .
54005017	The elders who do the church's work well are worth twice as much honor . That is true in a special way of elders who preach and teach .
54005018	Scripture says , " Do not stop the ox from eating while it helps separate the grain from the straw . " Scripture also says , " Workers are worthy of their pay . "
54005019	Don't believe a charge against an elder unless two or three witnesses bring it .
54005020	Elders who sin should be corrected in front of the other believers . That will be a warning to the others .
54005021	I command you to follow those directions . I command you in the sight of God and Christ Jesus and the chosen angels . Treat everyone the same . Don't favor one person over another .
54005022	Don't be too quick to place your hands on others to set them apart to serve God . Don't take part in the sins of others . Keep yourself pure .
54005023	Stop drinking only water . If your stomach is upset , drink a little wine . It can also help the other sicknesses you often have .
54005024	The sins of some people are easy to see . They are already being judged . Others will be judged later .
54005025	In the same way , good works are easy to see . But even good works that are hard to see can't stay hidden .
54006001	All who are forced to serve as slaves should consider their masters worthy of full respect . Then people will not speak evil things against God's name and against what we teach .
54006002	Some slaves have masters who are believers . They shouldn't show less respect for their masters just because they are believers . Instead , they should serve them even better . That's because those who benefit from their service are believers . They are loved by them . Teach the slaves those things . Try hard to get them to do them .
54006003	Suppose someone teaches ideas that are false . He doesn't agree with the true teaching of our Lord Jesus Christ . He doesn't agree with godly teaching .
54006004	People like that are proud . They don't understand anything . They like to argue more than they should . They can't agree about what words mean . All of that results in wanting what others have . It causes fighting , harmful talk , and evil distrust .
54006005	It stirs up trouble all the time among people whose minds are twisted by sin . The truth they once had has been taken away from them . They think they can get rich by being godly .
54006006	You gain a lot when you live a godly life . But you must be happy with what you have .
54006007	We didn't bring anything into the world . We can't take anything out of it .
54006008	If we have food and clothing , we will be happy with that .
54006009	People who want to get rich are tempted . They fall into a trap . They are tripped up by wanting many foolish and harmful things . Those who live like that are dragged down by what they do . They are destroyed and die .
54006010	Love for money causes all kinds of evil . Some people want to get rich . They have wandered away from the faith . They have wounded themselves with many sorrows .
54006011	But you are a man of God . Run away from all of those things . Try hard to do what is right and godly . Have faith , love and gentleness . Hold on to what you believe .
54006012	Fight the good fight along with all other believers . Take hold of eternal life . You were chosen for it when you openly told others what you believe . Many witnesses heard you .
54006013	God gives life to everything . Christ Jesus told the truth when he gave witness to Pontius Pilate . In the sight of God and Christ , I give you a command .
54006014	Obey it until our Lord Jesus Christ appears . Obey it completely . Then no one can find fault with it or you .
54006015	God will bring Jesus back at a time that pleases him . God is the blessed and only Ruler . He is the greatest King of all . He is the most powerful Lord of all .
54006016	God is the only one who can't die . He lives in light that no one can get close to . No one has seen him . No one can see him . Give honor and power to him forever . Amen .
54006017	Command people who are rich in this world not to be proud . Tell them not to put their hope in riches . Wealth is so uncertain . Command those who are rich to put their hope in God . He richly provides us with everything to enjoy .
54006018	Command the rich to do what is good . Tell them to be rich in doing good things . They must give freely . They must be willing to share .
54006019	In that way they will put riches away for themselves . It will provide a firm basis for the next life . Then they will take hold of the life that really is life .
54006020	Timothy , guard what God has trusted you with . Turn away from godless chatter . Stay away from opposing ideas that are falsely called knowledge .
54006021	Some people believe them . By doing that they have wandered away from the faith . May God's grace be with you .
55001001	I , Paul , am writing this letter . I am an apostle of Christ Jesus just as God planned . He sent me to tell about the promise of life that is found in Christ Jesus .
55001002	Timothy , I am sending you this letter . You are my dear son . May God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord give you grace , mercy and peace .
55001003	I serve God , knowing that what I have done is right . That is how our people served him long ago . Night and day I thank God for you . Night and day I always remember you in my prayers .
55001004	I remember your tears . I long to see you so that I can be filled with joy .
55001005	I remember your honest and true faith . It was alive first in your grandmother Lois and in your mother Eunice . And I am certain that it is now alive in you also .
55001006	That is why I remind you to help God's gift grow , just as a small spark grows into a fire . God put his gift in you when I placed my hands on you .
55001007	God didn't give us a spirit that makes us weak and fearful . He gave us a spirit that gives us power and love . It helps us control ourselves .
55001008	So don't be ashamed to give witness about our Lord . And don't be ashamed of me , his prisoner . Instead , join with me as I suffer for the good news . God's power will help us do that .
55001009	God has saved us . He has chosen us to live a holy life . It wasn't because of anything we have done . It was because of his own purpose and grace . Through Christ Jesus , God gave us that grace even before time began .
55001010	It has now been made known through the coming of our Savior , Christ Jesus . He has destroyed death . Because of the good news , he has brought life out into the light . That life never dies .
55001011	I was appointed to announce the good news . I was appointed to be an apostle and a teacher .
55001012	That's why I'm suffering the way I am . But I'm not ashamed . I know the One I have believed in . I am sure he is able to take care of what I have given him . I can trust him with it until the day he returns as judge .
55001013	Follow what you heard from me as the pattern of true teaching . Follow it with faith and love because you belong to Christ Jesus .
55001014	Guard the truth of the good news that you were trusted with . Guard it with the help of the Holy Spirit who lives in us .
55001015	You know that all the believers in Asia Minor have deserted me . They include Phygelus and Hermogenes .
55001016	May the Lord show mercy to all who live in the house of Onesiphorus . He often cheered me up . He was not ashamed that I was being held by chains .
55001017	In fact , it was just the opposite . When he was in Rome , he looked everywhere for me . At last he found me .
55001018	May Onesiphorus find mercy from the Lord on the day Jesus returns as judge . You know very well how many ways Onesiphorus helped me in Ephesus .
55002001	My son , be strong in the grace that is found in Christ Jesus .
55002002	You have heard me teach in front of many witnesses . Pass on to men you can trust the things you've heard me say . Then they will be able to teach others also .
55002003	Like a good soldier of Christ Jesus , share in the hard times with us .
55002004	A soldier does not take part in things that don't have anything to do with the army . He wants to please his commanding officer .
55002005	In the same way , anyone who takes part in a sport doesn't receive the winner's crown unless he plays by the rules .
55002006	The farmer who works hard should be the first to receive a share of the crops .
55002007	Think about what I'm saying . The Lord will help you understand what all of it means .
55002008	Remember Jesus Christ . He came from David's family line . He was raised from the dead . That is my good news .
55002009	I am suffering for it . I have even been put in chains like someone who has committed a crime . But God's word is not held back by chains .
55002010	So I put up with everything for the good of God's chosen people . Then they also can be saved . Christ Jesus saves them . He gives them glory that will last forever .
55002011	Here is a saying you can trust . If we died with him , we will also live with him .
55002012	If we don't give up , we will also rule with him . If we say we don't know him , he will also say he doesn't know us .
55002013	Even if we are not faithful , he will remain faithful . He must be true to himself .
55002014	Keep reminding the believers of those things . While God is watching , warn them not to argue about words . That doesn't have any value . It only destroys those who listen .
55002015	Do your best to please God . Be a worker who doesn't need to be ashamed . Teach the message of truth correctly .
55002016	Stay away from godless chatter . Those who take part in it will become more and more ungodly .
55002017	Their teaching will spread like a deadly sickness . Hymenaeus and Philetus are two of those teachers .
55002018	They have wandered away from the truth . They say that the time when people will rise from the dead has already come . They destroy the faith of some people .
55002019	But God's solid foundation stands firm . Here is the message written on it . " The Lord knows who his own people are . " Also , " All who say they believe in the Lord must turn away from evil . "
55002020	In a large house there are things made out of gold and silver . But there are also things made out of wood and clay . Some have honorable purposes . Others do not .
55002021	Suppose someone stays away from what is not honorable . Then the Master will be able to use him for honorable purposes . He will be made holy . He will be ready to do any good work .
55002022	Run away from the evil things that young people long for . Try hard to do what is right . Have faith , love and peace . Do these things together with those who call on the Lord from a pure heart .
55002023	Don't have anything to do with arguing . It is dumb and foolish . You know it only leads to fights .
55002024	Anyone who serves the Lord must not fight . Instead , he must be kind to everyone . He must be able to teach . He must not hold anything against anyone .
55002025	He must gently teach those who oppose him . Maybe God will give a change of heart to those who are against you . That will lead them to know the truth .
55002026	Maybe they will come to their senses . Maybe they will escape the devil's trap . He has taken them prisoner to do what he wanted .
55003001	Here is what I want you to know . There will be terrible times in the last days .
55003002	People will love themselves . They will love money . They will brag and be proud . They will tear others down . They will not obey their parents . They won't be thankful or holy .
55003003	They won't love others . They won't forgive others . They will tell lies about people . They will be out of control . They will be wild . They will hate what is good .
55003004	They will turn against their friends . They will act without thinking . They will think they are better than others . They will love what pleases them instead of loving God .
55003005	They will act as if they were serving God . But what they do will show that they have turned their backs on God's power . Have nothing to do with those people .
55003006	They are the kind who worm their way into the homes of silly women . They get control over them . Women like that are loaded down with sins . They give in to all kinds of evil longings .
55003007	They are always learning . But they never come to know the truth .
55003008	Jannes and Jambres opposed Moses . In the same way , the teachers I'm talking about oppose the truth . Their minds are twisted . As far as the faith is concerned , God doesn't accept them .
55003009	They won't get very far . Just like Jannes and Jambres , their foolish ways will be clear to everyone .
55003010	But you know all about my teaching . You know how I live and what I live for . You know about my faith and love . You know how patient I am . You know I haven't given up .
55003011	You know that I was treated badly . You know that I suffered greatly . You know what kinds of things happened to me in Antioch , Iconium and Lystra . You know how badly I have been treated . But the Lord saved me from all of my troubles .
55003012	In fact , everyone who wants to live a godly life in Christ Jesus will be treated badly .
55003013	Evil people and pretenders will go from bad to worse . They will fool others , and others will fool them .
55003014	But I want you to continue to follow what you have learned . Don't give up what you are sure of . You know the people you learned it from .
55003015	You have known the Holy Scriptures ever since you were a little child . They are able to teach you how to be saved by believing in Christ Jesus .
55003016	God has breathed life into all of Scripture . It is useful for teaching us what is true . It is useful for correcting our mistakes . It is useful for making our lives whole again . It is useful for training us to do what is right .
55003017	By using Scripture , a man of God can be completely prepared to do every good thing .
55004001	I give you a command in the sight of God and Christ Jesus . Christ will judge the living and the dead . Because he and his kingdom are coming , here is the command I give you .
55004002	Preach the word . Be ready to serve God in good times and bad . Correct people's mistakes . Warn them . Cheer them up with words of hope . Be very patient as you do these things . Teach them carefully .
55004003	The time will come when people won't put up with true teaching . Instead , they will try to satisfy their own longings . They will gather a large number of teachers around them . The teachers will say what the people want to hear .
55004004	The people will turn their ears away from the truth . They will turn to stories that aren't completely true .
55004005	But I want you to keep your head no matter what happens . Don't give up when times are hard . Work to spread the good news . Do everything God has given you to do .
55004006	I am already being poured out like a drink offering . The time has come for me to leave .
55004007	I have fought the good fight . I have finished the race . I have kept the faith .
55004008	Now there is a crown waiting for me . It is given to those who are right with God . The Lord , who judges fairly , will give it to me on the day he returns . He will not give it only to me . He will also give it to all those who are longing for him to return .
55004009	Do your best to come to me quickly .
55004010	Demas has deserted me . He has gone to Thessalonica . He left me because he loved this world . Crescens has gone to Galatia . Titus has gone to Dalmatia .
55004011	Only Luke is with me . Get Mark and bring him with you . He helps me in my work for the Lord .
55004012	I sent Tychicus to Ephesus .
55004013	When you come , bring my coat . I left it with Carpus at Troas . Also bring my scrolls . Most of all , bring the ones made out of animal skins .
55004014	Remember Alexander , the one who works with metal ? He did me a great deal of harm . The Lord will pay him back for what he has done .
55004015	You too should watch out for him . He strongly opposed our message .
55004016	The first time I was put on trial , no one came to help me . Everyone deserted me . I hope they will be forgiven for it .
55004017	The Lord stood at my side . He gave me the strength to preach the whole message . Then all those who weren't Jews heard it . I was saved from the lion's mouth .
55004018	The Lord will save me from every evil attack . He will bring me safely to his heavenly kingdom . Give him glory for ever and ever . Amen .
55004019	Greet Priscilla and Aquila . Greet those who live in the house of Onesiphorus .
55004020	Erastus stayed in Corinth . I left Trophimus sick in Miletus .
55004021	Do your best to get here before winter . Eubulus greets you . So do Pudens , Linus , Claudia and all the brothers .
55004022	May the Lord be with your spirit . May God's grace be with you .
56001001	I , Paul , am writing this letter . I serve God . I am an apostle of Jesus Christ . God sent me to help his chosen people believe in Christ . I have been sent to help them understand the truth that leads to godly living .
56001002	Faith and understanding rest on the hope of eternal life . Before time began , God promised to give that life . And he does not lie .
56001003	At just the right time he made his word plain . He did it through the preaching that he trusted me with . God our Savior has commanded all those things .
56001004	Titus , I am sending you this letter . You are my true son in the faith we share . May God the Father and Christ Jesus our Savior give you grace and peace .
56001005	I left you on the island of Crete . There were some things that hadn't been finished . You needed to sort them out . You also had to appoint elders in every town . I told you how to do it .
56001006	An elder must be without blame . He must be faithful to his wife . His children must be believers . They must not give anyone a reason to say that they are wild and don't obey .
56001007	A church leader is trusted with God's work . That's why he must be without blame . He must not look after only his own interests . He must not get angry easily . He must not get drunk . He must not push people around . He must not try to get money by cheating people .
56001008	Instead , he must welcome people into his home . He must love what is good . He must control his mind and feelings . He must do what is right . He must be holy . He must control what his body longs for .
56001009	The message as it has been taught can be trusted . He must hold firmly to it . Then he will be able to use true teaching to comfort others and build them up . He will be able to prove that people who oppose it are wrong .
56001010	Many people refuse to obey God . All they do is talk a lot . They try to fool others . No one does these things more than the circumcision group .
56001011	They must be stopped . They are destroying entire families . They are teaching things they shouldn't . They do it to get money by cheating people .
56001012	Even one of their own prophets has said , " People from Crete are always liars . They are evil beasts . They don't want to work . They live only to eat . "
56001013	What I have just said is true . So give them a strong warning . Then they will understand the faith correctly .
56001014	They will pay no attention to Jewish stories that aren't completely true . They won't listen to the commands of those who turn away from the truth .
56001015	To people who are pure , all things are pure . But to those who have twisted minds and don't believe , nothing is pure . In fact , their minds and their sense of what is right and wrong are twisted .
56001016	They claim to know God . But their actions show they don't know him . They are hated by God . They refuse to obey him . They aren't fit to do anything good .
56002001	What you teach must agree with true teaching .
56002002	Tell the older men that in anything they do , they must not go too far . They must be worthy of respect . They must control themselves . They must have true faith . They must love others . They must not give up .
56002003	In the same way , teach the older women to lead a holy life . They must not tell lies about others . They must not let wine control them . Instead , they must teach what is good .
56002004	Then they can train the younger women to love their husbands and children .
56002005	The younger women must control themselves . They must be pure . They must take good care of their homes . They must be kind . They must follow the lead of their husbands . Then no one will be able to speak evil things against God's word .
56002006	In the same way , help the young men to control themselves .
56002007	Do what is good . Set an example for them in everything . When you teach , be honest and serious .
56002008	No one can question the truth . So teach what is true . Then those who oppose you will be ashamed . That's because they will have nothing bad to say about us .
56002009	Teach slaves to obey their masters in everything they do . Tell them to try to please their masters . They must not talk back to them .
56002010	They must not steal from them . Instead , they must show that they can be trusted completely . Then they will make the teaching about God our Savior appealing in every way .
56002011	God's saving grace has appeared to all people .
56002012	It teaches us to say no to godless ways and sinful longings . We must control ourselves . We must do what is right . We must lead godly lives in today's world .
56002013	That's how we should live as we wait for the blessed hope God has given us . We are waiting for Jesus Christ to appear in all his glory . He is our great God and Savior .
56002014	He gave himself for us . By doing that , he set us free from all evil . He wanted to make us pure . He wanted us to be his very own people . He wanted us to long to do what is good .
56002015	Those are the things you should teach . Cheer people up and give them hope . Correct them with full authority . Don't let anyone look down on you .
56003001	Remind God's people to obey rulers and authorities . Remind them to be ready to do what is good .
56003002	Tell them not to speak evil things against anyone . Remind them to live in peace . They must consider the needs of others . They must be kind and gentle toward all people .
56003003	At one time we too acted like fools . We didn't obey God . We were tricked . We were controlled by all kinds of longings and pleasures . We were full of evil . We wanted what belongs to others . People hated us , and we hated one another .
56003004	But the kindness and love of God our Savior appeared .
56003005	He saved us . It wasn't because of the good things we had done . It was because of his mercy . He saved us by washing away our sins . We were born again . The Holy Spirit gave us new life .
56003006	God poured out the Spirit on us freely because of what Jesus Christ our Savior has done .
56003007	His grace made us right with God . So now we have received the hope of eternal life as God's children .
56003008	You can trust that saying . Those things are important . Treat them that way . Then those who have trusted in God will be careful to commit themselves to doing what is good . Those things are excellent . They are for the good of everyone .
56003009	But keep away from foolish disagreements . Don't argue about family histories . Don't make trouble . Don't fight about what the law teaches . Don't argue about things like that . It doesn't do any good . It doesn't help anyone .
56003010	Warn anyone who tries to get believers to take sides and separate into their own little groups . Warn him more than once . After that , have nothing to do with him .
56003011	You can be sure that someone like that is twisted and sinful . His own actions judge him .
56003012	I will send Artemas or Tychicus to you . Then do your best to come to me at Nicopolis . I've decided to spend the winter there .
56003013	Do everything you can to help Zenas the lawyer and Apollos . Send them on their way . See that they have everything they need .
56003014	Our people must learn to commit themselves to doing what is good . Then they will be able to provide for the daily needs of others . If they do that , their lives won't turn out to be useless .
56003015	Everyone who is with me sends you greetings . Greet those who love us in the faith . May God's grace be with you all .
57001001	I , Paul , am writing this letter . I am a prisoner because of Christ Jesus . Our brother Timothy joins me in writing . Philemon , we are sending you this letter . You are our dear friend . You work together with us .
57001002	We are also sending it to our sister Apphia and to Archippus . He is a soldier of Christ together with us . And we are sending it to the church that meets in your home .
57001003	May God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ give you grace and peace .
57001004	I always thank my God when I remember you in my prayers .
57001005	That's because I hear about your faith in the Lord Jesus . I hear about your love for all of God's people .
57001006	I pray that you will be active in sharing what you believe . Then you will completely understand every good thing we have in Christ .
57001007	Your love has given me great joy . It has cheered me up . My brother , you have renewed the hearts of God's people .
57001008	Because of the authority Christ has given me , I could be bold . I could order you to do what you should do anyway .
57001009	But I make my appeal to you on the basis of our love for each other . I , Paul , am an old man . I am now also a prisoner because of Christ Jesus .
57001010	I make an appeal to you for my son Onesimus . He became a son to me while I was being held by chains .
57001011	Before that , he was useless to you . But now he has become useful to you and to me .
57001012	I'm sending Onesimus back to you . My very heart goes with him .
57001013	I would have liked to keep him with me . Then he could have taken your place in helping me while I'm being held by chains because of the good news .
57001014	But I didn't want to do anything unless you agreed . Any favor you do must be done because you want to do it , not because you have to .
57001015	Onesimus was separated from you for a little while . Maybe that was so you could have him back for good .
57001016	You could have him back not as a slave . Instead , he would be better than a slave . He would be a dear brother . He is very dear to me . But he is even more dear to you , both as a man and as a brother in the Lord .
57001017	Do you think of me as a believer who works together with you ? Then welcome Onesimus as you would welcome me .
57001018	Has he done anything wrong to you ? Does he owe you anything ? Then charge it to me .
57001019	I'll pay it back . I , Paul , am writing this with my own hand . I won't even mention that you owe me your very life .
57001020	My brother , I wish I could receive some benefit from you because we both belong to the Lord . Renew my heart . We know that Christ is the one who really renews it .
57001021	I'm sure you will obey . So I'm writing to you . I know you will do even more than I ask .
57001022	There is one more thing . Have a guest room ready for me . I hope I can return to all of you in answer to your prayers .
57001023	Epaphras sends you greetings . Together with me , he is a prisoner because of Christ Jesus .
57001024	Mark , Aristarchus , Demas and Luke work together with me . They also send you greetings .
57001025	May the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit .
58001001	In the past , God spoke to our people through the prophets . He spoke at many times . He spoke in different ways .
58001002	But in these last days , he has spoken to us through his Son . He is the one whom God appointed to receive all things . God made everything through him .
58001003	The Son is the gleaming brightness of God's glory . He is the exact likeness of God's being . He uses his powerful word to hold all things together . He provided the way for people to be made pure from sin . Then he sat down at the right hand of the King , the Majesty in heaven .
58001004	So he became higher than the angels . The name he received is more excellent than theirs .
58001005	God never said to any of the angels , " You are my Son . Today I have become your Father . " Or , " I will be his Father . And he will be my Son . "
58001006	God's first and only Son is over all things . When God brings him into the world , he says , " Let all of God's angels worship him . "
58001007	Here is something else God says about the angels . " God makes his angels to be like winds . He makes those who serve him to be like flashes of lightning . "
58001008	But here is what he says about the Son . " You are God . Your throne will last for ever and ever . Your kingdom will be ruled by what is right .
58001009	You have loved what is right and hated what is evil . So your God has placed you above your companions . He has filled you with joy by pouring the sacred oil on your head . "
58001010	He also says , " Lord , in the beginning you made the earth secure . You placed it on its foundations . The heavens are the work of your hands .
58001011	They will pass away . But you remain . They will all wear out like a piece of clothing .
58001012	You will roll them up like a robe . They will be changed as a person changes clothes . But you remain the same . Your years will never end . "
58001013	God never said to an angel , " Sit at my right hand until I put your enemies under your control . "
58001014	All angels are spirits who serve . God sends them to serve those who will receive salvation .
58002001	So we must pay more careful attention to what we have heard . Then we will not drift away from it .
58002002	Even the message God spoke through angels had to be obeyed . Every time people broke the Law , they were punished . Every time they didn't obey , they were punished .
58002003	Then how will we escape if we don't pay attention to God's great salvation ? The Lord first announced that salvation . Those who heard him gave us the message about it .
58002004	God gave witness to it through signs and wonders . He gave witness through different kinds of miracles . He also gave witness through the gifts of the Holy Spirit . He gave them out as it pleased him .
58002005	God has not put angels in charge of the world that is going to come . We are talking about that world .
58002006	There is a place where someone has given witness to it . He said , " What is a human being that you think about him ? What is the son of man that you take care of him ?
58002007	You made him a little lower than the angels . You placed on him a crown of glory and honor .
58002008	You have put everything under his control . " So God has put everything under him . Everything is under his control . We do not now see everything under his control .
58002009	But we do see Jesus already given a crown of glory and honor . He was made a little lower than the angels . He suffered death . By the grace of God , he tasted death for everyone . That is why he was given his crown .
58002010	God has made everything . He has acted in exactly the right way . He is bringing his many sons and daughters to share in his glory . To do so , he has made the One who saved them perfect because of his sufferings .
58002011	The One who makes people holy and the people he makes holy belong to the same family . So Jesus is not ashamed to call them his brothers and sisters .
58002012	He says , " I will announce your name to my brothers and sisters . I will sing your praises among those who worship you . "
58002013	Again he says , " I will put my trust in him . " And again he says , " Here I am . Here are the children God has given me . "
58002014	Those children have bodies made out of flesh and blood . So Jesus became human like them in order to die for them . By doing that , he could destroy the one who rules over the kingdom of death . I'm talking about the devil .
58002015	Jesus could set people free who were afraid of death . All their lives they were held as slaves by that fear .
58002016	It is certainly Abraham's children that he helps . He doesn't help angels .
58002017	So he had to be made like his brothers in every way . Then he could serve God as a kind and faithful high priest . And then he could pay for the sins of the people by dying for them .
58002018	He himself suffered when he was tempted . Now he is able to help others who are being tempted .
58003001	Holy brothers and sisters , God chose you to be his people . So keep thinking about Jesus . He is our apostle . He is our high priest . We believe in him .
58003002	Moses was faithful in everything he did in the house of God . In the same way , Jesus was faithful to the One who appointed him .
58003003	The person who builds a house has greater honor than the house itself . In the same way , Jesus has been found worthy of greater honor than Moses .
58003004	Every house is built by someone . But God is the builder of everything .
58003005	Moses was faithful as one who serves in the house of God . He gave witness to what God would say in days to come .
58003006	But Christ is faithful as a son over God's house . We are his house if we continue to come boldly to God . We must also hold on to the hope we take pride in .
58003007	The Holy Spirit says , " Listen to his voice today .
58003008	If you hear it , don't be stubborn . You were stubborn when you opposed me . You did that when you were put to the test in the desert .
58003009	There your people of long ago put me to the test . For 40 years they saw what I did .
58003010	That is why I was angry with them . I said , ' Their hearts are always going down the wrong path . They have not known my ways . '
58003011	So in my anger I took an oath . I said , ' They will never enjoy the rest I planned for them . ' "
58003012	Brothers and sisters , make sure that none of you has a sinful heart . Do not let an unbelieving heart turn you away from the living God .
58003013	But build one another up every day . Do it as long as there is still time . Then none of you will become stubborn . You won't be fooled by sin's tricks .
58003014	We belong to Christ if we hold firmly to the faith we had at first . But we must hold to it until the end .
58003015	It has just been said , " Listen to his voice today . If you hear it , don't be stubborn . You were stubborn when you opposed me . "
58003016	Who were those who heard and refused to obey ? Weren't they all the people Moses led out of Egypt ?
58003017	Who was God angry with for 40 years ? Wasn't it with those who sinned ? They died in the desert .
58003018	What people did God promise with an oath that they would never enjoy the rest he planned for them ? Wasn't it those who didn't obey ?
58003019	So we see that they weren't able to enter . That's because they didn't believe .
58004001	God's promise of enjoying his rest still stands . So be careful that none of you fails to receive it .
58004002	The good news was preached to our people long ago . It has also been preached to us . The message they heard didn't have any value for them . They didn't combine it with faith .
58004003	Now we who have believed enjoy that rest . God said , " When I was angry I took an oath . I said , ' They will never enjoy the rest I planned for them . ' " Ever since God created the world , his work has been finished .
58004004	Somewhere he spoke about the seventh day . He said , " On the seventh day God rested from all his work . "
58004005	In the part of Scripture I talked about earlier God said , " They will never enjoy the rest I planned for them . "
58004006	It is still true that some will enjoy that rest . But those who had the good news preached to them earlier didn't go in . That was because they didn't obey .
58004007	So God again chose a certain day . He named it Today . He did that when he spoke through David a long time later . As it was said earlier , " Listen to his voice today . If you hear it , don't be stubborn . "
58004008	Suppose Joshua had given them rest . If he had , God would not have spoken later about another day .
58004009	So there is still a Sabbath rest for God's people .
58004010	God rested from his work . Those who enjoy God's rest also rest from their work .
58004011	So let us make every effort to enjoy that rest . Then no one will fall into sin by following the example of those who didn't obey God .
58004012	The word of God is living and active . It is sharper than any sword that has two edges . It cuts deep enough to separate soul from spirit . It can separate joints from bones . It judges the thoughts and purposes of the heart .
58004013	Nothing God created is hidden from him . His eyes see everything . He will hold us accountable for everything we do .
58004014	We have a great high priest . He has gone up into the heavens . He is Jesus the Son of God . So let us hold firmly to what we say we believe .
58004015	We have a high priest who can feel it when we are weak and hurting . We have a high priest who has been tempted in every way , just as we are . But he did not sin .
58004016	So let us boldly approach the throne of grace . Then we will receive mercy . We will find grace to help us when we need it .
58005001	Every high priest is chosen from among men . He is appointed to act for them in everything that has to do with God . He offers gifts and sacrifices for their sins .
58005002	He is able to deal gently with those who have gone down the wrong path without knowing it . He can do that because he himself is weak .
58005003	That's why he has to offer sacrifices for his own sins . He must also do it for the sins of the people .
58005004	No one can take that honor for himself . He must be appointed by God , just as Aaron was .
58005005	Even Christ did not take the glory of becoming a high priest for himself . God said to him , " You are my Son . Today I have become your Father . "
58005006	In another place he said , " You are a priest forever , just like Melchizedek . "
58005007	Jesus prayed while he lived on earth . He made his appeal with loud cries and tears . He prayed to the One who could save him from death . God heard him because he truly honored God .
58005008	Jesus was God's Son . But by suffering he learned what it means to obey .
58005009	In that way he was made perfect . Eternal salvation comes from him . He saves all those who obey him .
58005010	God appointed him to be the high priest , just like Melchizedek .
58005011	We have a lot to say about that . But it is hard to explain it to you . You learn too slowly .
58005012	By this time you should be teachers . But in fact , you need someone to teach you all over again . You need even the simple truths of God's word . You need milk , not solid food .
58005013	Anyone who lives on milk is still a baby . That person does not want to learn about living a godly life .
58005014	Solid food is for those who are grown up . They have trained themselves with a lot of practice . They can tell the difference between good and evil .
58006001	So let us leave the simple teachings about Christ . Let us grow up as believers . Let us not start all over again with the basic teachings . They taught us that we need to turn away from doing things that lead to death . They taught us that we must have faith in God .
58006002	They taught us about different kinds of baptism . They taught us about placing hands on people . They taught us that people will rise from the dead . They taught us that God will judge everyone . And they taught us that what he decides will last forever .
58006003	If God permits , we will go beyond those teachings and grow up .
58006004	What if some people fall away from the faith ? It won't be possible to bring them back . It is true that they have seen the light . They have tasted the heavenly gift . They have shared in the Holy Spirit .
58006005	They have tasted the good things of God's word . They have tasted the powers of the age to come .
58006006	But they have fallen away from the faith . So it won't be possible to bring them back . They won't be able to turn away from their sins . They are losing everything . That's because they are nailing the Son of God to the cross all over again . They are bringing shame on him in front of everyone .
58006007	Some land drinks the rain that falls on it . It produces a crop that is useful to those who farm the land . That land receives God's blessing .
58006008	But other land produces only thorns and weeds . That land isn't worth anything . It is in danger of coming under God's curse . In the end , it will be burned .
58006009	Dear friends , we have to say these things . But we are sure of better things in your case . We are talking about the things that go along with being saved .
58006010	God is fair . He will not forget what you have done . He will remember the love you have shown him . You showed it when you helped his people . And you show it when you keep on helping them .
58006011	We want each of you to be faithful to the very end . We want you to be sure of what you hope for .
58006012	We don't want you to slow down . Instead , be like those who have faith and are patient . They will receive what God promised .
58006013	When God made his promise to Abraham , he took an oath to keep it . But there was no one greater than himself to take an oath by . So he took his oath by making an appeal to himself .
58006014	He said , " I will certainly bless you . I will give you many children . "
58006015	Abraham was patient while he waited . Then he received what God promised him .
58006016	People take oaths by someone greater than themselves . An oath makes a promise certain . It puts an end to all arguing .
58006017	So God took an oath when he made his promise . He wanted to make it very clear that his purpose does not change . He wanted those who would receive what was promised to know that .
58006018	God took an oath so we would have good reason not to give up . We have run away from everything else to take hold of the hope offered to us in God's promise . So God gave his promise and his oath . Those two things can't change . He couldn't lie about them .
58006019	Our hope is certain . It is something for the soul to hold on to . It is strong and secure . It goes all the way into the Most Holy Room behind the curtain .
58006020	That is where Jesus has gone . He went there to open the way ahead of us . He has become a high priest forever , just like Melchizedek .
58007001	Melchizedek was the king of Salem . He was the priest of God Most High . He met Abraham , who was returning from winning a battle over some kings . Melchizedek blessed him .
58007002	Abraham gave him a tenth of everything . First , the name Melchizedek means " king of what is right . " Also , " king of Salem " means " king of peace . "
58007003	Melchizedek has no father or mother . He has no family line . His days have no beginning . His life has no end . He remains a priest forever , just like the Son of God .
58007004	Think how great Melchizedek was . Even our father Abraham gave him a tenth of what he had captured .
58007005	Now the law lays down a rule for the sons of Levi who become priests . They must collect a tenth from the people . They must collect it even from those who belong to the family line of Abraham .
58007006	Melchizedek did not trace his family line from Levi . But he collected a tenth from Abraham . Melchizedek blessed the one who had received the promises .
58007007	Without a doubt , the more important person blesses the less important one .
58007008	In the one case , the tenth is collected by men who die . But in the other case , it is collected by the one who is said to be living .
58007009	Levi collects the tenth . But we might say that Levi paid the tenth through Abraham .
58007010	That's because when Melchizedek met Abraham , Levi was still in Abraham's body .
58007011	Suppose the Levites who were priests could have made people perfect . The law was given to the people so they could become perfect through the priests . Then why was there still a need for another priest to come ? And why did he need to be like Melchizedek ? Why wasn't he from Aaron's family line ?
58007012	A change of priests requires a change of law .
58007013	Those things are said about one who is from a different tribe . No one from that tribe has ever served at the altar .
58007014	It is clear that our Lord came from the family line of Judah . Moses said nothing about priests who were from that tribe .
58007015	But suppose another priest like Melchizedek appears . Then what we have said is even more clear .
58007016	He has not become a priest because of a rule about his family line . He has become a priest because of his powerful life . His life can never be destroyed .
58007017	Scripture says , " You are a priest forever , just like Melchizedek . "
58007018	The old rule is done away with . It was weak and useless .
58007019	The law didn't make anything perfect . Now a better hope has been given to us . That hope brings us near to God .
58007020	The change of priests was made with an oath . Others became priests without any oath .
58007021	But Jesus became a priest with an oath . God said to him , " The Lord has taken an oath and made a promise . He will not change his mind . He has said , ' You are a priest forever . ' "
58007022	Because of that oath , Jesus makes the promise of a better covenant certain .
58007023	There were many priests in Levi's family line . Death kept them from continuing in office .
58007024	But Jesus lives forever . So he always holds the office of priest .
58007025	People now come to God through him . And he is able to save them completely and for all time . Jesus lives forever . He prays for them .
58007026	A high priest like that meets our need . He is holy , pure and without blame . He isn't like other people . He does not sin . He is lifted high above the heavens .
58007027	He isn't like the other high priests . They need to offer sacrifices day after day . First they bring offerings for their own sins . Then they do it for the sins of the people . But Jesus gave one sacrifice for the sins of the people . He gave it once and for all time . He did it by offering himself .
58007028	The law appoints men who are weak to be high priests . But God's oath came after the law . The oath appointed the Son . He has been made perfect forever .
58008001	Here is the point of what we are saying . We have a high priest like that . He sat down at the right hand of the throne of the King , the Majesty in heaven .
58008002	He serves in the sacred tent . The Lord set up the true holy tent . A mere man did not set it up .
58008003	Every high priest is appointed to offer gifts and sacrifices . So that priest also had to have something to offer .
58008004	What if he were on earth ? Then he would not be a priest . There are already priests who offer the gifts required by the law .
58008005	They serve at a sacred tent . But it is only a copy and shadow of what is in heaven . That's why God warned Moses when he was about to build the holy tent . God said , " Be sure to make everything just like the pattern I showed you on the mountain . "
58008006	Jesus has been given a greater work to do for God . He is the go-between for the new covenant . That covenant is better than the old one . It is based on better promises .
58008007	Suppose nothing had been wrong with that first covenant . Then no one would have looked for another covenant .
58008008	But God found fault with the people . He said , " A new day is coming , says the Lord . I will make a new covenant with the people of Israel . I will also make it with the people of Judah .
58008009	It will not be like the covenant I made with their people of long ago . That was when I took them by the hand . I led them out of Egypt . My new covenant will be different because they didn't remain faithful to my old covenant . So I turned away from them , says the Lord .
58008010	This is the covenant I will make with Israel after that time , says the Lord . I will put my laws in their minds . I will write them on their hearts . I will be their God . And they will be my people .
58008011	A man will not teach his neighbor anymore . And he will not teach his friend anymore . He will not say , ' Know the Lord . ' Everyone will know me . From the least important of them to the most important , all of them will know me .
58008012	I will forgive their evil ways . I will not remember their sins anymore . "
58008013	God called that covenant " new . " So he has made the first one out of date . And what is out of date and getting older will soon disappear .
58009001	The first covenant had rules for worship . It also had a sacred tent on earth .
58009002	A holy tent was set up . The lampstand was in the first room . So were the table and the holy bread . That was called the Holy Room .
58009003	Behind the second curtain was a room called the Most Holy Room .
58009004	It had the golden altar for incense . It also had the wooden chest called the ark of the covenant . The ark was covered with gold . It held the gold jar of manna . It held Aaron's wooden staff that had budded . It also held the stone tablets . The words of the covenant were written on them .
58009005	The cherubim were above the ark . God showed his glory there . The cherubim spread their wings over the place where sin was paid for . But we can't deal with those things more completely now .
58009006	That's how everything was arranged in the holy tent . The priests entered it at regular times . They went into the outer room to do their work for God and others .
58009007	But only the high priest went into the inner room . He went in only once a year . He never entered without taking blood with him . He offered the blood for himself . He also offered it for the sins the people had committed because they didn't know any better .
58009008	Here is what the Holy Spirit was showing us . He was telling us that God had not yet clearly shown the way into the Most Holy Room . It would not be clearly shown as long as the first holy tent was still standing .
58009009	That's an example for the present time . It shows us that the gifts and sacrifices they offered were not enough . They were not able to remove the worshiper's feelings of guilt .
58009010	They deal only with food and drink and different kinds of special washings . They are rules that deal with things outside our bodies . People had to obey them only until the new covenant came .
58009011	Christ came to be the high priest of the good things that are already here . When he came , he went through the greater and more perfect holy tent . The tent was not made by people . In other words , it is not a part of this creation .
58009012	He did not enter by spilling the blood of goats and calves . He entered the Most Holy Room by spilling his own blood . He did it once and for all time . He paid the price to set us free from sin forever .
58009013	The blood of goats and bulls is sprinkled on people . So are the ashes of a young cow . They are sprinkled on people the Law called unclean . The people are sprinkled to make them holy . That makes them clean on the outside .
58009014	But Christ offered himself to God without any flaw . He did this through the power of the eternal Holy Spirit . So how much more will his blood wash from our minds our feelings of guilt for committing sin ! Sin always leads to death . But now we can serve the living God .
58009015	That's why Christ is the go-between of a new covenant . Now those God calls to himself will receive the eternal gift he promised . They will receive it now that Christ has died to save them . He died to set them free from the sins they committed under the first covenant .
58009016	What happens in the case of a will ? It is necessary to prove that the person who made the will has died .
58009017	A will is in effect only when somebody has died . It never takes effect while the one who made it is still living .
58009018	That's why even the first covenant was not put into effect without the spilling of blood .
58009019	Moses first announced every commandment of the law to all the people . Then he took the blood of calves . He also took water , bright red wool and branches of a hyssop plant . He sprinkled the scroll . He also sprinkled all of the people .
58009020	He said , " This is the blood of the covenant God has commanded you to keep . "
58009021	In the same way , he sprinkled the holy tent with blood . He also sprinkled everything that was used in worship there .
58009022	In fact , the law requires that nearly everything be made clean with blood . Without the spilling of blood , no one can be forgiven .
58009023	So the copies of the heavenly things had to be made pure with those sacrifices . But the heavenly things themselves had to be made pure with better sacrifices .
58009024	Christ did not enter a sacred tent made by people . That tent was only a copy of the true one . He entered heaven itself . He did it to stand in front of God for us . He is there right now .
58009025	The high priest enters the Most Holy Room every year . He enters with blood that is not his own . But Christ did not enter heaven to offer himself again and again .
58009026	If he had , he would have had to suffer many times since the world was created . But now he has appeared once and for all time . He has come at the end of the ages to do away with sin . He has done that by offering himself .
58009027	People have to die once . After that , God will judge them .
58009028	In the same way , Christ was offered up once . He took away the sins of many people . He will also come a second time . At that time he will not suffer for sin . Instead , he will come to bring salvation to those who are waiting for him .
58010001	The law is only a shadow of the good things that are coming . It is not the real things themselves . The same sacrifices have to be offered over and over again . They must be offered year after year . That's why the law can never make perfect those who come near to worship .
58010002	If it could , wouldn't the sacrifices have stopped being offered ? The worshipers would have been made clean once and for all time . They would not have felt guilty for their sins anymore .
58010003	But those offerings remind people of their sins every year .
58010004	It isn't possible for the blood of bulls and goats to take away sins .
58010005	So when Christ came into the world , he said , " You didn't want sacrifices and offerings . Instead , you prepared a body for me .
58010006	You weren't pleased with burnt offerings and sin offerings .
58010007	Then I said , ' Here I am . It is written about me in the scroll . God , I have come to do what you want . ' "
58010008	First Christ said , " You didn't want sacrifices and offerings . You didn't want burnt offerings and sin offerings . You weren't pleased with them . " He said that even though the law required people to bring them .
58010009	Then he said , " Here I am . I have come to do what you want . " He did away with the first . He did it to put the second in place .
58010010	We have been made holy by what God wanted . We have been made holy because Jesus Christ offered his body once and for all time .
58010011	Day after day every priest stands and does his special duties . He offers the same sacrifices again and again . But they can never take away sins .
58010012	Jesus our priest offered one sacrifice for sins for all time . Then he sat down at the right hand of God .
58010013	Since that time , he waits for his enemies to be put under his control .
58010014	By that one sacrifice he has made perfect forever those who are being made holy .
58010015	The Holy Spirit also gives witness to us about this . First he says ,
58010016	" This is the covenant I will make with them after that time , says the Lord . I will put my laws in their hearts . I will write my laws on their minds . "
58010017	Then he adds , " I will not remember their sins anymore . I will not remember the evil things they have done . "
58010018	Where those have been forgiven , there is no longer any offering for sin .
58010019	Brothers and sisters , we are not afraid to enter the Most Holy Room . We enter boldly because of the blood of Jesus .
58010020	His way is new because he lives . It has been opened for us through the curtain . I'm talking about his body .
58010021	We also have a great priest over the house of God .
58010022	So let us come near to God with an honest and true heart . Let us come near with a faith that is sure and strong . Our hearts have been sprinkled . Our minds have been cleansed from a sense of guilt . Our bodies have been washed with pure water .
58010023	Let us hold firmly to the hope we claim to have . The One who promised is faithful .
58010024	Let us consider how we can stir up one another to love . Let us help one another to do good works .
58010025	Let us not give up meeting together . Some are in the habit of doing this . Instead , let us cheer each other up with words of hope . Let us do it all the more as you see the day coming when Christ will return .
58010026	What if we keep sinning on purpose ? What if we do it even after we know the truth ? Then there is no offering for our sins .
58010027	All we can do is to wait in fear for God to judge . His blazing fire will burn up his enemies .
58010028	Anyone who did not obey the law of Moses died without mercy if there were two or three witnesses .
58010029	What should be done to anyone who has hated the Son of God or has said no to him ? What should be done to a person who treated as an unholy thing the blood of the covenant that makes him holy ? What should be done to someone who has made fun of the Holy Spirit who brings God's grace ? Don't you think people like that should be punished more than anyone else ?
58010030	We know the One who said , " I am the One who judges people . I will pay them back . " Scripture also says , " The Lord will judge his people . "
58010031	It is a terrible thing to fall into the hands of the living God .
58010032	Remember those earlier days after you received the light . At that time you stood firm in a great struggle . You did it even in the face of suffering .
58010033	Sometimes you were made fun of in front of others . You were treated badly . At other times you stood side by side with people who were being treated like that .
58010034	You suffered together with people in prison . When your property was taken from you , you accepted it with joy . You knew that God had given you better and more lasting things .
58010035	So don't throw away your bold faith . It will bring you rich rewards .
58010036	You need to be faithful . Then you will do what God wants . You will receive what he has promised .
58010037	In just a very little while , " The one who is coming will come . He will not wait .
58010038	The one who is in the right will live by faith . If he pulls back , I will not be pleased with him . "
58010039	But we aren't people who pull back and are destroyed . We are people who believe and are saved .
58011001	Faith is being sure of what we hope for . It is being certain of what we do not see .
58011002	That is what the people of long ago were praised for .
58011003	We have faith . So we understand that everything was made when God commanded it . That's why we believe that what we see was not made out of what could be seen .
58011004	Abel had faith . So he offered to God a better sacrifice than Cain did . Because of his faith Abel was praised as a godly man . God said good things about his offerings . Because of his faith Abel still speaks . He speaks even though he is dead .
58011005	Enoch had faith . So he was taken from this life . He didn't die . He just couldn't be found . God had taken him away . Before God took him , Enoch was praised as one who pleased God .
58011006	Without faith it isn't possible to please God . Those who come to God must believe that he exists . And they must believe that he rewards those who look to him .
58011007	Noah had faith . So he built an ark to save his family . He built it because of his great respect for God . God had warned him about things that could not yet be seen . Because of his faith he showed the world that it was guilty . Because of his faith he was considered right with God .
58011008	Abraham had faith . So he obeyed God . God called him to go to a place he would later receive as his own . So he went . He did it even though he didn't know where he was going .
58011009	Because of his faith he made his home in the land God had promised him . He was like an outsider in a strange country . He lived there in tents . So did Isaac and Jacob . They received the same promise he did .
58011010	Abraham was looking forward to the city that has foundations . He was waiting for the city that God planned and built .
58011011	Abraham had faith . So God made it possible for him to become a father . He became a father even though he was too old . Sarah also was too old to have children . But Abraham believed that the One who made the promise was faithful .
58011012	Abraham was past the time when he could have children . But many children came from that one man . They were as many as the stars in the sky . They were as many as the sand on the seashore . No one could count them .
58011013	All those people were still living by faith when they died . They didn't receive the things God had promised . They only saw them and welcomed them from a long way off . They openly said that they were outsiders and strangers on earth .
58011014	People who say things like that show that they are looking for a country of their own .
58011015	What if they had been thinking of the country they had left ? Then they could have returned to it .
58011016	Instead , they longed for a better country . They wanted one in heaven . So God is pleased when they call him their God . In fact , he has prepared a city for them .
58011017	Abraham had faith . So he offered Isaac as a sacrifice . That happened when God put him to the test . Abraham had received the promises . But he was about to offer his one and only son .
58011018	God had said to him , " Your family line will continue through Isaac . " Even so , Abraham was going to offer him up .
58011019	Abraham believed that God could raise the dead . In a way , he did receive Isaac back from death .
58011020	Isaac had faith . So he blessed Jacob and Esau . He told them what was ahead for them .
58011021	Jacob had faith . So he blessed each of Joseph's sons . He blessed them when he was dying . Because of his faith he worshiped God as he leaned on the top of his wooden staff .
58011022	Joseph had faith . So he spoke to the people of Israel about their leaving Egypt . He gave directions about his bones . He did that toward the end of his life .
58011023	Moses' parents had faith . So they hid him for three months after he was born . They saw he was a special child . They were not afraid of the king's command .
58011024	Moses had faith . So he refused to be called the son of Pharaoh's daughter . That happened after he had grown up .
58011025	He chose to be treated badly together with the people of God . He chose that instead of enjoying sin's pleasures for a short time .
58011026	He suffered shame because of Christ . He thought it had great value . He considered it better than the riches of Egypt . He was looking ahead to God's reward .
58011027	Because of his faith he left Egypt . It wasn't because he was afraid of the king's anger . He didn't let anything stop him . He saw the One who can't be seen .
58011028	Because of his faith he was the first to keep the Passover Feast . He commanded the people of Israel to sprinkle blood on their doorways . He did it so that the destroying angel would not touch their oldest sons .
58011029	The people had faith . So they passed through the Red Sea . They went through it as if it were dry land . The Egyptians tried to do it also . But they drowned .
58011030	The people had faith . So the walls of Jericho fell down . It happened after they had marched around the city for seven days .
58011031	Rahab , the prostitute , had faith . So she welcomed the spies . That's why she wasn't killed with those who didn't obey God .
58011032	What more can I say ? I don't have time to tell about all the others . I don't have time to talk about Gideon , Barak , Samson and Jephthah . I don't have time to tell about David , Samuel and the prophets .
58011033	Because of their faith they took over kingdoms . They ruled fairly . They received the blessings God had promised . They shut the mouths of lions .
58011034	They put out great fires . They escaped being killed by the sword . Their weakness was turned to strength . They became powerful in battle . They beat back armies from other countries .
