58011035	Women received their dead back . The dead were raised to life again . Others were made to suffer greatly . But they refused to be set free . They did that so that after death they would be raised to a better life .
58011036	Some were laughed at . Some were whipped . Still others were held by chains . They were put in prison .
58011037	Some were killed with stones . They were sawed in two . They were put to death by the sword . They went around wearing the skins of sheep and goats . They were poor . They were attacked . They were treated badly .
58011038	The world was not worthy of them . They wandered in deserts and mountains . They lived in caves . They lived in holes in the ground .
58011039	All of those people were praised because they had faith . But none of them received what God had promised .
58011040	God had planned something better for us . So they would only be made perfect together with us .
58012001	A huge cloud of witnesses is all around us . So let us throw off everything that stands in our way . Let us throw off any sin that holds on to us so tightly . Let us keep on running the race marked out for us .
58012002	Let us keep looking to Jesus . He is the author of faith . He also makes it perfect . He paid no attention to the shame of the cross . He suffered there because of the joy he was looking forward to . Then he sat down at the right hand of the throne of God .
58012003	He put up with attacks from sinners . So think about him . Then you won't get tired . You won't lose hope .
58012004	You struggle against sin . But you have not yet fought to the point of spilling your blood .
58012005	You have forgotten that word of hope . It speaks to you as children . It says , " My son , think of the Lord's training as important . Do not lose hope when he corrects you .
58012006	The Lord trains those he loves . He punishes everyone he accepts as a son . "
58012007	Put up with hard times . God uses them to train you . He is treating you as children . What children are not trained by their parents ?
58012008	God trains all of his children . But what if he doesn't train you ? Then you are like children of people who weren't married to each other . You are not truly God's children .
58012009	Besides , we have all had human parents who trained us . We respected them for it . How much more should we be trained by the Father of our spirits and live !
58012010	Our parents trained us for a little while . They did what they thought was best . But God trains us for our good . He wants us to share in his holiness .
58012011	No training seems pleasant at the time . In fact , it seems painful . But later on it produces a harvest of godliness and peace . It does that for those who have been trained by it .
58012012	So lift your sagging arms . Strengthen your weak knees .
58012013	" Make level paths for your feet to walk on . " Then those who have trouble walking won't be disabled . Instead , they will be healed .
58012014	Try your best to live in peace with everyone . Try to be holy . Without holiness no one will see the Lord .
58012015	Be sure that no one misses God's grace . See to it that a bitter plant doesn't grow up . If it does , it will cause trouble . And it will pollute many people .
58012016	See to it that no one commits sexual sins . See to it that no one is godless like Esau . He sold the rights to what he would receive as the oldest son . He sold them for a single meal .
58012017	As you know , after that he wanted to receive his father's blessing . But he was turned away . With tears he tried to get the blessing . But he couldn't get his father to change his mind .
58012018	You haven't come to a mountain that can be touched . You haven't come to a mountain that is burning with fire . You haven't come to darkness , gloom and storm .
58012019	You haven't come to a blast from God's trumpet . You haven't come to a voice speaking to you . When people heard that voice long ago , they begged it not to say anything more to them .
58012020	What God commanded was too much for them . He said , " If even an animal touches the mountain , it must be killed with stones . "
58012021	The sight was terrifying . Moses said , " I am trembling with fear . "
58012022	But you have come to Mount Zion . You have come to the Jerusalem in heaven . It is the city of the living God . You have come to a joyful gathering of angels . There are thousands and thousands of them .
58012023	You have come to the church of God's people . God's first and only Son is over all things . God's people share in what belongs to his Son . Their names are written in heaven . You have come to God . He is the judge of all people . You have come to the spirits of godly people who have been made perfect .
58012024	You have come to Jesus . He is the go-between of a new covenant . You have come to the sprinkled blood . It promises better things than the blood of Abel .
58012025	Be sure that you don't say no to the One who speaks . People did not escape when they said no to the One who warned them on earth . And what if we turn away from the One who warns us from heaven ? How much less will we escape !
58012026	At that time his voice shook the earth . But now he has promised , " Once more I will shake the earth . I will also shake the heavens . "
58012027	The words " once more " point out that what can be shaken can be taken away . I'm talking about created things . Then what can't be shaken will remain .
58012028	We are receiving a kingdom that can't be shaken . So let us be thankful . Then we can worship God in a way that pleases him . We will worship him with deep respect and wonder .
58012029	Our " God is like a fire that burns everything up . "
58013001	Keep on loving each other as brothers and sisters .
58013002	Don't forget to welcome strangers . By doing that , some people have welcomed angels without knowing it .
58013003	Remember those in prison as if you were in prison with them . And remember those who are treated badly as if you yourselves were suffering .
58013004	All of you should honor marriage . You should keep the marriage bed pure . God will judge the person who commits adultery . He will judge everyone who commits sexual sins .
58013005	Don't be controlled by love for money . Be happy with what you have . God has said , " I will never leave you . I will never desert you . "
58013006	So we can say boldly , " The Lord helps me . I will not be afraid . What can a mere man do to me ? "
58013007	Remember your leaders . They spoke God's word to you . Think about the results of their way of life . Copy their faith .
58013008	Jesus Christ is the same yesterday and today and forever .
58013009	Don't be carried away by all kinds of strange teachings . It is good that God's grace makes our hearts strong . Don't depend on foods the Law requires . They have no value for the people who eat them .
58013010	Some worship at the holy tent . But we have an altar that they have no right to eat from .
58013011	The high priest carries the blood of animals into the Most Holy Room . He brings their blood as a sin offering . But the bodies are burned outside the camp .
58013012	Jesus also suffered outside the city gate . He suffered to make the people holy by spilling his own blood .
58013013	So let us go to him outside the camp . Let us be willing to suffer the shame he suffered .
58013014	Here we do not have a city that lasts . But we are looking for the city that is going to come .
58013015	So let us never stop offering to God our praise through Jesus . Let us offer it as the fruit of lips that say they believe in him .
58013016	Don't forget to do good . Don't forget to share with others . God is pleased with those kinds of offerings .
58013017	Obey your leaders . Put yourselves under their authority . They keep watch over you . They know they are accountable to God for everything they do . Obey them so that their work will be a joy . If you make their work a heavy load , it won't do you any good .
58013018	Pray for us . We feel sure we have done what is right . We long to live as we should in every way .
58013019	I beg you to pray that I may return to you soon .
58013020	Our Lord Jesus is the great Shepherd of the sheep . The God who gives peace brought him back from the dead . He did it because of the blood of the eternal covenant . May God
58013021	supply you with everything good . Then you can do what he wants . May he do in us what is pleasing to him . We can do it only with the help of Jesus Christ . Give him glory for ever and ever . Amen .
58013022	Brothers and sisters , I beg you to accept my word . It tells you to be faithful . I have written you only a short letter .
58013023	I want you to know that our brother Timothy has been set free . If he arrives soon , I will come with him to see you .
58013024	Greet all of your leaders . Greet all of God's people . The believers from Italy send you their greetings .
58013025	May grace be with you all .
59001001	I , James , am writing this letter . I serve God and the Lord Jesus Christ . I am sending this letter to you , the 12 tribes that are scattered among the nations . Greetings .
59001002	My brothers and sisters , you will face all kinds of trouble . When you do , think of it as pure joy .
59001003	Your faith will be put to the test . You know that when that happens it will produce in you the strength to continue .
59001004	The strength to keep going must be allowed to finish its work . Then you will be all you should be . You will have everything you need .
59001005	If any of you need wisdom , ask God for it . He will give it to you . God gives freely to everyone . He doesn't find fault .
59001006	But when you ask , you must believe . You must not doubt . People who doubt are like waves of the sea . The wind blows and tosses them around .
59001007	A man like that shouldn't expect to receive anything from the Lord .
59001008	He can't make up his mind . He can never decide what to do .
59001009	A believer who finds himself in a low position in life should be proud that God has given him a high position .
59001010	But someone who is rich should take pride in his low position . That's because he will fade away like a wild flower .
59001011	The sun rises . Its burning heat dries up the plants . Their blossoms fall . Their beauty is destroyed . In the same way , a rich person will fade away even as he goes about his business .
59001012	Blessed is the man who keeps on going when times are hard . After he has come through them , he will receive a crown . The crown is life itself . God has promised it to those who love him .
59001013	When you are tempted , you shouldn't say , " God is tempting me . " God can't be tempted by evil . And he doesn't tempt anyone .
59001014	But your own evil longings tempt you . They lead you on and drag you away .
59001015	When they are allowed to grow , they give birth to sin . When sin has grown up , it gives birth to death .
59001016	My dear brothers and sisters , don't let anyone fool you .
59001017	Every good and perfect gift is from God . It comes down from the Father . He created the heavenly lights . He does not change like shadows that move .
59001018	God chose to give us new birth through the message of truth . He wanted us to be the first and best of everything he created .
59001019	My dear brothers and sisters , pay attention to what I say . Everyone should be quick to listen . But they should be slow to speak . They should be slow to get angry .
59001020	A man's anger doesn't produce the kind of life God wants .
59001021	So get rid of everything that is dirty and sinful . Get rid of the evil that is all around us . Don't be too proud to accept the word that is planted in you . It can save you .
59001022	Don't just listen to the word . You fool yourselves if you do that . You must do what it says .
59001023	Suppose you listen to the word but don't do what it says . Then you are like a man who looks at his face in a mirror .
59001024	After looking at himself , he leaves . Right away he forgets what he looks like .
59001025	But suppose you take a good look at the perfect law that gives freedom . You keep looking at it . You don't forget what you've heard , but you do what the law says . Then you will be blessed in what you do .
59001026	Suppose you think your beliefs are right because of how you live . But you don't control what you say . Then you are fooling yourselves . Your beliefs are not worth anything at all .
59001027	Here are the kinds of beliefs that God our Father accepts as pure and without fault . When widows and children who have no parents are in trouble , take care of them . And keep yourselves from being polluted by the world .
59002001	My brothers and sisters , you are believers in our glorious Lord Jesus Christ . So treat everyone the same .
59002002	Suppose a man comes into your meeting wearing a gold ring and fine clothes . And suppose a poor man in worn-out clothes also comes in .
59002003	Would you show special attention to the one who is wearing fine clothes ? Would you say , " Here's a good seat for you " ? Would you say to the poor person , " You stand there " ? Or " Sit on the floor by my feet " ?
59002004	If you would , aren't you treating some people better than others ? Aren't you like judges who have evil thoughts ?
59002005	My dear brothers and sisters , listen to me . Hasn't God chosen those who are poor in the world's eyes to be rich in faith ? Hasn't he chosen them to receive the kingdom ? Hasn't he promised it to those who love him ?
59002006	But you have put poor people down . Aren't rich people taking advantage of you ? Aren't they dragging you into court ?
59002007	Aren't they speaking evil things against the worthy name of Jesus ? Remember , you belong to him .
59002008	The royal law is found in Scripture . It says , " Love your neighbor as you love yourself . " If you really keep that law , you are doing what is right .
59002009	But you sin if you don't treat everyone the same . The law judges you because you have broken it .
59002010	Suppose you keep the whole law but trip over just one part of it . Then you are guilty of breaking all of it .
59002011	God said , " Do not commit adultery . " He also said , " Do not commit murder . " Suppose you don't commit adultery but do commit murder . Then you have broken the Law .
59002012	Speak and act like people who are going to be judged by the law that gives freedom .
59002013	Those who have not shown mercy will not receive mercy when they are judged . To show mercy is better than to judge .
59002014	My brothers and sisters , what good is it if people claim they have faith but don't act like it ? Can that kind of faith save them ?
59002015	Suppose a brother or sister has no clothes or food .
59002016	Suppose one of you says to them , " Go . I hope everything turns out fine for you . Keep warm . Eat well . " And you do nothing about what they really need . Then what good have you done ?
59002017	It is the same with faith . If it doesn't cause us to do something , it's dead .
59002018	But someone will say , " You have faith . I do good works . " Show me your faith that doesn't do good works . And I will show you my faith by what I do .
59002019	You believe there is one God . Good ! Even the demons believe that . And they tremble !
59002020	You foolish man ! Do you want proof that faith without good works is useless ?
59002021	Our father Abraham offered his son Isaac on the altar . Wasn't he considered to be right with God because of what he did ?
59002022	So you see that what he believed and what he did were working together . What he did made his faith complete .
59002023	That is what Scripture means where it says , " Abraham believed God . God accepted Abraham because he believed . So his faith made him right with God . " And that's not all . God called Abraham his friend .
59002024	So you see that a person is made right with God by what he does . It doesn't happen only because of what he believes .
59002025	Didn't God make even Rahab the prostitute right with him ? That's because of what she did . She gave the spies a place to stay . Then she sent them off in a different direction .
59002026	The body without the spirit is dead . In the same way , faith without good works is dead .
59003001	My brothers and sisters , most of you shouldn't want to be teachers . You know that those of us who teach will be held more accountable .
59003002	All of us get tripped up in many ways . Suppose someone is never wrong in what he says . Then he is a perfect man . He is able to keep his whole body under control .
59003003	We put a bit in the mouth of a horse to make it obey us . We can control the whole animal with it .
59003004	And how about ships ? They are very big . They are driven along by strong winds . But they are steered by a very small rudder . It makes them go where the captain wants to go .
59003005	In the same way , the tongue is a small part of the body . But it brags a lot . Think about how a small spark can set a big forest on fire .
59003006	The tongue also is a fire . The tongue is the most evil part of the body . It pollutes the whole person . It sets a person's whole way of life on fire . And the tongue is set on fire by hell .
59003007	People have controlled all kinds of animals , birds , reptiles and creatures of the sea . They still control them .
59003008	But no one can control the tongue . It is an evil thing that never rests . It is full of deadly poison .
59003009	With our tongues we praise our Lord and Father . With our tongues we call down curses on people . We do it even though they have been created to be like God .
59003010	Praise and cursing come out of the same mouth . My brothers and sisters , it shouldn't be that way .
59003011	Can fresh water and salt water flow out of the same spring ?
59003012	My brothers and sisters , can a fig tree bear olives ? Can a grapevine bear figs ? Of course not . And a saltwater spring can't produce fresh water either .
59003013	Are any of you wise and understanding ? You should show it by living a good life . Wise people aren't proud when they do good works .
59003014	But suppose your hearts are jealous and bitter . Suppose you are concerned only about getting ahead . Don't brag about it . Don't say no to the truth .
59003015	Wisdom like that doesn't come down from heaven . It belongs to the earth . It doesn't come from the Holy Spirit . It comes from the devil .
59003016	Are you jealous ? Are you concerned only about getting ahead ? Then your life will be a mess . You will be doing all kinds of evil things .
59003017	But the wisdom that comes from heaven is pure . That's the most important thing about it . And that's not all . It also loves peace . It thinks about others . It obeys . It is full of mercy and good fruit . It is fair . It doesn't pretend to be what it is not .
59003018	Those who make peace should plant peace like a seed . If they do , it will produce a crop of right living .
59004001	Why do you fight and argue among yourselves ? Isn't it because of your sinful longings ? They fight inside you .
59004002	You want something , but you can't get it . You kill and want what others have . But you can't have what you want . You argue and fight . You don't have what you want , because you don't ask God .
59004003	When you do ask for something , you don't receive it . Why ? Because you ask for the wrong reason . You want to spend your money on your sinful pleasures .
59004004	You are not faithful to God . Don't you know that to be a friend of the world is to hate God ? Anyone who chooses to be a friend of the world becomes an enemy of God .
59004005	Don't you know what Scripture says ? The spirit that God caused to live in us wants us to belong only to God . Don't you think Scripture has a reason for saying that ?
59004006	God continues to give us more grace . That's why Scripture says , " God opposes those who are proud . But he gives grace to those who are not . "
59004007	So obey God . Stand up to the devil . He will run away from you .
59004008	Come near to God , and he will come near to you . Wash your hands , you sinners . Make your hearts pure , you who can't make up your minds .
59004009	Be full of sorrow . Cry and sob . Change your laughter to crying . Change your joy to sadness .
59004010	Bow down to the Lord . He will lift you up .
59004011	My brothers and sisters , don't speak against one another . Anyone who speaks against another believer speaks against the law . And anyone who judges another believer judges the law . When you judge the law , you are not keeping it . Instead , you are acting as if you were its judge .
59004012	There is only one Lawgiver and Judge . He is the One who is able to save life or destroy it . But who are you to judge your neighbor ?
59004013	Now listen , you who say , " Today or tomorrow we will go to this or that city . We will spend a year there . We will buy and sell and make money . "
59004014	You don't even know what will happen tomorrow . What is your life ? It is a mist that appears for a little while . Then it disappears .
59004015	Instead , you should say , " If it pleases the Lord , we will live and do this or that . "
59004016	As it is , you are proud . You brag about it . That kind of bragging is evil .
59004017	So when you know the good things you should do and don't do them , you sin .
59005001	You rich people , listen to me . Cry and sob , because you will soon be suffering .
59005002	Your riches have rotted . Moths have eaten your clothes .
59005003	Your gold and silver have lost their brightness . Their dullness will give witness against you . Your wanting more and more will eat your body like fire . You have stored up riches in these last days .
59005004	You have even failed to pay the workers who mowed your fields . Their pay is crying out against you . The cries of those who gathered the harvest have reached the ears of the Lord who rules over all .
59005005	You have lived an easy life on earth . You have given yourselves everything you wanted . You have made yourselves fat like cattle that will soon be butchered .
59005006	You have judged and murdered people who aren't guilty . And they weren't even opposing you .
59005007	Brothers and sisters , be patient until the Lord comes . See how the farmer waits for the land to produce its rich crop . See how patient he is for the fall and spring rains .
59005008	You too must be patient . You must stand firm . The Lord will soon come back .
59005009	Brothers and sisters , don't find fault with one another . If you do , you will be judged . And the Judge is standing at the door !
59005010	Brothers and sisters , think about the prophets who spoke in the name of the Lord . They are an example of how to be patient when you suffer .
59005011	As you know , we think that people who don't give up are blessed . You have heard that Job was patient . And you have seen what the Lord finally did for him . The Lord is full of tender mercy and loving concern .
59005012	My brothers and sisters , don't take an oath when you make a promise . Don't call on heaven or earth or anything else to back up what you say . Let your " Yes " be yes . And let your " No " be no . If you don't , you will be judged .
59005013	Are any of you in trouble ? Then you should pray . Are any of you happy ? Then sing songs of praise .
59005014	Are any of you sick ? Then send for the elders of the church to pray over you . Ask them to anoint you with oil in the name of the Lord .
59005015	The prayer offered by those who have faith will make you well . The Lord will heal you . If you have sinned , you will be forgiven .
59005016	So admit to one another that you have sinned . Pray for one another so that you might be healed . The prayer of a godly person is powerful . It makes things happen .
59005017	Elijah was just like us . He prayed hard that it wouldn't rain . And it didn't rain on the land for three and a half years .
59005018	Then he prayed again . That time it rained . And the earth produced its crops .
59005019	My brothers and sisters , suppose one of you wanders away from the truth and someone brings you back .
59005020	Then here is what I want everyone to remember . Anyone who turns a sinner from going down the wrong path will save him from death . God will erase many sins by forgiving him .
60001001	I , Peter , am writing this letter . I am an apostle of Jesus Christ . I am sending this letter to you , God's chosen people . You are strangers in the world . You are scattered all over Pontus , Galatia , Cappadocia , Asia and Bithynia .
60001002	You have been chosen in keeping with what God the Father had planned . That happened through the Spirit's work to make you pure and holy . God chose you so that you might obey Jesus Christ . He wanted you to be made clean by the blood of Christ . May more and more grace and peace be given to you .
60001003	Give praise to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ . In his great mercy he has given us a new birth and a hope that is alive . It is alive because Jesus Christ rose from the dead .
60001004	He has given us new birth so that we might share in what belongs to him . It is a gift that can never be destroyed . It can never spoil or even fade away . It is kept in heaven for you .
60001005	Through faith you are kept safe by God's power . Your salvation is going to be completed . It is ready to be shown to you in the last days .
60001006	Because you know this , you have great joy . You have joy even though you may have had to suffer for a little while . You may have had to suffer sadness in all kinds of trouble .
60001007	Your troubles have come in order to prove that your faith is real . It is worth more than gold . Gold can pass away even though fire has made it pure . Your faith is meant to bring praise , honor and glory to God . That will happen when Jesus Christ returns .
60001008	Even though you have not seen him , you love him . Though you do not see him now , you believe in him . You are filled with a glorious joy that can't be put into words .
60001009	You are receiving the salvation of your souls . It is the result of your faith .
60001010	The prophets searched very hard and with great care to find out about that salvation . They spoke about the grace that was going to come to you .
60001011	They wanted to find out when that salvation would come . The Spirit of Christ in them was telling them about the sufferings of Christ that were going to come . He was also telling them about the glory that would follow .
60001012	It was made known to the prophets that they were not serving themselves . Instead , they were serving you when they spoke about the things that you have now heard . Those who have preached the good news to you have told you those things . They have done it with the help of the Holy Spirit sent from heaven . Even angels long to look into those things .
60001013	So prepare your minds for action . Control yourselves . Put your hope completely in the grace that will be given to you when Jesus Christ returns .
60001014	You should obey . You shouldn't give in to evil longings . They controlled your life when you didn't know any better .
60001015	The one who chose you is holy . So you should be holy in all that you do .
60001016	It is written , " Be holy , because I am holy . "
60001017	You call on a Father who judges each person's work without favoring one over another . So live your lives as strangers here . Have the highest respect for God .
60001018	The blood of Christ set you free from an empty way of life . That way of life was handed down to you by your own people long ago . You know that you were not bought with things that can pass away , like silver or gold .
60001019	Instead , you were bought by the priceless blood of Christ . He is a perfect lamb . He doesn't have any flaws at all .
60001020	He was chosen before God created the world . But he came into the world in these last days for you .
60001021	Because of what Christ has done , you believe in God . It was God who raised him from the dead . And it was God who gave him glory . So your faith and hope are in God .
60001022	You have made yourselves pure by obeying the truth . So you have an honest and true love for your brothers and sisters . Love each other deeply , from the heart .
60001023	You have been born again by means of the living word of God . His word lasts forever . You were not born again from a seed that will die . You were born from a seed that can't die .
60001024	It is written , " All people are like grass . All of their glory is like the flowers in the field . The grass dries up . The flowers fall to the ground .
60001025	But the word of the Lord stands forever . " And that word was preached to you .
60002001	So get rid of every kind of evil . Stop telling lies . Don't pretend to be something you are not . Stop wanting what others have . Don't speak against each other .
60002002	Like babies that were just born , you should long for the pure milk of God's word . It will help you grow up as believers .
60002003	You can do it now that you have tasted how good the Lord is .
60002004	Christ is the living Stone . People did not accept him . But God chose him . God places the highest value on him .
60002005	You also are like living stones . As you come to him you are being built into a house for worship . There you will be holy priests . You will offer spiritual sacrifices . God will accept them because of what Jesus Christ has done .
60002006	In Scripture it says , " Look ! I am placing a stone in Zion . It is a chosen and very valuable stone . It is the most important stone in the building . The one who trusts in him will never be put to shame . "
60002007	The stone is very valuable to you who believe . But to people who do not believe , " The stone the builders did not accept has become the most important stone of all . "
60002008	And , " It is a stone that causes people to trip . It is a rock that makes them fall . " They trip and fall because they do not obey the message . That is also what God planned for them .
60002009	But God chose you to be his people . You are royal priests . You are a holy nation . You are a people who belong to God . All of this is so that you can sing his praises . He brought you out of darkness into his wonderful light .
60002010	Once you were not a people . But now you are the people of God . Once you had not received mercy . But now you have received mercy .
60002011	Dear friends , you are outsiders and strangers in this world . So I'm asking you not to give in to your sinful longings . They fight against your soul .
60002012	People who don't believe might say you are doing wrong . But lead good lives among them . Then they will see your good works . And they will give glory to God on the day he comes to judge .
60002013	Follow the lead of every human authority . Do it because the Lord wants you to . Obey the king . He is the highest authority .
60002014	Obey the governors . The king sends them to punish those who do wrong . He also sends them to praise those who do right .
60002015	By doing good you will put a stop to the talk of foolish people . They don't know what they are saying . God wants you to stop them .
60002016	Live like free people . But don't use your freedom to cover up evil . Live like people who serve God .
60002017	Show proper respect to everyone . Love the community of believers . Have respect for God . Honor the king .
60002018	Slaves , obey your masters with all the respect you should give them . Obey not only those who are good and kind . Obey also those who are not kind .
60002019	Suppose a person suffers pain unfairly because he wants to obey God . That is worthy of praise .
60002020	But suppose you receive a beating for doing wrong , and you put up with it . Will anyone honor you for that ? Of course not . But suppose you suffer for doing good , and you put up with it . God will praise you for that .
60002021	Christ suffered for you . He left you an example . He expects you to follow in his steps . You too were chosen to suffer .
60002022	Scripture says , " He didn't commit any sin . No lies ever came out of his mouth . "
60002023	People shouted at him and made fun of him . But he didn't do the same back to them . He suffered . But he didn't say that bad things would happen to them . Instead , he trusted in the One who judges fairly .
60002024	He himself carried our sins in his body on the cross . He did it so that we would die as far as sins are concerned . Then we would lead godly lives . His wounds have made you whole .
60002025	You were like sheep who were wandering away . But now you have returned to the Shepherd . He is the Leader of your souls .
60003001	Wives , follow the lead of your husbands . Suppose some of them don't believe God's word . Then let them be won to Christ without words by seeing how their wives behave .
60003002	Let them see how pure you are . Let them see that your lives are full of respect for God .
60003003	Braiding your hair doesn't make you beautiful . Wearing gold jewelry or fine clothes doesn't make you beautiful .
60003004	Instead , your beauty comes from inside you . It is the beauty of a gentle and quiet spirit . Beauty like that doesn't fade away . God places great value on it .
60003005	This is how the holy women of the past used to make themselves beautiful . They put their hope in God . And they followed the lead of their own husbands .
60003006	Sarah was like that . She obeyed Abraham . She called him her master . Do you want to be like her ? Then do what is right . And don't give in to fear .
60003007	Husbands , take good care of your wives . They are weaker than you . So treat them with respect . Honor them as those who will share with you the gracious gift of life . Then nothing will stand in the way of your prayers .
60003008	Finally , I want all of you to live together in peace . Be understanding . Love one another like members of the same family . Be kind and tender . Don't be proud .
60003009	Don't pay back evil with evil . Don't pay back unkind words with unkind words . Instead , pay them back with kind words . That's what you have been chosen to do . You can receive a blessing by doing it .
60003010	Scripture says , " Do you want to love life and see good days ? Then keep your tongues from speaking evil . Keep your lips from telling lies .
60003011	Turn away from evil , and do good . Look for peace , and go after it .
60003012	The Lord's eyes look with favor on those who are godly . His ears are open to their prayers . But the Lord doesn't look with favor on those who do evil . "
60003013	Who is going to hurt you if you really want to do good ?
60003014	But suppose you suffer for doing what is right . Then you will be blessed . Scripture also says , " Don't fear what others fear . Don't be afraid . "
60003015	But make sure in your hearts that Christ is Lord . Always be ready to give an answer to anyone who asks you about the hope you have . Be ready to give the reason for it . But do it gently and with respect .
60003016	Live so that you don't have to feel you've done anything wrong . Some people may say evil things about your good conduct as believers in Christ . If they do , they will be put to shame for speaking like that about you .
60003017	It is better to suffer for doing good than for doing evil if that's what God wants .
60003018	Christ died for sins once and for all time . The One who did what is right died for those who don't do right . He died to bring you to God . His body was put to death . But the Holy Spirit brought him back to life .
60003019	By means of the Spirit , Christ went and preached to the spirits in prison .
60003020	Long ago they did not obey . God was patient while Noah was building the ark . He waited , but only a few people went into the ark . A total of eight were saved by means of water .
60003021	The water of the flood is a picture of the baptism that now saves you also . The baptism I'm talking about has nothing to do with removing dirt from your body . Instead , it promises God that you will keep a clear sense of what is right and wrong . Jesus Christ has saved you by rising from the dead .
60003022	He has gone into heaven . He is at God's right hand . Angels , authorities and powers are under his control .
60004001	Christ suffered in his body . So get ready as a soldier does . Prepare yourselves to think in the same way Christ did . Do it because those who have suffered in their bodies are finished with sin .
60004002	As a result , they don't live the rest of their lives on earth controlled by evil human longings . Instead , they live to do what God wants .
60004003	You have spent enough time in the past doing what ungodly people choose to do . You lived a wild life . You longed for evil things . You got drunk . You went to wild parties . You worshiped statues of gods . The Lord hates that .
60004004	Ungodly people think that it's strange when you no longer join them in what they do . They want you to rush into the same flood of wasteful living . So they say bad things about you .
60004005	But they will have to explain their actions to God . He is ready to judge the living and the dead .
60004006	That's why the good news was preached even to people who are now dead . Human judges said they were guilty as far as their bodies were concerned . But God set their spirits free to live as he wanted them to .
60004007	The end of all things is near . So keep a clear mind . Control yourselves . Then you can pray .
60004008	Most of all , love one another deeply . Love erases many sins by forgiving them .
60004009	Welcome others into your homes without complaining .
60004010	God's gifts of grace come in many forms . Each of you has received a gift in order to serve others . You should use it faithfully .
60004011	If you speak , you should do it like one speaking God's very words . If you serve , you should do it with the strength God provides . Then in all things God will be praised through Jesus Christ . Give him the glory and the power for ever and ever . Amen .
60004012	Dear friends , don't be surprised by the painful suffering you are going through . Don't feel as if something strange were happening to you .
60004013	Be joyful that you are taking part in Christ's sufferings . Then you will be filled with joy when Christ returns in glory .
60004014	Suppose people make fun of you because you believe in Christ . Then you are blessed , because God's Spirit rests on you . He is the Spirit of glory .
60004015	Suppose you suffer . Then it shouldn't be because you are a murderer or a thief . It shouldn't be because you do evil things . It shouldn't be because you poke your nose into other people's business .
60004016	But suppose you suffer for being a Christian . Then don't be ashamed . Instead , praise God because you are known by that name .
60004017	It is time for people to be judged . It will begin with the family of God . And since it begins with us , what will happen to people who don't obey God's good news ?
60004018	Scripture says , " Suppose it is hard for godly people to be saved . Then what will happen to ungodly people and sinners ? "
60004019	Some people will suffer because God has planned it that way . They should commit themselves to their faithful Creator . And they should continue to do good .
60005001	I'm speaking to the elders among you . I was a witness of Christ's sufferings . And I will also share in the glory that is going to come . I'm making my appeal to you as one who is an elder together with you .
60005002	Be shepherds of God's flock , the believers who are under your care . Serve as their leaders . Don't serve them because you have to . Instead , do it because you want to . That's what God wants you to do . Don't do it because you want to get more and more money . Do it because you really want to serve .
60005003	Don't act as if you were a ruler over those who are under your care . Instead , be examples to the flock .
60005004	The Chief Shepherd will come again . Then you will receive the crown of glory . It is a crown that will never fade away .
60005005	Young men , follow the lead of those who are older . All of you , put on a spirit that is free of pride toward each other as if it were your clothes . Scripture says , " God opposes those who are proud . But he gives grace to those who are not . "
60005006	So don't be proud . Put yourselves under God's mighty hand . Then he will honor you at the right time .
60005007	Turn all your worries over to him . He cares about you .
60005008	Control yourselves . Be on your guard . Your enemy the devil is like a roaring lion . He prowls around looking for someone to chew up and swallow .
60005009	Stand up to him . Stand firm in what you believe . All over the world you know that your brothers and sisters are going through the same kind of suffering .
60005010	God always gives you all the grace you need . So you will only have to suffer for a little while . Then God himself will build you up again . He will make you strong and steady . And he has chosen you to share in his eternal glory because you belong to Christ .
60005011	Give him the power for ever and ever . Amen .
60005012	I consider Silas to be a faithful brother . With his help I have written you this short letter . I have written it to cheer you up . And I have written to give witness about the true grace of God . Stand firm in it .
60005013	The members of the church in Babylon send you their greetings . They were chosen together with you . Mark , my son in the faith , also sends you his greetings .
60005014	Greet each other with a friendly kiss . May God give peace to all of you who believe in Christ .
61001001	I , Simon Peter , am writing this letter . I serve Jesus Christ . I am his apostle . I am sending this letter to you who have received a faith as valuable as ours . You received it because our God and Savior Jesus Christ does what is right and fair for everyone .
61001002	May more and more grace and peace be given to you . May they come to you as you learn more about God and about Jesus our Lord .
61001003	God's power has given us everything we need to lead a godly life . All of that has come to us because we know the One who chose us . He chose us because of his own glory and goodness .
61001004	He has also given us his very great and valuable promises . He did it so you could share in his nature . He also did it so you could escape from the evil in the world . That evil is caused by sinful longings .
61001005	So you should try very hard to add goodness to your faith . To goodness , add knowledge .
61001006	To knowledge , add the ability to control yourselves . To the ability to control yourselves , add the strength to keep going . To the strength to keep going , add godliness .
61001007	To godliness , add kindness to believers . And to kindness to believers , add love .
61001008	You should possess more and more of those good points . They will make you useful and fruitful as you get to know our Lord Jesus Christ better .
61001009	But what if some of you do not have those good points ? Then you can't see very well . You are blind . You have forgotten that your past sins have been washed away .
61001010	My brothers and sisters , be very sure that God has appointed you to be saved . Be sure that he has chosen you . If you do everything I have just said , you will never trip and fall .
61001011	You will receive a rich welcome into the kingdom that lasts forever . It is the kingdom of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ .
61001012	So I will always remind you of these things . I'll do it even though you know them . I'll do it even though you now have deep roots in the truth .
61001013	I think it is right for me to remind you . It is right as long as I live in this tent . I'm talking about my body .
61001014	I know my tent will soon be removed . Our Lord Jesus Christ has made that clear to me .
61001015	I hope that you will always be able to remember these things after I'm gone . I will try very hard to see that you do .
61001016	We told you about the time our Lord Jesus Christ came with power . But we didn't make up stories when we told you about it . With our own eyes we saw him in all his majesty .
61001017	God the Father gave him honor and glory . The voice of the Majestic Glory came to him . It said , " This is my Son , and I love him . I am very pleased with him . "
61001018	We ourselves heard the voice that came from heaven . We were with him on the sacred mountain .
61001019	The word of the prophets is made more certain . We have that word . You must pay attention to it . It is like a light shining in a dark place . It will shine until the day Jesus comes . Then the Morning Star will rise in your hearts .
61001020	Above all , here is what you must understand . No prophecy in Scripture ever came from a prophet's own understanding .
61001021	It never came simply because a prophet wanted it to . Instead , the Holy Spirit guided the prophets as they spoke . So prophecy comes from God .
61002001	But there were also false prophets among the people . In the same way there will be false teachers among you . In secret they will bring in teachings that will destroy you . They will even turn against the Lord and Master who died to save them . His death paid for their sins . They will quickly destroy themselves .
61002002	Many people will follow their shameful ways . They will give the way of truth a bad name .
61002003	Those teachers are never satisfied . They want to get something out of you . So they make up stories to take advantage of you . They have been under a sentence of death for a long time . The One who will destroy them has not been sleeping .
61002004	God did not spare angels when they sinned . Instead , he sent them to hell . He put them in dark prisons . He will keep them there until he judges them .
61002005	God did not spare the world's ungodly people long ago . He brought the flood on them . But Noah preached about the right way to live . God kept him safe . He also saved seven others .
61002006	God judged the cities of Sodom and Gomorrah . He burned them to ashes . He made them an example of what is going to happen to ungodly people .
61002007	God saved Lot . He was a man who did what was right . He was shocked by the dirty , sinful lives of people who didn't obey God's laws .
61002008	That good man lived among them day after day . He saw and heard the evil things they were doing . They were breaking God's laws . And his godly spirit was deeply troubled .
61002009	So the Lord knows how to keep godly people safe in times of testing . He also knows how to keep ungodly people under guard until the day they will be judged . In the meantime , he continues to punish them .
61002010	Most of all , this is true of people who follow the evil longings of their sinful natures . They hate to be under authority . Those false prophets are bold and proud . They aren't afraid to speak evil things against heavenly beings .
61002011	Angels are stronger and more powerful than those people . But even angels don't bring to the Lord evil charges against heavenly beings .
61002012	Those people speak evil about things they don't understand . They are like wild animals . They do what comes naturally to them . They are born only to be caught and destroyed . Just like animals , they too will die .
61002013	They will be paid back with harm for the harm they have done . Their idea of pleasure is to have wild parties in the middle of the day . They are like spots and stains . They enjoy their sinful pleasures while they eat with you .
61002014	They stare at women who are not their wives . They want to have sex with them . They never stop sinning . They trap those who are not firm in their faith . They have mastered the art of getting what they want . God has placed them under his curse .
61002015	They have left God's way . They have wandered off . They follow the way of Balaam , son of Beor . He loved to get paid for doing his evil work .
61002016	But a donkey corrected him for the wrong he did . Animals don't speak . But the donkey spoke with a human voice . It tried to stop the prophet from doing a very dumb thing .
61002017	Those false prophets are like springs without water . They are like mists driven by a storm . The blackest darkness is reserved for them .
61002018	They speak empty , bragging words . They make their appeal to the earthly longings of people's sinful nature . They tempt new believers who are just escaping from the company of sinful people .
61002019	They promise to give freedom to the new believers . But they themselves are slaves to sinful living . A person is a slave to anything that controls him .
61002020	They may have escaped the sin of the world . They may have come to know our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ . But what if they are once again caught up in sin ? And what if it has become their master ? Then they are worse off at the end than they were at the beginning .
61002021	What if they had not known the way of godliness ? That would have been better than to have known it and then to have turned their backs on it . The way of godliness is the sacred command that was passed on to them .
61002022	What the proverbs say about them is true . " A dog returns to where it has thrown up . " And , " A pig that is washed goes back to rolling in the mud . "
61003001	Dear friends , this is now my second letter to you . I have written both of them as reminders . I want to stir you up to think in a way that is pure .
61003002	I want you to remember the words the holy prophets spoke in the past . Remember the command our Lord and Savior gave through your apostles .
61003003	First of all , here is what you must understand . In the last days people will make fun of the truth . They will laugh at it . They will follow their own evil longings .
61003004	They will say , " Where is this ' return ' he promised ? Everything goes on in the same way it has since our people of long ago died . In fact , it has continued that way since God first created everything . "
61003005	Long ago , God's word brought the heavens into being . His word separated the earth from the waters . And the waters surrounded it . But those people forget things like that on purpose .
61003006	The waters also flooded the world of that time . It was destroyed .
61003007	By God's word the heavens and earth of today are being reserved for fire . They are being kept for the day when God will judge . Then ungodly people will be destroyed .
61003008	Dear friends , here is one thing you must not forget . With the Lord a day is like a thousand years . And a thousand years are like a day .
61003009	The Lord is not slow to keep his promise . He is not slow in the way some people understand it . He is patient with you . He doesn't want anyone to be destroyed . Instead , he wants all people to turn away from their sins .
61003010	But the day of the Lord will come like a thief . The heavens will disappear with a roar . Fire will destroy everything in them . God will judge the earth and everything in it .
61003011	So everything will be destroyed . And what kind of people should you be ? You should lead holy and godly lives .
61003012	Live like that as you look forward to the day of God . It will make the day come more quickly . On that day fire will destroy the heavens . Its heat will melt everything in them .
61003013	But we are looking forward to a new heaven and a new earth . Godliness will make its home there . All of this is in keeping with God's promise .
61003014	Dear friends , I know you are looking forward to that . So try your best to be found pure and without blame . Be at peace with God .
61003015	Remember that while our Lord is waiting patiently to return , people are being saved . Our dear brother Paul also wrote to you about that . God made him wise to write as he did .
61003016	He writes the same way in all his letters . He speaks about what I have just told you . His letters include some things that are hard to understand . People who don't know better and aren't firm in the faith twist what he says . They twist the other Scriptures too . So they will be destroyed .
61003017	Dear friends , you already know that . So be on your guard . Then you won't be led down the wrong path by the mistakes of people who don't obey the law . You won't fall from your safe position .
61003018	Grow in the grace of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ . Get to know him better . Give him glory both now and forever . Amen .
62001001	Here is what we announce to everyone about the Word of life . He was already here from the beginning . We have heard him . We have seen him with our eyes . We have looked at him . Our hands have touched him .
62001002	That life has appeared . We have seen him . We give witness about him . And we announce to you that same eternal life . He was already with the Father . He has appeared to us .
62001003	We announce to you what we have seen and heard . We do it so you can share life together with us . And we share life with the Father and with his Son , Jesus Christ .
62001004	We are writing this to make our joy complete .
62001005	Here is the message we have heard from him and announce to you . God is light . There is no darkness in him at all .
62001006	Suppose we say that we share life with God but still walk in the darkness . Then we are lying . We are not living by the truth .
62001007	But suppose we walk in the light , just as he is in the light . Then we share life with one another . And the blood of Jesus , his Son , makes us pure from all sin .
62001008	Suppose we claim we are without sin . Then we are fooling ourselves . The truth is not in us .
62001009	But God is faithful and fair . If we admit that we have sinned , he will forgive us our sins . He will forgive every wrong thing we have done . He will make us pure .
62001010	If we say we have not sinned , we are calling God a liar . His word has no place in our lives .
62002001	My dear children , I'm writing this to you so that you will not sin . But suppose someone does sin . Then we have one who speaks to the Father for us . He stands up for us . He is Jesus Christ , the Blameless One .
62002002	He gave his life to pay for our sins . But he not only paid for our sins . He also paid for the sins of the whole world .
62002003	We know that we have come to know God if we obey his commands .
62002004	Suppose someone says , " I know him . " But suppose that person does not do what God commands . Then that person is a liar and is not telling the truth .
62002005	But if anyone obeys God's word , then God's love is truly made complete in that person . Here is how we know we belong to him .
62002006	Those who claim to belong to him must live just as Jesus did .
62002007	Dear friends , I'm not writing you a new command . Instead , I'm writing one you have heard before . You have had it since the beginning .
62002008	But I am writing what amounts to a new command . Its truth was shown in how Jesus lived . It is also shown in how you live . The darkness is passing away . The true light is already shining .
62002009	Suppose someone claims to be in the light but hates his brother or sister . Then he is still in the darkness .
62002010	Those who love their brothers and sisters are living in the light . There is nothing in them to make them fall into sin .
62002011	But those who hate a brother or sister are in the darkness . They walk around in the darkness . They don't know where they are going . The darkness has made them blind .

66015005	After this I looked , and the temple was opened in heaven . The temple is the holy tent where the tablets of the covenant were kept .
66015006	Out of the temple came the seven angels who were bringing the seven plagues . They were dressed in clean , shining linen . They wore gold strips of cloth around their chests .
66015007	Then one of the four living creatures gave seven golden bowls to the seven angels . The bowls were filled with the anger of God , who lives for ever and ever .
66015008	The temple was filled with smoke that came from the glory and power of God . No one could enter the temple until the seven plagues of the seven angels were completed .
66016001	Then I heard a loud voice from the temple speaking to the seven angels . " Go , " it said . " Pour out the seven bowls of God's anger on the earth . "
66016002	The first angel went and poured out his bowl on the land . Ugly and painful sores broke out on the people who had the mark of the beast and worshiped his statue .
66016003	The second angel poured out his bowl on the sea . It turned into blood like the blood of a dead person . Every living thing in the sea died .
66016004	The third angel poured out his bowl on the rivers and on the springs of water . They became blood .
66016005	Then I heard the angel who was in charge of the waters . He said , " The way you judge is fair . You are the Holy One . You are the One who is and who was .
66016006	The beast's worshipers have poured out the life's blood of your people and your prophets . So you have given those worshipers blood to drink . That's exactly what they should get . "
66016007	Then I heard the altar reply , " Lord God who rules over all , the way you judge is true and fair . "
66016008	The fourth angel poured out his bowl on the sun . The sun was allowed to burn people with fire .
66016009	They were burned by the blazing heat . So they spoke evil things against the name of God , who controlled these plagues . But they refused to turn away from their sins . They did not give glory to God .
66016010	The fifth angel poured out his bowl on the throne of the beast . The kingdom of the beast became very dark . People bit their tongues because they were suffering so much .
66016011	They spoke evil things against the God of heaven because of their pains and their sores . But they refused to turn away from the sins they had committed .
66016012	The sixth angel poured out his bowl on the great river Euphrates . Its water dried up to prepare the way for the kings from the East .
66016013	Then I saw three evil spirits that looked like frogs . They came out of the mouths of the dragon , the beast and the false prophet .
66016014	They are spirits of demons performing miraculous signs . They go out to gather the kings of the whole world for battle . That battle will take place on the great day of the God who rules over all .
66016015	" Look ! I am coming like a thief ! Blessed are those who stay awake and keep their clothes with them . They will not be caught naked . They will not be put to shame . "
66016016	Then the evil spirits gathered the kings together . The place where the kings met is called Armageddon in the Hebrew language .
66016017	The seventh angel poured out his bowl into the air . Out of the temple came a loud voice from the throne . It said , " It is done ! "
66016018	Then there came flashes of lightning , rumblings , thunder and a powerful earthquake . There has never been an earthquake as terrible as this since man has lived on earth .
66016019	The great city split into three parts . The cities of the nations crumbled and fell . God remembered Babylon the Great . He gave her the cup filled with the wine of his terrible anger .
66016020	Every island ran away . The mountains could not be found .
66016021	Huge hailstones of about 100 pounds each fell from the sky . The hail crushed people . They spoke evil things against God because the plague of hail was so terrible .
66017001	One of the seven angels who had the seven bowls came to me . He said , " Come . I will show you how the great prostitute will be punished . She is the one who sits on many waters .
66017002	The kings of the earth took part in her evil ways . The people living on earth were drunk with the wine of her terrible sins . "
66017003	Then the angel carried me away in a vision . The Holy Spirit took me into a desert . There I saw a woman sitting on a bright red beast . It was covered with names that say evil things that are displeasing to God . It had seven heads and ten horns .
66017004	The woman was dressed in purple and bright red . She was gleaming with gold , jewels and pearls . In her hand she held a golden cup filled with things that God hates . It was filled with her terrible , dirty sins .
66017005	Here is the name that was written on her forehead . mystery the great city of babylon the mother of prostitutes the mother of everything on earth that god hates
66017006	I saw that the woman was drunk with the blood of God's people . They are the ones who gave witness to Jesus . When I saw her , I was very amazed .
66017007	Then the angel said to me , " Why are you amazed ? I will explain to you the mystery of the woman and of the beast she rides on . The beast is the one who has the seven heads and ten horns .
66017008	The beast that you saw used to exist . But now he does not . He will come up out of the Abyss . He will be destroyed . Some of the people who live on the earth will be amazed when they see the beast . Their names have not been written in the Book of Life from the time the world was created . They will be amazed because even though the beast used to exist and now does not , he will come again .
66017009	" Here is a problem that you have to be wise to understand . The seven heads are seven hills that the woman sits on .
66017010	They are also seven kings . Five have fallen , one is ruling , and the other has still not come . When he does come , he must remain for a little while .
66017011	" The beast who used to exist , and now does not , is an eighth king . He belongs to the other seven . He will be destroyed .
66017012	" The ten horns you saw are ten kings . They have not yet received a kingdom . But for one hour they will receive authority to rule together with the beast .
66017013	They have only one purpose . So they give their power and authority to the beast .
66017014	They will make war against the Lamb . But the Lamb will overcome them because he is the most powerful Lord of all and the greatest King of all . His appointed , chosen and faithful followers will be with him . "
66017015	Then the angel spoke to me . " You saw the waters the prostitute sits on , " he said . " They stand for all the nations of the world , no matter what their race or language is .
66017016	The beast and the ten horns you saw will hate the prostitute . They will destroy her and leave her naked . They will eat her flesh and burn her with fire .
66017017	God has put it into their hearts to carry out his purpose . So they agreed to give the beast their power to rule . They will give him that power until God's words come true .
66017018	" The woman you saw stands for the great city that rules over the kings of the earth . "
66018001	After these things I saw another angel coming down from heaven . He had great authority . His glory filled the earth with light .
66018002	With a mighty voice he shouted , " Fallen ! Babylon the Great has fallen ! She has become a place where demons live . She has become a den for every evil spirit . She has become a nest for every ' unclean ' and hated bird .
66018003	All the nations have drunk the strong wine of her terrible sins . The kings of the earth took part in her evil ways . The traders of the world grew rich from her great wealth . "
66018004	Then I heard another voice from heaven . It said , " Come out of her , my people . Then you will not take part in her sins . You will not suffer from any of her plagues .
66018005	Her sins are piled up to heaven . God has remembered her crimes .
66018006	Do to her as she has done to others . Pay her back double for what she has done . Mix her a double dose of what she has mixed for others .
66018007	Give her as much pain and suffering as the glory and wealth she gave herself . She brags to herself , ' I rule like a queen . I am not a widow . I will never be sad . '
66018008	But she will be plagued by death , sadness and hunger . In a single day they will all catch up with her . She will be burned up by fire . The Lord God who judges her is mighty .
66018009	" The kings of the earth who committed terrible sins with her will sob . They will be sad because they used to share her riches . They will see the smoke rising as she burns .
66018010	They will be terrified by her suffering . Standing far away , they will exclaim , " ' How terrible ! How terrible it is for you , great city ! How terrible for you , Babylon , city of power ! In just one hour you have been destroyed ! '
66018011	" The traders of the world will cry and be sad over her . No one buys what they sell anymore .
66018012	Here is what they had for sale . Gold , silver , jewels , pearls . Fine linen , purple , silk , bright red cloth . Every kind of expensive wood . All sorts of articles made out of ivory , valuable wood , bronze , iron and marble .
66018013	Cinnamon , spice , incense , myrrh , frankincense . Wine , olive oil , fine flour , wheat . Cattle , sheep , horses , carriages , human slaves .
66018014	" The merchants will say , ' The pleasure you longed for has left you . All your riches and glory have disappeared forever . '
66018015	The traders who sold these things and became rich because of her will stand far away . Her suffering will terrify them . They will cry and be sad .
66018016	They will cry out , " ' How terrible ! How terrible it is for you , great city , dressed in fine linen , purple and bright red ! How terrible for you , great city , gleaming with gold , jewels and pearls !
66018017	In just one hour your great wealth has been destroyed ! ' " Every sea captain and all who travel by ship will stand far away . So will the sailors and all who earn their living from the sea .
66018018	They will see the smoke rising as Babylon burns . They will ask , ' Was there ever a city like this great city ? '
66018019	They will throw dust on their heads . They will cry and be sad . They will cry out , " ' How terrible ! How terrible it is for you , great city ! All who had ships on the sea became rich because of her wealth ! In just one hour she has been destroyed !
66018020	Heaven , be glad for this ! God's people , be glad ! Apostles and prophets , be glad ! God has judged her for the way she treated you . ' "
66018021	Then a mighty angel picked up a huge rock . It was the size of a large millstone . He threw it into the sea . Then he said , " That is how the great city of Babylon will be thrown down . Never again will it be found .
66018022	The songs of musicians will never be heard in you again . Gone will be the music of harp , flute and trumpet . No worker of any kind will ever be found in you again . The sound of a millstone will never be heard in you again .
66018023	The light of a lamp will never shine in you again . The voices of brides and grooms will never be heard in you again . Your traders were among the world's most important people . By your magic spell all the nations were led down the wrong path .
66018024	You were guilty of the murder of prophets and God's people . You were guilty of the blood of all who have been killed on the earth . "
66019001	After these things I heard a roar in heaven . It sounded like a huge crowd shouting , " Hallelujah ! Salvation and glory and power belong to our God .
66019002	The way he judges is true and fair . He has judged the great prostitute . She polluted the earth with her terrible sins . God has paid her back for killing those who served him . "

In this way the false prophet had tricked those who had received the mark of the beast and had worshiped his statue . The beast and the false prophet were thrown alive into the lake of fire that burns with sulfur .
66019021	The rest of them were killed with the sword that came out of the rider's mouth . All the birds stuffed themselves with the dead bodies .
66020001	I saw an angel coming down out of heaven . He had the key to the Abyss . In his hand he held a heavy chain .
66020002	He grabbed the dragon , that old serpent . The serpent is also called the devil , or Satan . The angel put him in chains for 1,000 years .
66020003	Then he threw him into the Abyss . He locked it and sealed him in . This was to keep Satan from fooling the nations anymore until the 1,000 years were ended . After that , he must be set free for a short time .
66020004	I saw thrones . Those who had been given authority to judge were sitting on them . 66020005	This is the first resurrection . The rest of the dead did not come to life until the 1,000 years were ended .

66020007	When the 1,000 years are over , Satan will be set free from his prison .
66020008	He will go out to fool the nations . He will gather them from the four corners of the earth . He will bring Gog and Magog together for battle . Their troops are as many as the grains of sand on the seashore .

66021001	I saw a new heaven and a new earth . The first heaven and the first earth were completely gone . There was no longer any sea .
66021002	I saw the Holy City , the new Jerusalem . It was coming down out of heaven from God . It was prepared like a bride beautifully dressed for her husband .
66021003	I heard a loud voice from the throne . It said , " Now God makes his home with people . He will live with them . They will be his people . And God himself will be with them and be their God .
66021004	He will wipe away every tear from their eyes . There will be no more death or sadness . There will be no more crying or pain . Things are no longer the way they used to be . "
66021005	He who was sitting on the throne said , " I am making everything new ! " Then he said , " Write this down . You can trust these words . They are true . "
66021006	He said to me , " It is done . I am the Alpha and the Omega , the First and the Last . I am the Beginning and the End . Anyone who is thirsty may drink from the spring of the water of life . It doesn't cost anything !

66021008	" But others will have their place in the lake of fire that burns with sulfur . Those who are afraid and those who do not believe will be there . Murderers and those who pollute themselves will join them . Those who commit sexual sins and those who practice witchcraft will go there . Those who worship statues of gods and all who tell lies will be there too . It is the second death . "
66021009	One of the seven angels who had the seven bowls came and spoke to me . The bowls were filled with the seven last plagues . The angel said , " Come . I will show you the bride , the wife of the Lamb . "
66021010	Then he carried me away in a vision . The Spirit took me to a huge , high mountain . He showed me Jerusalem , the Holy City . It was coming down out of heaven from God .
66021011	It shone with the glory of God . It gleamed like a very valuable jewel . It was like a jasper , as clear as crystal .
66021012	The city had a huge , high wall with 12 gates . Twelve angels were at the gates , one at each of them . On the gates were written the names of the 12 tribes of Israel .
66021013	There were three gates on the east and three on the north . There were three gates on the south and three on the west .
66021014	The wall of the city had 12 foundations . Written on them were the names of the 12 apostles of the Lamb .
66021015	The angel who talked with me had a gold measuring rod . He used it to measure the city , its gates and its walls .
66021016	The city was laid out like a square . It was as long as it was wide . The angel measured the city with the rod . It was 1,400 miles long . It was as wide and high as it was long .
66021017	He measured the wall of the city . It was 200 feet thick . The angel did the measuring as a man would .
66021018	The wall was made out of jasper . The city was made out of pure gold , as pure as glass .
66021019	The foundations of the city walls were decorated with every kind of jewel . The first foundation was made out of jasper . The second was made out of sapphire . The third was made out of chalcedony . The fourth was made out of emerald .
66021020	The fifth was made out of sardonyx . The sixth was made out of carnelian . The seventh was made out of chrysolite . The eighth was made out of beryl . The ninth was made out of topaz . The tenth was made out of chrysoprase . The eleventh was made out of jacinth . The twelfth was made out of amethyst .
66021021	The 12 gates were made from 12 pearls . Each gate was made out of a single pearl . The main street of the city was made out of pure gold , as clear as glass .
66021022	I didn't see a temple in the city . This was because the Lamb and the Lord God who rules over all are its temple .
66021023	The city does not need the sun or moon to shine on it . God's glory is its light , and the Lamb is its lamp .
66021024	The nations will walk by the light of the city . The kings of the world will bring their glory into it .
66021025	Its gates will never be shut , because there will be no night there .
66021026	The glory and honor of the nations will be brought into it .
66021027	Only what is pure will enter it . No one who fools others or does shameful things will enter it . Only those whose names are written in the Lamb's Book of Life will enter the city .
66022001	Then the angel showed me the river of the water of life . It was as clear as crystal . It flowed from the throne of God and of the Lamb .
66022002	It flowed down the middle of the city's main street . On each side of the river stood the tree of life , bearing 12 crops of fruit . Its fruit was ripe every month . The leaves of the tree bring healing to the nations .
66022003	There will no longer be any curse . The throne of God and of the Lamb will be in the city . God's servants will serve him .
66022004	They will see his face . His name will be on their foreheads .
66022005	There will be no more night . They will not need the light of a lamp or the light of the sun . The Lord God will give them light . They will rule for ever and ever .
